item.text: @#/ /rgyud nga pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a nA bi la tan+t+ra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du /rgyud kyi
rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya/ /snang ba med
cing dpe med pa/ /tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das/ /zhi zhing bdag med
@##/ /dag pa nyid/ /mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/ /ngang gis sangs rgyas
'di nyid tshul/ /mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs/ /khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas/ /
bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin/ /rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /snying rjes 'di ni
bstan pa yin/ /kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang / /kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang / /kha cig
khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni/ /blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed/ /de nyid nges par yang dag par/ /rgyu
yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid/ /rgyu dang 'bras bum grub na/ /bsgoms pa med cing byang chub med/ /rgyu yi yid ches spangs
pa 'di/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag /sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed/ /kha cig
drag po'i rang bzhin du/ /kha cig zhi ba chen po che/ /kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs/ /kha cig 'dar zhing
g.yo ba dang / /glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang / /lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid/ /kha cig sngags ni yang dag
dgod/ /kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang / /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i
lus| |de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog /sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags/ /gang tshe sems ni legs
@##/ /gnas pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin 'gyur ba ni/ /phan 'dod rnams
kyis shes par bya/ /phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa/ /lus ngag yid gsum
bcos pa'i phyir/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes bya ra gsungs/ /phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir/ /tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste/ /rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya/ /me long lta
bu gcig nyid de/ /dang po grwar ni rtogs par bya/ /so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas/ /shar gyi grwar ni rnam par brgyan//
bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa/ /byang gi grwar ni rnam par spros/ /mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni/ /bag chags med grwa
rjes rtogs byed/ /gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du/ /de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas/ /ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag /sgo bzhir yang
dag brjod pa ni/ /de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba/ /de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dge ba/ /dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs su ni/ /mi bskyod pa
yis rnam par brgyan/ /zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las/ /de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub/ /dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang / /rta babs la
sogs thams cad ni/ /ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid/ /sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste/ /de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs/ /gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel ba/ /
ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas/ /de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs/ /dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste/ /dril bu do shal brtag pa ni/ /rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed/ /sgra brnyan rnam
pa lta bur ni/ /chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs/ /chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir/ /de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs/ /bla re la sogs gang bres pa/ /
dngos po la sogs dang por nges/ /sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad/ /dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o/ /gos phreng de dag thams cad ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid/ /
@#/ /gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems/ /dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan/ /de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du/ /
rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje rin po che yis spras/ /zla ba nyi ma gang gsungs pa/ /thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems//
ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs/ /sku gsungs thugs ni nye ba'i phyir/ /rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med
bla ma slob ma rnams gsal bar/ /rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs/ /sbyin sreg yang ni bshad pa yang / /lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang
ni| |thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid/ /bye brag phyed pas me nang du/ /gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams/ /sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni
bsreg blugs bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba/ /yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags/ /de ltar sbyin sreg bshad nas ni/ /rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya/ /sku gsung
thugs la rtag tu ni/ /gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa/ /de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod/ /phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci/ /gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /
de ni gsal bar brjod par bya/ /yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang / /gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod/ /skye ba med cing snang med pa/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs
gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs/ /sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni/ /lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya/ /phung po khams dang skye mched
kyi| |rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang / /yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid/ /de kun yang dag rab brtags shing / /gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang / /lha zhes bya bar yang dag
bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las/ /de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs/ /lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni/ /gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya/ /de nas skyil krung bcas
nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang / /rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis/ /de nyid mthong bar bzhag par bya/ /snying ga'i gnas su lag pa gnyis/ /'bad pas mnyam
par sbyar nas su/ /mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du/ /gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad 'dus pa'i bdag /myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag /thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa
@#/ /bzhin/ /rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur/ /nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog
gsang ba'i don/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don/ /sems can don du snying rje che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /sna rtse'i dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs/ /de dag
thams cad dbyibs tsam du/ /mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so/ /res 'ga' dam tshig 'khor lo yang / /de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so/ /rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni//
gang 'grub de ni res 'ga' yang / /gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin/ /rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas/ /sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya/ /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin
sha| bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid/ /dam tshig ces bya rab 'bad par/ /gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa/ /de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs/ /de rnams tha
snyad tsam gyis gnas/ /gang tshe dam chig 'dod chags sems/ /des ni de nyid rab tu spyod/ /gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa/ /de ni sems can yod ma yin/ /de la kun
tu rtog pa yi/ /khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o/ /khrag ni chen po zos nas ni/ /'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya/ /gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa/ /khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrag
par bya/ /de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir/ /bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid/ /sha chen du ni rab tu dbye/ /mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /
bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod/ /gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems/ /nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las/ /phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod/ /chos
dang chos min nges pa'i sems/ /sbas pa'i char ni gnas pa 'di/ /chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o/ /bshang ba za bar yang dag brjod/ /dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid
ni| |'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad/ /'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes
bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha
ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI bud+d+ha ka pA la nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du dpal sangs rgyas thod
pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ /dpal sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal
'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gtso bo rnams dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i tshig gis rdo rje chen po'i
gnas su/ rgyud thams cad dang / sngags yang dag par bshad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dang / pad+mo yang dag par sbyar bas btsun mo'i
b+ha gar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma thams cad rmad du gyur te
gcig la gcig lta zhing / e ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ji ltar yongs su
mya ngan las 'das/ de nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mo/ sems can
bsod nams dman pa rnams nus pa la zhon par 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bye ba phrag drug nyid do/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni
bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do/ /mdo sde so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o/ /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa ni bye ba la bsgres pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o/ /'di dag thams cad ni thub
pa'i dbang pos gsungs so/ /sngags dang bral na ni rgyud kyis nus pa mi snang ste rgyud la lar ni ci nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ /bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni
sngags 'bum bzlas pas myur bar 'grub par gsungs so/ /bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub bo/ /de ltar rdo rje can chen po rgyud kyi bdag po'i gtso bos
gsungs so/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ /sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis ni 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o/ /
sems can sgom pa la zhan pa rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas par bya'o/ /sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ blun po dang / lkugs pa'i
rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/ shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan
@#/ /du'ang 'gyur ro/ /gal te dman pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bzlas pa de'i tshe bskal pa skar ma lta bur bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do//
de ltar thos nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal la lta bar byed cing zur mig dang bcas pa'i chags pas bltas te shin tu khro bas 'jigs par
byed cing snying rje'i thugs 'khrugs pas bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo/ /de ltar bzhugs pa'i lha mo chen mo rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug la de nas des gzigs

pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu las sngags phyung ngo / /oM bud+d+he sid+d+he su sid+d+he/ a mr-i ta a ra dze bud+d+ha ka pA la s+phoT ne s+phoT ya trA sa ya ho hUM phaT/ de ltar sngags kyi mchog
son pas sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa'i klu rnams bcom par byas shing phye mar byas nas slar 'ongs te sna tshogs sde ma'i zhal du zhugs te/ pad+ma'i nang nas byung nas
slar thod par zhugs so/ /sngags 'di'i mthus klu rnams zhig ste/ skrag cing rdul byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyas la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu thams cad lhags
te| stobs kyi rgyu dang / dung skyong dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang / pad+ma chen po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba dug las byung ba thams
cad kyang lhags so/ /rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la kha phyogs te klu thams cad kyis zhus pa/ lha mo/ bka' stsol ci zhig bgyi zhes smra'o/ /gsungs pa/ gang yang sangs rgyas
nyams su myong ba de ltar gyis shig /de ltar thos pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyis thod pa kha phye ste glegs bam byung ngo / /
nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo / /lha mo sna tshogs sde ma zungs/ /sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma/ /rgyud 'di rgyal po chen po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med/ /sangs rgyas
thong pa zhes bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan byed pa'o/ /de ltar thos nas sna tshogs sde mas glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste/ phyag na rdo rje la nye bar btad do/ /phyag na rdo
rjes rgyud 'di zungs/ /sems can kun la bde 'bab pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub kun/ /'bras bu myur du ster byed pa'o/ /mnan dang spar ba ye shes che/ /gong na med pa
rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi nyams dga' ba/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /nam mkha' lding dang char dbab dang / /dngul chu bcud kyis len pa dang / /bskrad
dang dbang du bya nyid dang / /rmongs dang mngon spyod nyid dang ni/ /dpung la sogs pa rengs nyid dang / /dus su zin pa bzlog pa dang / /phur bus gdab dang bsad pa dang / /rtag
@#/ /tu sgrub pa byed pa dang / /sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang / /ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma bskyed dang / /dpal chen he ru ka yi ni/ /dus su zin pa
bzlog pa dang / /bskyed pa dang ni gnas rgyu dang / /dngos dang dngos med spros med dang / /srid par spyod cing dgos med dang / /dgongs pas bshad pa mchog chen dang / /
rnal 'byor ma yi mchog chen dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi 'dus pa dang / /nus pa rnam pa mang gsungs pa/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan dag pa nyid dang
ni| |de bzhin bstan pa skyong ba dang / /dur khrod 'jigs pa che bzang dang / /ro langs sgrub pa la sogs dang / /stobs po che rnams dgug pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten
gsum dgug dang / /rim gyis gdung ba 'jig rten dang / /dgra yi kha sogs bcing ba dang / /de bzhin bsad dang bslu ba dang / /mi snang byed pa mchog dang ni/ /mig sman
dang ni ril bu nyid/ /bcud len ral gri nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi snang ba ni mchog chen dang / /sna tshogs
sgyu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang / /rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba dang / /gzhan gyi lus la gzhug sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bye bas rab bsrungs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bu mo mchog
chen rnams/ /khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na/ /gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos/ /mig 'phrul byed pa nyid dang ni/ /dge mtshan rnam pa mang shes pa/ /'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin
pas| |'di ru 'grub pa gdon mi za/ /'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po/ /gcig gis 'bum las rgyal bar byed/ /skyes pa gcig gis 'dod chen gyis/ /bud med 'bum
phrag 'jig byed cing / /rdo rjer byed pa rnyed dga' ba/ /gcig gis thams cad 'dod pa spyad/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /mkha' lding sbyor ba rim ji bzhin/ /rgyud kun du
yang rnyed dka' ba/ /mu stegs rnams kyi yul min pa/ /rgyud kun du yang ma gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i gzhung ji bzhin/ /rdo rje mgon pos gsungs pa yi/ /mkha' lding
shin tu rmad byung ba/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sbyor ba rnam pa bco brgyad gsungs/ /sha li ka yi sbyor ba dang / /rig pa 'dzin dang rgyan po 'gyed/ /rnga rdung bud med
'phrog pa dang / /shin bsnun zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /khu byug pad+mas 'byed pa dang / /stag byed chu blugs dung 'bud dang / /thod lo kor 'phrog skyug pa dang / /ras g.yog
thal lcags brdab pa dang / /yig gsum bsam gtan gyis ni gtam/ /'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya/ /mkha' lding sbyor ba bco brgyad po/ /'jig rten gsum na rab
@#/ /rnyed dka'/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /rdo rje mgon po nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /mchog gi ye shes ji
bzhin pa/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs/ /bde ba chen po ster byed pa/ /'di nyid du ni kun gnas kyang / /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /der ni bcud dang bcud
len te/ /de nyid du ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'o/ /der ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'o/ /der ni he ru ka dpa' bo/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso bo/ /der
ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa/ /de nyid du ni ro langs sgrub/ /der ni dur khrod brgyad po rnams/ /skad cig tsam gyis bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /der ni sangs rgyas bdag nyid de/ /
stong phrag gsum ni rnam par bzhugs/ /der ni 'jig rten khams kun te/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /sangs rgyas la sogs bskyed pa'i yum/ /byang chub
sems dpa' dpal chen po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen/ /de nyid bsod nams kun ster ma/ /de nyid thar pa ster byed ma/ /phyag rgya chen po grags chen
po| |dngos grub kun ni 'dod byed ma/ /ma dang tshangs mo sring mo dang / /bu mo bud med rab brtan ma/ /shes rab mnyes shing 'jigs byed ma/ /'gro drug bde sdug
bag chags bcas/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das nyid dang / /bdag nyid chen po de nyid de/ /rnam rtog kun tu rtog pa nyid/ /de bzhin 'char dang nub pa dang / /nyin mtshan mal
stan bza' ba dang / /nges pa'i brtul zhugs rtsis dang grangs/ /rnam par mi rtog yang dag rtog /dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang / /gzhan dang gang dang de dang ni/ /
de nyid bdag nyid chen po gcig/ /sems can kun la bde ba 'bab/ /de ltar thos nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'dod can ma la
sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' ba'i spyan gdangs nas sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du btud nas/ 'di ltar gsol to/ /e ma'o/ /
sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/ /sems can kun la bde 'bab ma/ /glegs bam don dang ldan gang zhig /de kun sangs rgyas byin rlabs bshad/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag
gnyis glang po che'i lag pa ltar rab tu brkyang ste/ glegs bam yang dag par blangs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i gnas su don dang
bcas pa'i gzhung zhu bar gyur to/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying gnas byung ste/ /sna tshogs sde ma'i thugs su ngal sos so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal
@#/ /'byor ma chen mo la 'di skad gsol to/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa gang zhig lags/ /las kyi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'grub/ /sngon du bsnyan pa gang zhig
lags/ /mkha' lding 'grub pa'i nges pa gang / /dngul chu bcud len sna tshogs pa/ /dngos grub ster byed gang zhig lags/ /sbar dang mnan pa gang gsungs dang / /
dus dang bya ba'i nges bcas dang / /dngos grub thob dus gang zhig lags/ /sangs rgyas ji lta bu ru brjod/ /de bzhin thod pa ji lta bu/ /sbyor dang ldan pa'i ji lta bu//
sna tshogs sde ma'ang ji lta bu/ /theg pa chen po ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnam nges ci/ /gsungs pa/ rgyud 'dir sngon du bsnyen pa mod/ /de bzhin yul dang dus
tshes dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar sbyor med pa/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsten/ /dus dang bya ba'i nges mi bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /thos pa tsam gyis
'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes su gsungs/ /thod pa gru gsum yang dag 'byung / /sbyor ba gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa/ /de yi sna tshogs ngo mtshar byed/ /
sde ni bde chen ye shes so/ /'di nyid theg pa chen po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung / /de ni rmad byung che mchog ste/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba nyid/ /de nyid he ru
ka dpa' bo/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba 'bab/ /rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs bde/ /dpa' dbang bdag mo
dbang phyug ma/ /de yi thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rnam par gnas/ /de yi ye shes bzang po ni/ /lhan cig skyes pa dag las 'byung / /de ni rig pa'i dbang lnga
dang | |sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te/ /sna tshogs sbyor dang tshe 'phel dang / /dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub par 'dir ni gdon
mi za| |man ngag lam las gang shes pa/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang
ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos grub thams cad dang / /ye shes gtan la dbab pa dang / thod pa kha phye ba las glegs bam byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas yang

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /oM ma hA badzra he ru ka badzre/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mahA dz+nyA na s+pho Ta ne shI g+h+raM sA d+ha ya staM b+ha yA kI la ya hUM phaT/ sngags 'di chu la lan bdun du mngon
par bzlas te/ gzugs brnyan de bkru bar bya'o/ /chu des rang gi gdong bkrus na/ mi snang par byed de/ lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/ /nags kyi nang du stag gis
kyang mi mthong ngo / /gzhan dag gis kyang de mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srog chags 'bum gyi nang du song na ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed do/ /gang gis kyang mi mthong ngo / /lha'i bu
mo 'phrog cing lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo / /'o mas gdong bkrus pa tsam gyis ni mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar shing 'ba' bo las phug ste/
dur khrod kyi me la 'ba' bo la dang / tshangs pa rdo rje rab tu sbar la/ de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs te/ kham phor du gzhag par bya'o/ /yang na pad+ma'i snod du'o/ /sngags
@#/ /'di brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni trAM hUM/ oM badzra bi si nI hrIHhUM/ oM ka mi nI khaM hUM/ oM pA tA lA ba sI nA AHhUM/ oM tsi traHse na
sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ya hrIHhUM/ sngags 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /thal ba de dang / rdo rje gtsug gis byug par byas nas/ /ji srid du lus la
mtshon chas phog pa de srid du mi tshugs so/ /slar zhing dgra thams cad kyi mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang sdang ba la bltas na de long bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sdang ba'i
sems 'dzin pa na de smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /thal ba de nyid dang / mar khu bzang pos mig byugs na dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang ci'ang rung ba sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i
gter dpag tshad stong gi 'og tu son pa'i dngul dang / gser dang / rin po che gang na yod ba de thams cad la srin lag gis sdigs mdzub byas pa tsam gyis thams cad mdun du lhags
te gsol ba 'debs so/ /kye| sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gter long la sems can gyi don gyis shig /der gter blangs na gang 'dod pa de byed de/ thal ba des byed
do| |thal ba de dang / go ro tsa na lhan cig bsnos te/ mdzub mos mnyes pas dbung gi tshogs langs pa mdzub mo bskor ba tsam gyis 'bum phrag stong gi dpung rnams kha du pa
tu ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de byed do/ /bkrus pa tsam gyis langs par 'di la the tshom med do/ /thal ba de dang / zha nye'i phye ma dang bsnos te gcig tu byas la/ rdo rje'i gtsug
rjes su byin te khab len gyi lcags kyi phye ma bsre zhing gser gyi phye ma'ang cung zad bsre bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i chu'i khu ba dang lhan cig tu bsnos te zangs ma'i snod du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du
bzhag go /de nas mkhris pa chen po mnyes te rta'i khrag dang lhan cig tu bsnos la/ yang snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bton te lcags gsum gyi snod du
gzhag par bya'o/ /zangs ma'i snod du bzhag pa de me'i nang du bcug na gser dang / dngul du 'gyur bar som nyi med do/ /srang gcig kyang srang stong gi rin thang du 'gyur te rin po che dang
'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gser de ma sha gcig dang / dngul srang gcig bsres te me la bzhu na srang sum brgya'i rin thang gi tshad du 'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med do/ /'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni
sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po snying rje dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po stobs che ba de
rnams kyis kyang sbyin par mi nus so/ /'di yi sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs/ /rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa yin/ /'dus sogs rnal 'byor
@#/ /rgyud du ni/ /sbyor ba rnam pa ma gsungs pa/ /gang tshe sngon du bsnyen de'i tshe/ /de yi sbyor bas ci zhig bya/ /bsod nams dman pa'i sems can gang / /mtshams
med lnga ni byed pa yang / /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di lta'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos po de yis blo chen rnams/ /sems can don la gcig tu brtson/ /
srang gcig gis bsres bye ba'i rin/ /sbyor ba kun tu rnyed par dka'/ /sbyor ba glegs ba ma la mi bri/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /bla mas dngos grub bla mas thar//
bla ma ston pa rnams kun pa/ /des na slob ma blo can gyis/ /'bad pas bla ma mnyes par bya/ /thal ba de nyid kyis lus blta ba'i don du bu mo'i mgo la blugs te rdo rje gtsug
gis bu mo bkru'o/ /yang thal ba'i thig le byas la/ tshangs pa rdo rjes maN+Dal gru bzhi byas te/ de'i dbus su bu mo gzhag par bya'o/ /bdug spos lngas bdugs shing sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs na bu mo la 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ston to/ /bu don gyis 'bras bu la sngags 'di

lan bdun du mngon par sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni de hi/ de hI da dA pa ya da dA pa ya he he b+ha ga ba ti shI g+h+raM khad gaM d+ha ra hi bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya hUM staM
hrI phaT a phaT/ yungs kar bsnun pa tsam gyis ni/ /bu mo grags chen ma ni dgod/ /de yi kha nas ral gri bdun/ /'byung ba la ni the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
skad cig ma de nyid la 'grub par 'dir som nyid med do/ /de ltar ral gcig grub pas bye ba brgya stong gi rig 'dzin grub pas bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni 'jig
rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'o/ /bu mo bkrus pa tsam gyis rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /de'i thal pa lcags gsum gyis dkris te ril bu byas nas khar bcug pa tsam gyis ni mi
snang bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab can gyis sum cu pa'ang bskor ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ /ril bu lag par blangs pas dngos po gang dang / gang

phaT| bskrad pa'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ thal ba'i sbyor ba

tu sbyor zhes pa/ /rgyud gzhan dag tu ma gsungs shing / /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sbas pa/ /de ni 'bad de gsal bar mdzod/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha yi
le'u ni ji lta bu/ /sangs rgyas thod pa rnal 'byor ma'i/ /rgyud du lha rnams du zhig gsungs/ /de ru gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/ /gsungs pa/
raM las nyi ma bsam par bya/ /nyi ma'i steng du hUM byung ba'i/ /rdo rje nag po sreg pa'i bdag /rdo rje de nyid 'od zer gyis/ /ra ba dra ba'i mtshams bcing ngo / /de bzhin rdo rje nang
gyur pa/ /rdo rje sa gzhi bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus chud par/ /e yi rnam pa bdag nyid che/ /gru gsum khams gsum bdag nyid can/ /yi ge lam
gyur sa yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser po'o/ /de yi dbus nas sa bon ni/ /yi ge oM ste chos bdag nyid/ /oM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsa rnams kun
gyi rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rtsa ni drug cu la rgyan dang / /sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab/ /des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o/ /rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che/ /
shes rab can gyis de ltar bsam/ /de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /baM dkar yi ge las byung ba/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o/ /rtsa rnams thams cad chu yi ni/ /dkyil
'khor la ni thim par 'gyur/ /slar yang bsam par ba ba ni/ /rab dmar las byung me'i dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum 'bar ba'i bdag nyid can/ /rab tu 'bar bzhin pa yi
ni| |rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yang dag blta/ /de nas bsam par bya ba ni/ /yaM gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rnam 'dra sngo/ /rtsa rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i gzugs/ /
thim gyur 'khor lo'i rig par gsungs/ /de dag thams cad thim gyur pa/ /de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /de ltar shes par byed gang zhig /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal
'byor pas/ /de nas zla ba bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i steng du nyi ma'o/ /de yi dbus chud sa bon ni/ /hUM dang a yi rang bzhin no/ /yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te/ /ka ni ha la thim par
'gyur/ /mi phyed pa yi ha dang hUM/ /gnyi ga'i bdag nyid can blta'o/ /ha ni mi shigs shes rab kyi/ /bdag nyid u dang thig le dag /gnyi ga gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /yi ge
@#/ /hUM gi mchog lta'o/ /hUM las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams/ /de yis bde ba che bskul te/ /ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can/ /nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing / /
dkyil 'khor gnyi ga gcig gyur pa/ /nyi ma'i mchog tu blta bar bya/ /yang ni hUM byung 'od zer des/ /rtsa ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la/ /reg ma thag pa'i mod la ni/ /
rtsa yi 'khor lo las 'bab 'gyur/ /zhu ba de yis sa bon bkru/ /hUM gyur pa las rdo rje ste/ /dbus su de nyid kyis byin brlabs/ /sa bon rdo rje las byung ba/ /dpa' bo khrag
'thung mdog sngon po/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /gtso bo hUM zhes 'don pa ste/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /gnyi ga'ang khro ba'i bdag nyid can/ /stag
gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /bsregs su mchod phyir thogs pa yi/ /shin tu bzhad pas 'jigs che ba'i/ /gtso bo snying rje'i
bdag nyid blta/ /dpung rgyan mgul do 'khor gdub dang / /gcer bu rus pa'i ska rags 'ching / /g.yer ka bcas pa'i rkang gdub can/ /ma lus bdud rnams 'joms
par byed/ /ral ba'i cod pan yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga yis brgyan/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /'khor lo rna cha gdu
bu dang / /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis mtshan/ /thal ba'i rdul can 'jigs par byed/ /thod pa gti mug gis brgyan pa'i/ /dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa/ /byang chub sa bon rang
bzhin no/ /gtso chen de ye shes rab ma/ /sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma/ /gcer bu mgo bo'i phreng ba spang / /rgyan med mchod phyir thogs med ma/ /bde ba kun gyi gzugs
can ma/ /phyag gnyis skra ni grol ba'o/ /he ru ka la 'khyud gnas ma/ /de ltar pha rol phyin lha mo/ /kha dog dmar mo rnam gsal ma/ /zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba/ /cung
zad mche ba gtsigs 'jigs ma/ /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM thod pa'o/ /rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya/ /de yis bskul
ba tsam gyis ni/ /rtsa ba 'khor lo'i rang bzhin las/ /'dzag 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog /mchod pa sna tshogs
'dzin pa yis/ /mgon po he ru ka mched do/ /rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa/ /rdo rje mche ba ma yis ni/ /thod pa khrag gis bkang bzung ste/ /gzi brjid chen po gsol bar mdzad//
rdo rje pho nya bdag nyid che/ /dbang ldan du ni cang te'u brdung / /rdo rje gdong ma dri snod dang / /me yis phyogs su rnam par gnas/ /rdo rje can ma grags chen mo/ /mchod yon snod bcas/
@#/ /bden bral na/ /rdo rje gtsigs ma lho yi ni/ /phyag na rnga bo che 'dzin gsungs/ /rlung du rdo rje lte ba ma/ /ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no/ /nub tu rdo rje 'jigs ma
ni| |lce spyang phyag na 'dzin par gsungs/ /byang du 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lha mo'i chags pas gtso bo mchod/ /de ltar he ru ka bsams nas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis
mchod/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang / /dri zhim lnga dang me tog spos/ /'di dag gis ni gtso bo mchod/ /mchod yon zhal
bsil de bzhin khrus/ /glu yi mchog ni rnam mang pos/ /mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyid che/ /'di dag gis ni mchod par bya/ /dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /rtsa yi
'khor lo las ni 'dzag /'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma/ /rnam par brtse ba cher ldan pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs//
sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs/ /gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan/ /lo ni bcu dang gnyis lo par/ /phyag g.yas byang chub sems bkang ba'i/ /bum pa a mra'i lcug
bcas bsnams/ /zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig /rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra/ /mgon pos mdun du bltas nas ni/ /dbang bskur
mchog ste gsol ba gdab/ /brtse dang ldan pa'i grags chen mo/ /'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ /dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mas khrus shig /dper na bu cha
med pa'i khyim/ /shi ba tsam gyis stong pa nyid/ /de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /ye shes kun gyis stongs pa nyid/ /dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs/ /rgyud dang bral na rdung mi rung / /de
bzhin dbang dang bral na ni/ /sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par/ /bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /
slob mar bcas te dmyal par 'gro /de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor pas/ /slar yang bdag la dbang bskur cig /yang dang yang du phyag btsal te/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba gdab/ /
gal te dbang bskur med na ni/ /he ru ka yi bdag gyur cig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /rgyal gyur rgyal gyur zhes smra zhing / /bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo/ /phyi
nang gsang bar bcas pa yi/ /dbang bskur tsam gyis nam mkha' yi/ /dkyil nas rnga yi sgra grags cing / /me tog tsan+dan char 'bab 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams/ /
rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la ni thim/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ lha bskyed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i
@#/ /le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol
to| |ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams/ /'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal 'byor
ma sna tshogs sde ma la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nor rgyas la sogs bdag nyid che/ /klu rnams ci'i phyir dgugs pa lags/ /rnal 'byor chen po bdag la gsungs/ /de
nas sna tshogs sde ma'i snying gi 'od zer gyis klu thams cad kyi snying ga dang / spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/ tshim par byas nas slar log go /de nas klu de rnams thams
cad kyis phyag btsal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha mo bka' ni ci zhig gsol/ /kye lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ /gsungs pa/ mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sngags//
ye shes las byung ji lta bu/ /dus su zin pa ji ltar yin/ /ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sprul gyis zin pa tsam gyis ni/ /slar yang sems can 'chi 'gyur zhing / /zhus
pa| khyab 'jug dbang phyug sogs lha dang / /tshangs pa tshangs pa mdun na 'don/ /de rnams la ni 'chi 'pho mchis/ /dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur/ /de ltar
dus su zin ces smra/ /sbrul gyi dug ni sel ba med/ /de bzhin sbrul la dug ni yod/ /sbrul zin 'tsho 'am mi 'tsho ba/ /bde byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che'i/ /lha de rnams ni de
ltar smra/ /ston pa stong nyid nges gsungs pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /sbrul gyi dug ni ji ltar yod/ /gang gis 'dzin
cing gang zhig 'dzin/ /dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu/ /gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin/ /sems can dug zin mi 'chi ba/ /stong nyid smra ba'i
nges pa yin/ /'dod chags gti mug stong pa nyid/ /grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid/ /yul gyi rang bzhin dri ma med/ /dri ma dang bral ji ltar dug /sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig
byed| |tha mal pa yi yul ni sbrul/ /yul gyi nyes pa dug nyid do/ /lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs/ /thams cad dus su zin pa yin/ /yul gyi nyes pa sbyangs pa
nyid| |ston pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya/ /ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang / /sangs rgyas
khrod pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /'dir ni klu rnams thams cad lhags/ /de phyir rab nges lha mo kye/ /dus zin the tshom med pa ru/ /blo med mu stegs can de smra/ /'di ltar smras
@#/ /te klu rnams kyis/ /sna tshogs sde la phyag btsal te/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dong / /de nas bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags
gsungs pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig /'jig rten mtha' dag rdzun gyis bcings//
kye lags bshes mo 'di ltar ltos/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol
to| |ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /lha mo yis ni bshad du gsol/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /de ru bdag la ltad mo mchis/ /gsungs pa/ dkyil
'khor med par sbyin mi bya/ /slob ma bsdu bar mi bya'o/ /gtso bos ji ltar gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya/ /mtho lnga pa yis bzung ste/ /khor yug
tu ni gru bzhi'o/ /de yi phyed kyi zlum po la/ /brgyad las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ /oM hUM hrIHhUM khaM hUM a hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya a d+d+hiSh+Tha yed/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags
so| |badzra he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hri sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA pra b+haM dza ha hUM ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i dus su gtor ma btang ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

a d+hi Sh+Tha na i dam sU tra tiSh+ThA mA tsa la he he bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra he ru ka hUM hUM Tha Tha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du srad bu la mngon par sngags par bya'o/ /thig skud kyi sngags so/ /gru bzhi
pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha khyer snam bu spangs pa la/ /ba dan rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdul tshon gzhan
dang 'dres med pa'i/ /rdul tshon dmar por rdzogs par bya/ /de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams/ /grwa dang grwa ru rnam par bzhag /bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/
gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang / /cang te'u gnas su rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje'i steng du 'dam skyes te/ /de ltar bum par bris byas nas/ /chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya/ /bum pa la ni ras
kyis brgyan/ /rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing / /bum par kun nas 'bru lnga dang / /a mra'i lcug mas dgab par bya/ /de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo chen
gyis| |sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste/ /nyi ma'i steng du hUM yig bsam/ /hUM gyur pa las rdo rje ni/ /sngon po hUM gi bdag nyid skyes/ /hUM dang rdo
rje byung dpa' bo/ /he ru ka ni bdag nyid che/ /sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa/ /gtso bo chen po zhal gcig pa/ /g.yas na gri gug thod pa ste/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM rdo rje'o/ /sku la
@#/ /mi yi rus pas brgyan/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa po/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /gcer bu 'jigs byed rang bzhin te/ /zhal gyi
mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /dbu skra ser zhing gyen du 'bar/ /thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa/ /sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed/ /dpa' bo de ltar bsam par bya/ /phyis
ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /oM dang hUM dang khaM dang swa/ /yi ge yongs su gyur pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma/ /sa 'og gnas ma
rab bzang ma/ /lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo/ /grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs/ /g.yon brkyang pa yis zhabs kyis bzhugs//
g.yas na gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM cang te'u/ /rus rgyan lha mo kun 'jigs ma/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /
skra ni ser po gyen du 'bar/ /thod pa'i phreng bas spyi bo brgyan/ /de rnams mgo rgyus phreng ba can/ /lha mo'i 'od zer spros gyur pas/ /klu rnams skrag par mdzad ma mo/ /phyogs
kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o/ /blo ldan mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la/ /nyi ma bzhi la hUM yig bzhi/ /hUM yig so sor gyur pa las/ /chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung por/ /
bzhin bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab mar gnas lha mo/ /kha dog ser mo grags chen mo/ /thams cad na bza' ser po mnabs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs
kyis gnas/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /klu brgyad rgyan byas lha mo ni/ /g.yas na gri gug cang te'u 'dzin/ /g.yen na kha T+wAM thod pa'o/ /sku las 'od zer ser po 'phro/ /shin
tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thams cad gar byed skra ser ma/ /klu rnams skrag pa skyed byed ma/ /mtshams gyi cha ru rnam par gnas/ /
de nas bsam par bya ba ni/ /slob dpon he ru kas rang gi lus las skyes pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par
byas nas slar log ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor brgyad lhan cig
tu bkrus so/ /bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du gyur to/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /phyis ni
gtor ma btang bar bya/ /khyad par du ni 'o ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pa'i/ /shes rab can gyis chang btung zhing / /mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya/ /'bras bu
@#/ /bzhi yang dbul bya zhing / /de nas slob ma blo chen gyis/ /ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya/ /der ni gdan yang bstab par bya/ /slob dpon bdag
nyid chen po yis/ /de ru rnal 'byor ma mchod do/ /blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshim bya/ /mgu bar sems
pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'khor lo khyad par che bya ste/ /phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag /phyi rol sa ru byung nas ni/ /bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te/ /slob mas maN+Dal gsum
byas la/ /bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod/ /zhabs la sbyi gtugs 'di skad gsol/ /ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kye/ /sems can don la gcig brtson pa/ /nam mkha'
lding bzang sbyor ba dang / /sha ri ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal/ /dus su zin pa bzlog pa yi/ /sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /ston pa
chen pos de dag gsungs/ /bdag gi the tshom bzlog pa dang / /sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyu ba dang / /yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi/ /dug
rnams dug med par bgyi zhing / /sems can thams cad 'tsho bgyi ba/ /bla ma chen po de dag gsungs/ /de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i thugs
kyis ni/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi/ /slob ma la ni so shing sbyin/ /so shing sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /oM hUM he b+ha ga ba ti mu khaM pa ri shud+d+haM ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par
sngags byas la/ /so brud nas ni kha bshal te/ /slob ma lhag par gnas par bya/ /rang gi lag pa byug bya zhing / /me tog gis kyang bkri par bya/ /mgrin pa lag par zla ba bsam//
zla ba'i zer gyi phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kun zla bar blta/ /grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing / /zla ba zhu bar gdon mi za/ /slob
dpon bsgoms pa'i nus pa yis/ /slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/ /lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+hiSh+ThA na/ yan+tu ma tsa la ma

tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tra pa tra pa/ b+ho b+ha ga bAM ta sarba bud+d+ha ka pA li badzra s+ya ka taM ma la ya shI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM ha ha/ sngags 'di lan bdun du
bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis de'i lus la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul
chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum pa'ang 'dor ro/ /nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ /lhag
@#/ /par gnas pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na/ /mkha' lding rtog pa'i sems can gyis/ /bdag ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de
ma thag tu slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs spos dang lha bshos dbul/ /dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni//
many+dzi'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /mchod yon gyi ni don ched du/ /bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya/ /khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba
yi| |khrag 'thung rnam pa spyan drangs te/ /dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams sa bon gyi/ /'od zer
gyi ni rnam par bsam/ /bdag nyid chen po grags chen po/ /bum pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang
ni| |slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta/ /de nas zangs ma'i snod du chu/ /blugs shing dung phor chus bkang ste/ /many+dzi'i steng du bzhag par bya'o/ /yang phyir byung nas
slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o/ /ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags
bzla'o/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM sarba yo gi ni ma ku Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha yaM tu a tsin+tu hUM swAhA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /de nas slob dpon gyis/ kye/ khyod su zhes smra'o/ /slob
mas| bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o/ /de'i rjes su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/ mig ras bsal te/ dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ /oM

he ru ka badzra puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbus su'o/ /oM tsi tra se nA puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ shar du'o/ oM kA mi nI puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ lho yi'o/ /oM pA tA la bA si ni puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/

nub tu'o/ /oM su b+ha dre puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ byang du'o/ /oM shoM Di ni puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ mer ro/ /oM bud+d+ha rnaM puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ bden bral du'o/ /oM tsa tur b+ha dra puSh+pa yaM
pra tIts+tsha hUM/ rlung du'o/ /oM A kA sha bA se ni puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbang ldan du'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du
slob ma la bstan par bya'o/ /yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o/ /de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyobs/ dug skyug par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa dang /
g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang sbyar ba dang / nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mda' dug dang / byug pa'i dug dang / dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba
@#/ /dang / bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de rnams nye bar 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu yis zin pa yang / /de ru de ni nges par 'gro/ /gzhan
yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung / /chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na dung gi chu/ /'di ru btung bar the tshom med/ /de nas slob
ma dri bar bya/ /'dir ni sha li kar byed cing / /mkha' lding shes pa'i slob dpon 'gyur/ /bsam pa rnam par dag shes nas/ /phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya/ /stong
ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sngags kyi man dag sbyin/ /ji srid sbrul gyis zin dus dang / /ji srid mkha' lding rigs yod par/ /de srid de dang de las kyang / /
ji srid dus su zin med par/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min/ /dus zin 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste/ /nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya/ /dus su
zin no zhes smra ba/ /de srid rnal 'byor che 'di zhes/ /de ru las ni brtsam par bya/ /bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang dag ldan/ /blo ldan sngon
gsungs gsang sngags kyis/ /phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /de rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /gnas dgu ru ni mchod
par bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes/ /mnyan par gzhag pas las rnams brtsam/ /gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod/ /de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro/ /klu rnams kyi ni
snying bskams pa/ /ci zhig bgyi 'o zhes ni smra/ /gsungs pa/ lha mo sna tshogs sde ma yis/ /sangs rgyas thod par sngon du gsungs/ /kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu/ /song ste 'di dus
zin gyur pa'i/ /dus zin 'dzin pa bzung ba med/ /dug med sbrul yang med pa'o/ /gang phyir dogs pas rmongs gyur pa/ /de phyir skye bo rnams 'chir 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer slar
log ste/ /snying ga ru ni thim par 'gyur/ /yang na sems ni mnyam gzhag pa'i/ /slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar bstan/ /de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i lci ba blangs te 'dab chags ri
skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar po byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la gzhag par bya'o/ /ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la snag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas dben par

sngags bri bar bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hri tad Tha ba ya b+ho sha li ka na a na ya nA bud+d+ha ka pA la badzra s+ya A dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya hUM hUM sa raM tu sarba da DI ka pha ti ka tse te/ maM d+ha g+hi di sarba dzi i

na su naM ti pa ya ga re re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hi ta ya nA ga rA dza na spu taM ti murda na re re sa spya a ba sa spye ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza i tsa la ha bu la ha re re b+ha ru kri pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na u ha pu Ta Ta mu
@#/ /d+hi pra na dza i/ zhes pa ni sha li ka'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/ /sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la| /pha
dang mo ru brtag par bya/ /snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya/ /mig gi sngon du mi bzhag cing / /sha li ka bzang po sa phyogs blta/ /de nas lcug ma sngags kyis bsngags/ /oM haM ha la
khyab 'jug gi sa bon no/ /oM baM tshangs pa'i sa bon no/ /oM saM zhes bya ba ni zhi byed kyi sa bon no/ /oM ha ha ha ha ha ha haM swAhA/ mngag pa'i sngags so/ /'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog /
stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'/ /lan bdun sngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi/ /mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas
ni| |klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe/ /mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan/ /rings nas kyang ni gshog rlung gis/ /stobs po che yi klu rnams skrag /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og
dang | |gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang / /gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad/ /skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni smra/ /klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shi na/ bdag nyid chen po
sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro/ /klu dang / sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye sha li ka/ gzhan du gsung bar ma mdzad cig /de ltar thos
nas sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go/ /de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs la sha li ka mngags pa'i
sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun no/ /skad cig de nyid la de'i mig 'bye bar 'dir som nyi med do/ /dug gis zin pa 'gyel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas de'i lus la
'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing / dga' ba'i sems kyis ldang ngo / /zin pa langs pa tsam nyid na sha li kas sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar
'gyur ro/ /skad cig ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o/ /stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin/ /chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kye/ /gang gis
'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin/ /mtha' dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kye/ /dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang / dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/
zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma zhig pa de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par bya/ de ltar slob mal rjes su gnang bar byin
nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o/ /des lan brgya'am/ stong du gsol ba btab nas/ dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni AHhUM/ dug bza'
@#/ /ba'i sngags so/ /de nas gzhan yang don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi chu 'thungs pa des ni dug
med par 'gyur te/ sbrul gyis mi 'dzin no/ /gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tshom med do/ /de ltar slob ma sha li ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la bkas
gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do/ /gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i
sems kyis gang ci'ang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung ste/ gtor ma btang bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sngags
kyis gshegs su gsol te/ oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHu tiSh+Tha gats+tsha hUM/ gats+tsha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag bshad
par bya/ /chu yis sbyor ba bla med pa/ /gang gis sbyin pa tsam gyis ni/ /dug gis zin pa 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma bdun du 'chi ba dang / /gzhan yang dug gis nyams
pa rnams/ /chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /'di ru 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya/ /dung phor chu
yis bkang byas pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya/ /de nas brtse ba chen po yi/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /zla ba yi ni
khyad par bsam/ /bcu drug cha las yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /dri med dge ba'i lus can te/ /de'i dbus sa bon mi shigs dge /kha dog dkar po'i lus can no/ /lag des
snod kyi kha bcad de/ /de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /oM sarba bi Sha ha ra ha ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ sngags 'dis lan bdun gyi bar du gnas mngon par bsngags
te| mi shigs pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du thim ste chu dang / zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por 'gyur ro/ /gal te dug gis zin pa ma shi na de'i
tshe chu blud do/ /yang na shi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par lan gsum du chu rgyun mi 'chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tshom med do/ /de nas chu blud na
rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang / chu'i sbyor
ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog /rnal 'byor
@#/ /ma yi gong na med/ /gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka/ grub ma byis pa can ma dang / /de bzhin thod bzang can ma'o/ /'di dag sman ni chen po lnga/ /sangs
rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka'/ /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /bskal pa bye bar de 'tsho 'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu/ /de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum/ /grub ma zla ba
gcig tu'o/ /byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis/ /thod pa can yang zla bar te/ /tshe 'phel ba yi mchog yin no/ /bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs/ /glang po ma ni ngang pa'i gzugs//
drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te/ /sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig /kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni/ /mig las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin/ /sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma//
'di ru bstan par som nyi med/ /de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas/ /rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas/ /ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul te/ /sman de sha ri ka ru gsungs/ /me tog ldan
pa'i bu mo gang / /kha dog nag mos rab mdzes ma/ /gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus pa/ /de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung / /sman de'i ming ni grub mar bshad/ /sangs
rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bud med rab mdzes ma nyams dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi/ /de la dang por byung ba'i rdzas/ /sman
de byis pa can no zhes/ /bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs/ /lhan cig skyes dag byung ba'i rdzas/ /byang chub sems mchog chen mar khu/ /chags pa yi chu dag dang ni/ /
bsre 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /sman de'i ming ni thod can ma'o/ /zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /bya bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir/ /de lus skra

gang dang gang yang rung / /lcags dang zangs ma'i snod dag la/ /dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dngul dang gser du 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /
dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed bka' ba/ /rgyud gzhan du ni rab sbas pa/ /'bad pas de 'dir rab gsal bya/ /dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste/ /dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid/ /khrag ni mar

ya hUM phaT/ bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /sku mdog sngon po thugs 'khrugs pas/ /dgra rnams thams cad brlag par ni/ /skad cig de la the tshom med/ /phreng mdzad
'jigs shing 'jigs par byed/ /ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad/ /gdug pa thams cad gsad par ni/ /sbyin sreg tsam gyis the tshom med/ /'di lta'i gsad
pa'i sbyin sreg dang / /mngon spyod kyang ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor lha mos rtogs min na/ /sngags skyes phal lta smos ci dgos/ /de phyir sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /rnal
'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems/ /lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ /ljang gu'i chu yis me zhi bya/ /gang gis bsregs shing
gang zhig bsregs/ /gang gi zhi ba gang zhi ba/ /gang gis rnam rtog kun bcom pa/ /de yis sems ni mgu bar byed/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i
rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /spyod pa'i
@#/ /le'u shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /bud med shin tu mchog gyur dang / /rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed/ /dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de
nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam/ /sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod/ /de de'i dngos grub rtag tu ster/ /lag pas thod pa bzung byas te/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/ /
brtul zhugs can gyi spyod pas 'khyam/ /gang du gang tshe de tshe der/ /rtag tu spyod pa thams cad bya/ /rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing / /nam mkha' dang mtshungs
gyur pa yi/ /shes rab can gyis khyim khyim du/ /slong mo bya bar the tshom med/ /yid dang mthun par kun blangs na/ /bsam gtan gnas su the tshom med/ /dga'
ba'i sems kyis bsams nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi slong mo bslangs/ /chos la gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thod pa'i steng du bzhag pa yi/ /rdzas ni de nas
bza' bar bya/ /rdzas ni zos ma thag tu yang / /khyim khyim thal phung shing drung dang / /gang du gang tshe der de'i tshe'i/ /gang gis dga' ba'i sems de yis/ /blo gros
chen po gnyid log phreng / /'di lta'i spyod pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag rgya chen po nges par thob/ /de ltar yang ni rgyud las gsungs/ /gang du ji ltar der de ltar/ /gang
gis de yis sangs rgyas te/ /rang gi rnam rtog dag gis nyams/ /mtha' dag rang bzhin rnam par dag /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang
ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /gcig tu sems can don rab nges/ /gser du nges
par byed pa'i le'u/ /slob dpon la ni rab dang bas/ /mu tig dang ni nya phyis dang / /dngul chu dang ni byu ru yis/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /'di ni phyi yi sman
min te/ /shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing / /dngul chu bcud len ma yin te/ /mu zi lhang tsher ma yin zhing / /lcags dang zha nye zangs ma min/ /lcags gzhan dag ni ma
yin te/ /grub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no/ /'di lta bu yi tshig thos nas/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po ches/ /zhabs kyi rdul gyi cha btud nas/ /sems dpa' gcig tu dad
brtan pas/ /lha mo legs so zhes ni smras/ /sman gyi mchog ni gang yin zhing / /dngos grub kyang ni ji lta bu/ /gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis
gsungs/ /grub pa'i sman gyi mchog gang lags/ /gang gis sems can nor ldan 'gyur/ /che 'phel ba la brtson ba gang / /sngon bsnyen ltos pa med pa yis/ /sman chen
@#/ /grags pas 'grub pa gang / /gang gis rdzas rnams mang por 'gyur/ /mo gsham bu dang ldan gyur gang / /yang dang yang du mi 'chi zhing / /shi
nas yang dag 'tshor 'gyur ba/ /lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /bka' stsal pa/ khyim 'di nyid du gnas pa yi/ /sman chen po yis 'grub pa ste/ /de yang snod bzang
mchog la 'grub/ /byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so/ /bdag don gcig pu la 'bab cing / /kye ma gcig tu dka' 'bad pas/ /ji ltar sems can don 'grub 'gyur/ /snod
bzang la ni gnas pa'i bcud/ /ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul te/ /ro bcud rtsa yi nang gnas pa'i/ /sman chen ro bcud ma ru brjod/ /gang gi sa lcags ni gser
'gyur ba/ /gcig gis kyang ni grangs med 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi sman chen mchog /ro bcud ma ni de bzhin gnas/ /rab 'byor cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /sman gyi
mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /der ni yang dag sbyor ba bshad/ /dad pa brtan pa yis ni nyon/ /me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang / /gzhon nu kha dog nag mo ste/ /rgyud
'di thos pa dang ldan zhing / /ngo tsha med cing ltos med ma/ /'dod pa chung zhing sems can brtse/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams brtan cing / /rtag tu rab sbas btsog
med ma/ /'di lta'i bud med rab blangs te/ /sman chen mchog ni yang dag brtsam/ /skyes bu shin tu chags che zhing / /myur du byang chub sems 'bab pa/ /gang yin de la
dngos grub med/ /'di lta bu yi sman chen po/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang rab rnyed dka'/ /shin tu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /blo ldan bud med de rnams brten/ /de ltar yang zhes
gsungs pa/ rab tu brtan pa gtso bo'i gnas/ /zhes ni sgrub pa po rnams smra/ /de phyir brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /snod bzang 'bras bu bskul bar bya/ /der ni me tog
ldan bud med/ /gser gyi sbyor ba rnyed dka' brtsam/ /grub pa'i bcud kyis byugs pa yi/ /zla ba rang gi snying gar bsam/ /sngon du ri yi rgyal pos brgyan/ /der
ni yi ge hrIHsa bon/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad/ /blo ldan dgos pa yang dag brtsam/ /zangs ma'i dngos po srang gcig bcas/ /zlum po snod bzang la bcug
ste| |g.yon pa bskum pa'i g.yas zur bzhag /med na lcags kyang bya ba yin/ /brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas blo ldan las rnams brtsam/ /ri rab
zla ba sa bon rgyal/ /zhu 'gyur the tshom med pa yin/ /snod bzang der ni ngal bsos pas/ /'pho ba'i sbyor bas 'dzag pa nyid/ /bzang por myur du rab blangs te/ /mkhas
@#/ /pa yis ni byug par bya/ /rdog po byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /me yi nang du gzhug bya zhing / /de nas shes rab can bltas na/ /gser du 'gyur bar
the tshom med/ /de ni ma sha gcig gis ni/ /srang brgya ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar gser gyi sbyor ba mchog /'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gal te
sman chen tshad min na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas tshad ma yin/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir/ /dngos po gang dang gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /
de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di tshad min smra ba'i/ /blo gros chen po thos ldan pa/ /ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar/ /de dag thams cad
dmyal bar 'gro/ /sman 'di tsam gyis ma grub na/ /chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /bla med rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /de dag thams cad rdzun par 'gyur/ /mtshams
med lnga ni byed pa dang / /sems can sangs rgyas chos la 'tshe/ /sman gyi mchog ni 'grub 'gyur ba/ /skad cig de la the tshom med/ /sems can don la gcig tu 'bad//
sgom ldan 'grub pa lta ci smos/ /dman mchog gser dang dngul du 'gyur/ /ji srid sangs rgyas ye shes yod/ /mi ni bskal ba bye bar 'tsho/ /de nas yang dag
rab bshad pa/ /mo gsham rnams kyi bu med pa/ /yang dag sbyor bas bkrus tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la bu ldan 'gyur/ /sngon gyi gtso bo sa ji skad gsungs/ /khrus kyi cho ga
rab tu bshad/ /kha dog lnga yi rdul tshon nam/ /yang na rdul tshon dkar po yis/ /dpag dka' skrag par byed pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /der ni bum
pa lto che ba/ /zlum po bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /shes rab can gyis chu yis dgang / /ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/ /rang gi khrag gis mchan ma bri/ /bud med mo gsham de yi
ni| |khams kyi gtso bo blangs nas ni/ /mkhas pas bum pa'i kha la byug /de nas khrag 'thung go 'phang la/ /gnas bsgom pa'i mchog ldan pas/ /nag po dmar mo 'jigs
chen po/ /rdo rje hUM las yang dag byung / /'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs byed pa/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /bla ma 'jigs pa'i gar byed cing / /mkhas pas hUM ni
sgrogs bzhin pa/ /blo ldan bum pa'i nang du bsam/ /de nas ral gri 'dzin pa yi/ /skyes pa bzhi po grags chen po/ /khro bo gzhan gyi sems dang ldan/ /'jigs chen
bu de rnams kyis/ /ral gris nam mkha' bsnun cing gsod/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba dang / /'di lta bu yi sbyor ldan pas/ /de bzhin du ni bud med bkru/ /skad
@#/ /cig de la bkrus tsam gyis/ /bud med bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin
tu gsang ba las/ sman chen po khyad par can dang / mo gsham gyi khrus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /mkha' lding
sbyor las byung ba'i le'u/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /blo ldan he ru ka dang ni/ /kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed/ /
mtshan ma phyag sogs sngon gsung bzhin/ /kha dog dkar po 'ba' zhig nyid/ /phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma dkar zhing / /mtshams kyi dmar po nyid yin no/ /sngon du
gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs/ /bum pa rnam pa bzhi po la/ /sngon gsungs phyag mtshan bri bar bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i
sbyor ba yis/ /phyis ni slob ma rjes su bzung / /sngon gyi cho gas gsol btab ste/ /sbyin dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /de nas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /slar yang
gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /slob ma rjes su gzung bar bya/ /sa steng na ni dus zin la/ /cung zad gso bar mi nus te/ /nam mkha' lding can gyis btang zhing / /dus su
zin ces smra ba na/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /blo ldan de nas las brtsam mo/ /bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing / /kun nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad de/ /de kun sku ni
dkar po ru/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'bras brtags rang bzhin blangs nas ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis bya'o/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ /de yi lag par
ral gri sbyin/ /de yi snying gar sngags bris gzhug /'dab ma gang dang gang de la/ /mar khu che byas snag tsha dang / /mkhas pas sngags ni bri bar bya/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIH

oM ka pA li ni badzri Ni aHbi d+h+waM sa ya sarba nA ga na u da pa ya d+ya d+ha ra Ni/ bi b+ha ba ya ka la da sha na/ b+ho b+ho b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+ha ka pA li nI sarba na Na k+Sha ye ka ri ha ha ha swAhA/ rig pa
'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /'dab ma snying gar gzhug par bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dang lcug ma yis/ /lan bdun par du spyan drang ngo / /oM
bud+d+ha ka pA li ni g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ hri hriHhaHhaHhe heHhaM/ lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis/ /bar snang du ni lding 'gyur te//
gcig ni dum bu dum bu ru/ /sa la ltung ba ru ni 'gyur/ /dus zin 'dir langs the tshom med/ /gzhan yang sbyor ba rnyed dka' gang / /pad btegs la sogs bco lnga
@#/ /po| |glegs bam la ni bri ma byas/ /bla ma'i drin las shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang
ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba'i man ngag nges pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs
sde ma la yang dang yang du phyag btsal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtsor gyur pa/ /shes rab chen po lha mo legs/ /khyod kyis gsungs pa'i sbyor ba
gang | |'jig rten na yang rnyed par dka'/ /bdag gis rgyud kun mthong mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'di dag rnyed par dka'/ /rgyud 'dir khyod kyis gang gsungs pa/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis ma bshad do/ /e ma'o sems can don la brtson/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas kun bskyed ma/ /e ma'o phyag rgya che la brtson/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab
sbyor ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka' gang yin des/ /rnal 'byor pa gang ngo mtshar ba/ /sna tshogs byed 'gyur lha mo gsungs/ /dang po'i le'ur gang gang gsungs/ /sbyor
te lha mos bdag la shod/ /'di lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs sde/ /bzhad cing shin tu bzhad pa yis/ /lha rnams thams cad skrag pa
dang / /bdud sde thams cad 'bros pa dang / /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bzhad pa'i nges pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i mchog kun ngo mtshar ro/ /gsungs
pa| rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba blang byas la/ /de yi sha yang blang bya zhing / /de yi rked cha'i rus pa ni/ /blangs nas thab khung du ni bya/ /de yi thod pa'i rjes bzung ste/ /rgyus pa sdong bur
byas te bzhag/ de yi mar khus dgang bya zhing / /thab khung gru gsum steng du bzhag /gzhan yang dud pa 'bebs pa dang / /ji srid dud pa chags kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas thod

pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzla bar bya/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA la ni b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra d+ha d+ha ra/ d+ha rA pa ya d+ha rA pa ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya/ trAM

trAM/ aM maM saM ra d+hAM ku ru ku ru b+ho b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+ha ka pA la s+ya dz+nyA ma laM g+ha ya shI g+h+raM ka dza la pa taM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ trAM trAM a hUM stam+b+ha ya/ b+ho b+ha ga ba ti hUM saM phaT/ 'di ltar sngags
kyi rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten gsum yang skems par byed/ 'byung po ro langs mkha' 'gro ma/ /srin po sha za la sogs dang / /gzhan yang rung ste bgegs de rnams/ /
thos pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur/ /ji srid dud pa ma babs pa/ /de srid sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /dud pa babs ma thag tu ni/ /lag pa gnyis kas gzung bar bya/ /de
@#/ /nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas/ /rol rtsed phreng ba btung bar bya/ /bu mo lo ni bcu drug ma/ /lang tsho'i gzugs la brtse ba can/ /'di ni rnal 'byor
pa yis spyad/ /gcig tu sems can don 'bad pa/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yi/ /mkhas pas hi hi'i sngags bton te/ /rol rtsed phreng ma btung bar bya/ /de yi rjes la
rtsed 'jo brtsam/ /shin tu bzhad gyur phreng mdzad pa'i/ /brtse pa chen po'i lag g.yon du/ /dung chen mchog ni bzhag par bya/ /sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis/ /phyis ni
bags kyis bya ba bya/ /pad+ma las byung rdzas gang zhig /de nyid kyis ni dud pa mnye/ /ming med mthe bos me tog sbyin/ /ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya/ /ril bu re re re re la/ /
gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni traM hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing / /rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor mas kyang
rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sngags 'di yis ni dud pa sgrub/ /srin lag gi ni sor mo yis/ /mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis/ /stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad cu yi/ /steng dang 'og ni mthong bar gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la rnal mar
'gyur/ /mdzub mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te/ /'byung po yi dwags sha za dang / /gzhan yang grub ba rnams dang ni/ /dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag gi/
steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis/ /rnal mar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /gung mos byug pa tsam gyis ni/ /shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te//
pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra tshad du/ /nag po 'bar byed rtse mo yis/ /sprin rnams thams cad 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i dud pa rnyed par dka'/ /lag pa g.yon pas mnyes
tsam gyis/ /skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur/ /mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen pos byugs tsam gyis/ /gzugs brnyan mtshan ma ri dang shing / /gzhan dag gang yang
rung ba rnams/ /khro ba'i blta bas bltas tsam gyis/ /dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mthe'u chung gis
mig byugs na/ /skad cig de la mi snang 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/ /skad cig sum cu gsum du 'khor/ /mdzod dang bud med rdzas nyid dang / /dngos
po gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis/ /skad cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi /sbyor ba sna tshogs legs par bshad/ /de
@#/ /ni mig la byugs tsam gyis/ /rang gi gzugs ni sgyur bar byed/ /dud pa yi ni byugs tsam gyis/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /bya rog
'ug pa bya rgod dang / /sbrul dang khyi dang lce spyang dang / /stag dang gung dang byi la dang / /sbrang bu glang po bong bu ru/ /de ltar dud pa chen po yis/ /sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o//
kun la las kun yod mod kyi/ /sbyor ba 'ba' zhig rnyed par dka'/ /sbyor ba glegs bam la ma bris/ /bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad
de| |sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /sngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do/ /glang po'i rus pas bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li
nI hrIHhUM/ rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI khaM hrIHhUM phaT/ ba lang gi rus pas dgra'i snying gar phur bu gdab par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha
ka pA li nI traM hrIHkhyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a AHhUM phaT/ rus pa chen pos ni dgugs par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li

pas dbye bar bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hAHphaT hUM/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri Ni traM/ ce spyang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar

med kyi/ /'on kyang rnam par rtog pas bzung / /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags sna tshogs
@#/ /kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'/ /ne ne mo dang

mo yi| |bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs/ /blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad/ /de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /ma dag pa yi sems
