mchog lha mo/ /phyag rgya chen por rab ster ma'o/ /gti mug gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur/ /zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no/ /'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te/ /
nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no/ /phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o// lnga po de rnams bud med mchog /gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste/ /sgra las zhe sdang skye ba yin/ /dri la
longs spyod pas 'dod chags/ /ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te/ /reg bya las ni phrag dog skyes/ /sems kyi dag pa nyid yin no/ /de phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis/ /
shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis mi/ /skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang / /skye gzhan srid par dngos grub 'thob/ /ji ltar dngos po med par sgom/ /ji ltar dngos po bsgom par
bya| |dngos po bsgom bya ji ltar 'gyur/ /sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/ /dkar mo ljang gu'i sngon mo'i mdog/ 'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan par ni/ /dag pa'i sems
kyis blta mi bya/ /tsha mos ji ltar sgra thos pa'i/ /sgra grags pa ni rnam gsum nyid/ /'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni/ /dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya/ /rab sbas skyed ma
gang yin des/ /dri ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa/ /lta min yid dang ldan pa la/ /ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/ /lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas/ /ro drug myangs pa
ci 'dra ba/ /myangs pas longs spyod ldan pa yi/ /myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /yid kyis longs spyod dga' de nyid/ /yid kyis gnyis ka spyad pas bde/ /der ni rtag
pa yod ma yin/ /dngos po las ni dngos med yod/ /dngos med la yang dngos po nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga stong / /'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid/ /de nas
gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro/ /lta dang ldan pa snying rje ste/ /'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o/ /drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni/ /dga' ba
@#/ /yan lag ma yi mchog /gnyis ka 'dus las gang 'dzag pa/ /de ni bdag gis btang snyoms gsungs/ /de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa/ /ji
ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur/ /mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye/ /'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad tsam/ /drud pa las ni dga' ba skyes/ /kun gyi mtha'
mar dga' bral lo/ /de ltar dga' dang dga' bral 'bras/ /khams gsum pa las skye bar 'gyur/ /rab dga' sems kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po gsum gyis
'ching mi 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba gang ci'ang rung / /bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams/ /de kun bshang dang gci sogs su/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag/
gang ci rung ba'i dga' rtse 'jo/ /'khyud pa dang ni 'o byed dang / /nyed dang 'tshir ba nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di lta'i sgom dang ldan
pas ni/ /'di ru 'grub par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs rgyas kyi/ /dpal dang phyag rgya che ster byed/ /rnal 'byor pa yis de mchod na/ /'dod pa rnams
kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang / /de la nyes pas gnod pa med/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid/ /srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /
ji srid khams ni phyi mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzag med pa/ /gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing / /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya
ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sems rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag rab
bshad pa/ /sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u/ de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal
'byor ma rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs sde ma la btud de bstod pa/ e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma/ /
dpal dang grags pa che zhing 'jigs/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad ma/ /lha mo snying rje che ldan ma/ /phyag rgya chen po blo chen ma/ /don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma/ /sangs
rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud/ /rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing / /byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa/ /gsungs gcig gis ni
gsal mdzad de/ /de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs/ /e ma'o gnod chen lha mo khyod/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa/ /rnyed
@#/ /dka'i dngos grub gang yin pa/ /de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod/ /gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon/ /byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad dang / /'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa nyon/ /klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon/ /rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags
tsam gyis/ /bsod nams gang yin de kun gyi/ /bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul/ /sngags
don zab mo rnams dang ni/ /sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod/ /shin tu sbas pa'i yul de yang / /sems can don du
gsal byas pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa stobs po che/ /gal te dngos grub mchog
'dod na/ /sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla/ /oM hrIHbud+d+ha hUM ka pA li mI AH'jug pa la oM/ 'byung ba la hrIHgnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hUM/ nub pa la ka pA
li nI| ldang ba la AH'o/ /de ltar bzlas pa rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud zla/ /de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas/ /dngos grub thob par the tshom
med| |oM bud+d+ha ka pA la nI AHhrIHheHhUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badzri Ni ho hUM/ a dur lak+She hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de nas yang dag
rab bshad pa/ /dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du/ /slob ma dad brtan gang zhig gis/ /shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab/ /dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis/ /maN+Dal rnam pa lnga
byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis brgyan byas pa/ /lha mo che la gsol ba gdab/ /zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab/ /rdzas de rnams ni gsol pa dang / /yid ni tshim
zhing thugs dgyes so/ /lha mo dgyes par mthong nas ni/ /tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed/ /rnam par rtog pa mang po yis/ /g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan
pa| |'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag /mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod/ /grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi/ /lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod/ /der ni rgyan rnams thams
cad dang / /lhab lhub rgyan rnams dbul bar bya/ /dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya/ /sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung / /de
yi mdun du dbul bar bya/ /gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ /'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /gzhan yang dngos
@#/ /grub gtso bo dang / /snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig /mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs/ /gang du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ /bdag rtog rang
bzhin nyams pa ste/ /kye de lhan cig skyes dgar gyur/ /bla ma'i zhal snga gsal bar zhus/ /gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dpa' bo dang / /yul mnyam nub gyur de la phyag
'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi snying sbas su sad pa/ /phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na
med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu
bzhi pa'o// //'di gsungs nas sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams rang rang gi gnas na 'dug ste/ ci'ang mi gsung par bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma chen mos gsungs pa mchog tu
gsang ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gyi dzo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
pa|| ||rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag
'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los bsgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha'
'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing / /'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa/ /de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i
dbang phyug ma rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig gis ni kun khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga / /lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing / /
tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che/ /de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang phyug che/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo/ /'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad
ma| |gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas/ /'jig rten gsum po yang spro'o/ /gsang ba pa rnams 'di yi ni/ /sgyu
ma'i bdag nyid ces rnam grangs/ /'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste/ /'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa
@#/ /nyid| |lha dang nor bdag dri za dang / /gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas/ /rig pa 'dzin dang gang yang rung / /mi 'am ci dang lto phye che/ /srin po dang ni sha
za rnams/ /sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbang du 'du 'gyur 'byung po rnams/ /chu las skyes dang thang las skyes/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod
nas dag cing rnyog pa med/ /thabs brjod pa yis de las ni/ /rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus
kun| |ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su/ /lha mchog lha skyes bu mo spyod/ /rnal 'byor dbang
phyug byed rig pa/ /de bzhin du ni mig 'phrul byed/ /rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang / /bskrang dang gsad pa la sogs pa/ /dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang / /nam mkhar
'gro ba nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan gyi grong sogs bya ba dang / /mi snang ba dang gang yang rung / /zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang / /de bzhin sa 'og 'gro ba'o/ /rig 'dzin 'khor
los bsgyur nyid 'gyur/ /'chi ba med cing rgas pa med/ /rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di/ /'di yis na ba med par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su/ /
rnal 'byor pas ni rnam rol byed/ /bklags pa dang ni bsam pa yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams/ /bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste/ /rig pa'i dngos grub byed
par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs med cing dka' thub med/ /dka' spyod bsnyung ba sdom med par/ /rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis/ /rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub/ /
lte ba'i dbus gnas dpa' bo ste/ /ge ser gsang ba'i spyod yul la/ /sems dang sems med sems kyi gzugs/ /ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag /de ni bdag
gis bshad bya ste/ /zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /ri mo de la sbyar bar bya/ /ri mo steng du 'bar ba'i mthar/ /'og tu 'bab par byed
pa'o| |khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste/ /bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i gzugs las so/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni/ /de de'i rang bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /mchog tu phan
pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'bab/ /dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub dang / /ril bu chen po'i sgrub pa yang / /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rab sbyor
pa'i| |sdom pa'i sbyor bar byed par 'gyur/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas/ /sgrub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu
@#/ /rtag pa'o/ /gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur/ /de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /lha mo bden par nga smra'o/ /
sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas/ /'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni/ /bzang po'i yi ge'i phreng ba rnams/ /gang zhig bsams pa
tsam gyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o/ /'dod pas kun la nyer spyod pa/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin brten byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor
ma rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su ni/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur//
bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don byed pa'o/ /khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni/ /gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid/ /sha chen po ni bkug nas su/ /
rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig spyod/ /tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po dang / /gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur/ /lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /nyin re zla ba 'thung
ba'o| |de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas/ /blta bas mi ngoms lus dang ni/ /cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed/ /yid la bsam ma
thag tu ni/ /rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing / /bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che/ /rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na/ /nga yi rig
dang mnyam pa med/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las/ /dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan
pa ste le'u dang po'o// //de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang
po bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur pa/ /dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /rtag tu dbugs ni btang bar bya/ /brgyad
po'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /u dang thig ler bcas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'o/ /de la brtul zhugs ma
bshad do/ /phreng ba sngags dang gzung ba dang / /sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams kyang / /gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ /
sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste/ /ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni/ /rdo
@#/ /rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang / /zla ba gcig gis de 'grub 'gyur/ /dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan/ /dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste/ /rang
gi rig pa rab sbyar na/ /des 'di mod la 'gug par 'gyur/ /yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /bsam zhing rnam par sgom byas na/ /sa gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /de dag thams
cad dbang du 'gyur/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang / /de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug /ye shes yi ges bskul byas nas/ /de dag chung mar bcas te
'gugs/ /yi ge a dang yang dag ldan/ /sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum sgom byas na/ /gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge khe
dang yang dag ldan/ /sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ /lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag /khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis/ /kha dog
ser po kun tu 'od/ /rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas na/ /chab 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /yi ge ra dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /phyag bzhi pa dang
zhal bzhi pa/ /lce sbyang tshul du legs gnas pa/ /khro bo'i sems kyis bsgom byas nas/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o/ /yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gnas
drug tu ni nges sbyar bya/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang / /de bzhin sna dang yid kyi nyid dag /seng ge
rnal 'byor phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su/ /bsgom na skad cig de la 'bar/ /'og min srid pa'i mthar thug par/ /
rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun/ /thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang / /de ni rtogs pa ma yin no/ /gal te thams cad rab rtogs na/ /'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig /
de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing / /mi gsal yi ge med pa'o/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor gnyid dang yang dag ldan/ /gong bur song ba'i
yid de yid/ /gzugs gcig tu ni sgom par byed/ /sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba/ /rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la/ /rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pa'i/ /rnam par
mi rtog pa yis bza'/ /mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/ /kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen mo las/ sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam
@#/ /tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste/ /rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o/ /gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /
'byung po'i mi rnams 'grub 'gyur ba/ /brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin du ni ba lang khyi/ /chen por yang dag ldan pa ni/ /de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga/ /
tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad la ni/ /lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas/ /nyi ma bdun du ce sbyang gi /dbus su bzhag la de nas bton/ /lnga po dag las yungs kar gyi/ /
'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/ /de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyis/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi'i bar dag tu/ /nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min sgom ste/ /sbyar nas
ce spyang dbus su legs bzhag la/ /de las bton te lnga po dag las ni/ /dngos grub 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya/ /'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na/ /de ni
rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas/ /'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis/ /thams cad du ni sbas pa'o/ /de nas sgrub thabs 'byung ba'o/ /yid kyis pad+ma bsam bya ba/
kha dog dmar po kun 'od la/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o/ /shar du ut+pal sngo 'od mdog /lho ru ser po
lta bu'o/ /nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od/ /byang du margad 'od yin no/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang / /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum mdzes/ /shar phyogs
kyi lha mon spyin gsum pa phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang / dril bu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang / thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo/ /lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum dang / rin
po che dang / ba dan dang / ce spyang bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang / mda' dang / sna tshogs pad+ma dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i
phyag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / rde'u chung dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /de yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga /de
bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do/ /dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub rab
tu ster/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub sbyor bas/ /'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug /thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing / /stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
kun las phrogs pa dang / /lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa/ /lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i
@#/ /mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag kyang / /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /
sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen/ /yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis/ /sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya/ /rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan/ /ril bu re re bza' bar bya/ /yi ge brgyad
kyi mtha' ldan pa/ /U dang thig ler bcas pa ni/ /mtha' ru yang dag sbyor byas la/ /sngags ni kun tu brjod bya ste/ /gu h+ya b+hak+Sha a b+hak+She hUM zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma
kun sbyor ba yis/ /dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan/ /gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na/ /lan bdun mngon bsngags rnal 'byor ba yis bza'/ /yi ge gsum
mtha' zhes bya ste/ /brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa/ /U dang thig le yang dag ldan/ /yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas/ /yi ge dang por sbyor ba yi/ /hra'i
zhes bya ba yang dag sbyor/ /yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la/ /sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya/ /yi ge yis ni rnam bsgoms te/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya/ /ci ste rdo rje can
'grub 'dod/ /da lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa/ kye grogs
po rdo rjes pad+ma kha 'byed sad mdzad mang A la la ho/ bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i kha ni rab bye ba/ /bde ba chen po'i gar
gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ /de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul/ /de
ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur ba yin/ /dus bzhir rab tu sbyar ba yi/ /'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs
rdzogs shing / /spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /ji ltar sku gsum mchog ster ba'i/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad rgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'di ni
rab tu snang bar byed/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /sgo dgu las ni byung ba'i rdzas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i/ /de nyid bla na med pa 'grub/ /'dir
tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni/ /gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang / /rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan rnam sgo ma pa'i/ /cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan
pa dang / /lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o/ /gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang / /rgyun du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par sgom pa de la nad rnams

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsol

yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni/ /sman ni bza' bar byas nas su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /he ru ka ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rang gi snying gar re pha ni/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar
'bar sgom/ /de byung rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas yang dag khyab/ /de yi steng du hUM nyid de/ /bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid/ /de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas/ /rdo rje
las byung he ru ka /bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni/ /sku la thal bas byugs pa dang / /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /in+d+ra
nI la'i 'od lta bu/ /dbu skra ser po stobs po che/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa ni/ /rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing / /ri rab ri rgyal mthon po yang / /sa yi 'og tu yang

nyid| |de bzhin du ma'i gtor ma'i sngags/ /las ni thams cad pa yi sngags/ /yin pa nyid du the tshom med/ /rdo rje A ra li las/ /gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag par rab tu phye ba/ /gdong ring sna ni mtho ba dang / /de bzhin dpag bsam shing
nyid dang / /tshangs par spyod pa mang pa nyid/ /dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub sbyin/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /khyi las byung ba'i mar me dang / /mar me chen po bsregs
nas ni/ /tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/ /rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /khyod kyis ma byin
par yang longs/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par gyis/ /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu
mchod/ /de nas dbang bskur bka' stsal pa/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni/ /de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye/ /
de nyid bde ba chen po ste/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de nas sbyin sreg bka' stsal pa/ /
khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni/ /khru phyed sa la brko bar bya/ /rdul tshon dkar po ldan par ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya/ /gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni/ /

dril bu nyid/ /de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste/ /byang du gri gug dge ba nyid/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dbye/ /
dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni/ /der ni slob ma gzhug par bya/ /ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni/ /bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /rdo rje A ra
li las/ /las thams cad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //mngon par shes pa bka' stsal ba/ /lha yi mig dang rna ba dang / /de bzhin gzhan
sems shes pa nyid/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang / /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon shes nyid/ /he ru ka yi dbyibs bsgoms na/ /yo gi mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur//
shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur/ /bsam gtan las ni nus skyes nas/ /phyis ni spyod pa yang dag brtsam/ /yid ni brtan nam g.yo
pa'am ci/ /rang gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir/ /glu ni sna tshogs len pa dang / /de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang / /lus la rgyan ni sna
tshogs dang / /de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya yang dag brtsam/ /de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa/ /re'u mig brgyad
ni bris nas ni/ /rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye bas/ /de bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis/ /oM ni dbang ldan la ni mer/ /de bzhin bden
bral nyid du la/ /rlung gi mtshams su hUM nyid de/ /shar du dz+wa ni rnam par gnas/ /lho ru dzra yi rnam pa nyid/ /nub tu b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste/ /byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yin/ /dbus
su swAhA rnam par gnas/ /ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming / /rdo rje A ra li las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo bri ba bka'
stsal pa/ che ge mo 'di sod cig /che ge mo 'di dbang du mdzod cig /che ge mo rengs bar mdzod cig /che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig /che ge mo ma lus par gyis

sol ba dang / tsitra ka yi khu ba dang / yungs mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka yi khu ba dang / rus pa'i smyug gus so/ /
dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so/ /rmongs pa la ni d+ha ru ka'i shing gis so/ /rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i smyug gus so/ /ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi smyug gus
bri bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa la bka' stsal ba/ bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang / /bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang / /lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du/ /lo ni
bcu drug bu mo dang / /nyi shu rtsa lnga ma mchod bya/ /ba dang de bzhin ma he dang / /spre'u mo dang khyi mo dang / /pong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang / /sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid/ /phag
dang ba men las byung ba/ /gzhan yang he ru ka mchod ma/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi/ /chos ni mu stegs can gyis brtag /dri ma gzhig
par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor bas ni myang bar bya/ /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ /ma byin par ni blang mi bya/ /pha rol bud med bsten mi
bya| |nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo langs/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug /sha chen dang ni rus pa dang / /khrag ni chen po btung ba dang / /khu chen yang dag bza'
ba dang / /de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid/ /bram ze ma dang g.yung mo nyid/ /gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma/ /thod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan/ /gdol pa de bzhin phyag
dar ma/ /rtswa 'tshong ma dang bshan ma nyid/ /de bzhin kla klo la sogs dang / /smyig mkhan dang ni chang 'tshong ma/ /gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid/ /ma dang sring mo bu
mo dang / /sring mo las byung bu mo nyid/ /gzhan gyi bu mo spang mi bya/ /rje'i rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste/ /bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas/ /bgrod min mkhas pas bsten
par bya/ /rdo rje A ra li las/ 'khrul 'khor dang / las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dam tshig gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan
thos skal pa ngan pa la/ /bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing / /de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang / /ral pa can ni thams cad la/ /dam tshig bag ni dbab mi bya/ /snying rje yi ni

ze dam tshig rnam par sdang / /de nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang / /bzod ldan dal ba mi bslu ba/ /bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan/ /
rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags/ /de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal ba/ sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas/ /de nyid
bcu ni yongs su shes/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab pa bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar sgom pa'i sbyor ba des/ /dang po
thun tshod byin gyis brlab/ /des ni ci srid nyi phyed na/ /nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa/ /dus dang bral nas nam phyed na/ /thun tshod byin rlabs rab tu grags/ /thun tshod byin
rlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /phrag dog
dang ni ser sna nyid/ /bcom ldan he ru ka la med/ /yod na rnam par dag pa nyid/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ bgegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la 'am/ /
ljon shing btags shing 'phyang ba dang / /g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas sgrub/ /de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/ btung ba rin
po che yi chu/ /gang zhig bzang de don yod nyid/ /khrus ni dpag med rdo rje yis/ /dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad/ /dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad/ /btso ni gang zag mnyam
pas ni/ /dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni/ /gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste/ /bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ /khro bo yi ni bsnyen bkur ba/ /
bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur/ /brjod pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad/ /yan lag nyid sogs phyag rgya ste/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/ /gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas/ /
mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnas thob phyir/ /rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid/ /ri dwags shor sogs bya ba ni/ /
'jig rten du ni mi shes pas/ /mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba/ /rnam dag dag pa dam pa ni/ /de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod/ /de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje

las| las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pas phru
ba chag par ni/ /rigs bzhi ru ni slong mos rgyu/ /chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing / /gtsang sbrang nyid ni rab tu dbye/ /byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyi ni/ /khams ni blo dang ldan pas
blang | |phye btab bza' bar mi bya zhing / /mi ster ba la rtag tu blang / /g.yas su rab tu skye bo ni/ /g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya/ /nges pa med par khyim du gnas/ /'grub
'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje shing gi stongs byas dang / /de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag /he ru ka ni rab grub phyir/ /bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje
gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ser skya'i phru ma blangs nas ni/ /sngags ni 'dis ni bzla bar bya/ /bsrung bar byas shing bskams byas nas/ /de la gu gul
bsreg par bya/ /mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du/ /des ni sdug pa sbyin par bya/ /shin tu mdzes shing gos mdzes pa/ /bris skur gnas pa legs grub phyir/ /'di
nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya/ /bris sku nyid ni gnod spyin mo/ /snga bar byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyan rnams thams cad ni/ /gang zhig cung
zad rgyan rnams kun/ /snga ba ru ni blang bar bya/ /gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la/ /me tog gis ni mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ma chad rma med
gang ba ni/ /legs par brtul zhugs can gyis bkru/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos bdug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su/ /mar khu
chen po'i mar me dbul/ /nga yis khyod la ci gsungs pa'i/ /de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/ /yungs kar ro la brdeg bya zhing / /sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod/ /de la mkhas

glu yis mchod byed na/ /des ni rtag tu sgra snyan 'gyur/ /gang phyir gang zhig mar me 'bul/ /de ni mig dang ldan par 'gyur/ /gang zhig gar gyi mchod byed pa/ /de ni
rig 'dzin chen por 'gyur/ /gang zhig phyag 'tshal byed pa ni/ /de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /gang zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni/ /lus ni dri zhim ldan par 'gyur/ /gang
zhig phreng ba bzang 'bul ba/ /de ni gser gyi phreng ldan 'gyur/ /gang zhig gos ni 'bul ba ni/ /des na lha yi gos rnyed 'gyur/ /gang zhig mtshan tsam 'don pa
dang | |dad pa tsam yang rab byed pa/ /lhag par mos pa rab tu byed/ /gang zhig skye bo mchod byed pa/ /de rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i/ /srid pa'i longs spyod rab
tu bzang / /rdo rje A ra li las/ yon tan rjes su bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas yang gang zhig de ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyin pa byin
pas de rkang gnyis kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' bas the tshom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te
nye bar 'dug ste zhus pa/ ji lta bu yi rnal 'byor bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa mtha' gsum yongs dag pa/ /he ru ka ni bsgom par bya/ /sbyin pa
yang ni he ru ka /gang ba sbyin pa'ang de lta bu/ /sbyin pa 'di ni rab tu bsngags/ /sbyin pa 'di ni dpe tsam ste/ /tshul khrims la sogs 'di ltar spyad/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
rdo rje A ra li las de skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje A ra li las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan
po ka ya s+tha pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ri gi A ra li
tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das ri gi rnam pa'i e waM sdom pa la bzhugs so/ /gnyis med gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gyi/ /A ra li dang ri gir brtags/ /ri gi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso/ /de la
A lis zhus pa/ /gnas kyi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /de la zhing gi rnam pa du/ /nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs/ /tshan do rnam pa du ru brjod/ /
@#/ /nye ba'i tshan do rnam pa ru/ /de la 'du ba gang zhig lags/ /de bzhin nye ba'i 'du ba ci/ /de la dur khrod rnam pa du/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ji ltar lags/ /de la
lha mo ri gi che/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher gnas pas/ /A ra li dang bder go bar/ /sa bcu rnams ni rab tu che/ /gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags so/ /de bzhin
du ni ba lang spyod/ /gnas ni byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu gling / /gling bzhir lha mo bzhi dang ni/ /ri rab spyi bor ri gi bzhugs/ /A ra li dang mnyam
sbyar bas/ /gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med las/ /si sa'i 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang / /bde chen de bzhin sdom pa ma/ /ljang gu ser mo btsod mdog dang / /dmar
mo ru ni yongs su grags/ /zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis dang / /g.yas na chu gri 'dzin ma ste/ /g.yon na rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/ /gcer bu mgo skyes grol ba'o//
A ra li yi sku mdog gnag /spyan gsum phyag drug A ra li/ /ri gi sngon mo spyan gsum ma/ /phyag gnyis zhags pa lcags kyu 'phyar/ /rdo rje ra li'i phyag gnyis kyis//
ri gi dge ba'i bshes gnyis 'khyud/ /g.yas kyi phyag gnyis dag tu ni/ /rdo rje dang ni cang te'u brtags/ /gzhan dag tu ni dgra sta dang / /thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa
nyid| |gnas su sems dang nye ba'i gnas/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /mi bzad rnon po sgyu ma che/ /mthon po
gsung gi 'khor lo la'o/ /shar sgo de bzhin du ni zhing / /nye ba'i zhing ni lho ru 'gyur/ /tshan do ha ni nub kyi sgo/ /nye ba'i tshan do ha ni byang / /wa dang ma he nyid dang ni/ /rta mgrin
glang po'i rgyal mtshan nyid/ /'di rnams sgo dang sgo ru ni/ /kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i mtshams rnams na/ /'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/ /sku yi
'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /sku gsum 'khor lo'i mtshams su ni/ /dmyal ba dag ni rtag tu bri/ /sku la grang ba'i dngos po bzhi/ /gsung
la de bzhin tsha ba bzhi/ /ri gi A ra li'i sbyor ba ste le'u dang po'o// //lha mo ri gi snying rje che/ /A ra li ni nyid kyis zhus/ /ji ltar 'khor lo'i mtshams
brgyad du/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni rnam par sgom/ /ri gis bka' stsal pa/ ji snyed pa'i sems can gyi bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang /
drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa can nam/ 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa can de dag thams cad A ra
@#/ /li dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams gdon pa'i blos e baM rnam par gzhug par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgoms nas ni/ /hUM ni snying
gar bsgom par bya/ /hUM las sna tshogs rigs bdag yin/ /rdo rje las ni A ra li/ /'byung ba nyid du 'gyur ba nyid/ /mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /oM baM rnam
pa ches gsang bar/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gab tser ni/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'gyur/ /oM A ra li ri gi pheM pheM pheM b+h+yo swAhA/ char dbab pa'i cho ga bshad
par bya'o/ /sa yi bdag po blangs nas ni/ /nor rgyas bu ni mkhas pas bya/ /thod pa sbyar mar bzhag nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mas dgang bar bya/ /de yi sbyor bas bkang
nas ni/ /nges par srad bu nag pos dkri /chu yi 'gram du rang song ste/ /ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/ /sngags pas sngags ni khri bzlas na/ /klu ni 'khrugs par char ba 'bebs/ /
rmi lam gyi las bshad par bya ste/ rnal 'byor bdag gi mal 'og tu/ /da du ra yi khu ba dang / /dur khrod sol ba bsres pa dang / /'ug pa'i sgro rtsa'i smyu gu yis/ /
ro dkris dmar po'i gos la ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni rang gis bri/ /de la rnal 'byor ma 'dug nas/ /A ra li ni khri ru bzlas/ /oM A ra li ri gi pheM/ a mu
kang ke/ ma me taM swa p+naM daR+sha ya b+h+yo swAhA/ khra dgug pa bshad par bya ste/ rna tshol brtag par byas nas ni/ /gong bu mdun du dgod par bya/ /ri gi A ri li'i sbyor bas/ /dbugs
kyi gong bu dgug par bya/ /khab kyi phyag rgya mchu byas nas/ /dang po lce yi byed pa pos/ /ji ltar che ba'i gong bu bzhin/ /shes rab can gyis sbrang chen dgug /bab kyi phyag
rgya gnyis pa ni/ /mgrin skras dal gyis yongs su gzir/ /'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar spyod pa'i gzugs bltas nas/ /bdag nyid
ri gi yi gzugs su/ /ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/ /mgo ni 'og tu rnam par bsgom/ /oM badzra A ra li phaT ya to ta ya pheM pheM swAhA/ rengs par byed pa bshad par bya ste/
dgra bo nyid kyi lce la ni/ /bu ram gong bu bsgom par bya/ /oM ri gi g+hu T+Ta g+hu T+Ta sha hUM phaDa/ 'khru ba rab tu bshad par bya ste/ dgra po'i dri mas gzugs brnyan bya/ /de yi
skra yis dkri bar bya/ /tsha ba gsum gyis kha bkang nas/ /gzugs brnyan kha ru bzhag par bya/ /oM A ra li ma me a mu kaM kaM kaM sor ye phaDa phaDa phaDa swAhA/ dbang du bya
ba la| bdag gi g.yon pa'i mig tu ni/ /e baM rnam par bsgom par bya/ /de yi g.yas pa'i mig tu ni/ /rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnam pa bsgom/ /de dag 'dus pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /ri
@#/ /gi A ri las sbyor bas/ /mdzes ma dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba dang / /gnas ni sbyang ba nyid dang yang / /ye shes 'khor lo
gzhug pa dang / thugs sogs byin gyis brlab pa dang / /yan lag dgod par bya ba dang / /de bzhin lha yi dbang bskur dang / /lha mo rnams kyi sngags 'byung ba/ /A ra
lis ni rtag tu bya/ /oM dang AHhUM byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid gsum ni rigs gsum 'byung / /byin rlabs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /las rnams thams cad rab sbyin
dge |snying dbus rang gi sa bon gyi/ /lcags kyus A ra li phyung nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /bkug nas dam por bcing bar bya/ /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo
me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha e h+ye hi b+ha ga baM ti ri swAhA/ spyi bo snying dang de bzhin mgrin/ /lte ba gsang ba'i gnas su ni/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i
sbyor ba yis/ /dam po la sogs bcing bar bya/ /ha ha hi hi de bzhin du/ /hu hu ho ho de bzhin te/ /lus kyi gnas ni brgyad rnams su/ /yan lag dgod par bya ba
nyid| |spyi bo mchan khung lte ba dang / /kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang / /rkang mthil gsang ba nyid du ni/ /yan lag dgod par rab tu grags/ /sngags ni rim pa
yis ni mtshon/ /lag pa ba spu'i khung kun nas/ /ri gi'i 'od zer spro bar bya/ /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar rab sbyor ba'i/ /yang ni phyis ni bsdu bar bya/ /re gi hUM saM kaM maM saM
nyid| |thugs kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /gaM tAM maM yuM zhes bya ba/ /gsung gi 'khor lor grags pa'o/ /dzaM maM hAM kaM aM nyid ni/ /sku yi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /ri gi
sngags kyi gdon pa ni/ /rim pa yis ni mtshon par bya/ /rang gi snying las 'od zer byung / /lcags kyu'i phyag rgyar rab sbyor bas/ /phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa
yi| |rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas/ /cho gas 'dod pas mchod nas ni/ /dbang ni blo dang ldan pas blang / /oM sarba ta thA ga tA DA ki n+ya nu ga ta ma hA b+hi She kA nud
nu zhes/ bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/ /des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya/ /lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA
ki n+yA b+hi She kA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gru gsum me'i sa bon gyis/ /snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya/ /snying gar hUM las rigs bdag nyid/ /de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur/ /
de nas rdo rje las byung kun/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid/ /ri gi A ra li gnas su/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor
@#/ /'phar ma gsum gnas pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i A ra li/ /sems
kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni/ /ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa/ /zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas/ /gar gyi rkang pas phyogs su

gnas/ /tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas/ /mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin/ /las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //ri gi A ra lis zhus pa/ /brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags/ /de la lha mo ri gi ches/ /brda ni yang dag rab tu phye/ /brda ni chen po ts+tsho ma bcu/ /bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid/ /
gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na/ /gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod/ /ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid de/ /pus mo tshan dor 'gro bar
'gyur/ /dpral bar nye ba'i tshan do nyid/ /lag pa g.yas pa 'du ba nyid/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid/ /rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas/ /g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod
do| |snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur/ /lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang / /tshong rdal nyams dga' tshong 'dus dang / /ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu lta/ /brda yi rnam par shes par
bya| |rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston/ /ril bu mig sman la sogs pa/ /mchog ni rab tu smin par 'gyur/ /A ra li yis lha mo zhus/ /ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags/ /
gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /'bras phyir byang chub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /ting 'dzin lha mo ri gi ste/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid/ /
bsrub dang srub byed las byung ba/ /kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung / /sems ba thams cad yongs su spangs/ /dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dgon pa dben
pa'i gnas su ni/ /gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni/ /smin ma'i dbus su sems byas na/ /mi bzad mun pa'i gzugs su ni/ /
sgrub pos dang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni rna ba g.yon par lcug /dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur/ /yan lag can gyi bde ba gang / /de bzhin phyag rgya chen po/
bde| |phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jigs/ /de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig /bde ba chen por rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de yi ye shes phyag rgya pa/ /'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid/ /
rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bur/ /gzhan du brjod par mi nus so/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /sems can gsol 'debs
@#/ /sems kyis ni/ /sems can kun la snying rje yis/ /'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid/ /'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa'i
sems kyis ni/ /snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor pas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul/ /
gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ltar/ /bzhi pa ya ba'i me tog bzhin/ /lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni/ /rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni/ /
de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/ /rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtse gcig sems kyis ri gir 'gyur/ /ye shes bdud rtsi rtag 'thungs pas/ /bkres
pas zil gyis mi non cing / /skom pa yis kyang zil mi non/ /rga dang na bas gzir mi 'gyur/ /'di yis thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ri gi thams cad rig par
'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po/ /A ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ /dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas/ /ri gi la ni gus par zhus/ /e baM ma yA ci zhig bshad/ /e
yi rnam pas sa ru bshad/ /baM gi rnam pa de bzhin chu/ /ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod/ /yA yi rnam ba rlung du gsungs/ /ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad/ /ri gis bka'
stsal pa/ ri gi mkha' 'gro mar ni gsung / /sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di/ /ri gi e baM sdom pa ni/ /e baM rnam pa rna bar gnas/ /ri gi sna yi rtse mor ni/ /rtag tu ri gi bzhugs
pa yi/ /ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag /'byung ba chen po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang / brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //ri gis
bka' stsal pa/ de nas rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /a ra li ni nyid kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid la zhus/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /khrag ni ji ltar
dgug par bgyi/ /nus la sogs pas mdun du ni/ /ya ba'i me tog bzhag nas ni/ /rang gi khrag ni dgug par bya/ /ri gi nyon cig goms pa yi/ /nas ni nyi shu kha smad
'byung / /phyi nas khrag ni dgug par byed/ /lha ni dral ba bshad par bya/ /spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab nas ni/ /der ni sngags ni bzlas pa bya/ /
oM he ru ka pa taM phi ba tA ya/ ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas/ /lha la phyag byas 'gas par 'gyur/ /A li kA li yan lag mnyam/ /'di dag gnyis dbus rang sa bon/ /rang
gi sa bon nyid kyis ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te/ /phyag rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung / /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis
@#/ /kyis| |mthe chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul/ /dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar bya/ /sdig mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa
nyid/ /rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po/ /chos kyi ye shes gang zhig gzhan/ /ri gi nyid du rab tu grags/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni/ /si si la sogs rab tu grags/
mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te/ /mi bzad la sogs rab tu grags/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ /wa la sogs pa rab tu grags/ /phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs/ /
spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod/ /'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de/ /zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel ba nyid/ /dga' ba la sogs sa bcu ni/ /gnas sogs yang dag
rab tu grags/ /pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug /thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /e baM ma yA'i dbus gnas pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar bsam/ /'chol ba
kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /thams cad rgyud du yang dag gnas/ /gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid/ /thod pa dag ni snying rje che/ /ri gi A ra li yi sgra/ /cad te'u hUM de'i
sngags bzlas pas/ /dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags/ /mgo bo nyon mongs pa yi bdud/ /thod pa nam mkha' dag pa 'di/ /lcags kyu
ri gi ze 'bru ste/ /de bzhin zhags pa dag pa nyid/ /ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni/ /lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste/ /skyil krung gdan du shes par bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi snying
por gsungs/ /gnyer ma gsum rtag lta ba nyid/ /lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur/ /mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod/ /kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya/ /spyi bo
gdugs kyi phreng bar brjod/ /mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /'phan ni mgo las skyes pa yin/ /rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung / /de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur//
de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus/ /rnal 'byor ma yis rtag tu mchod/ /rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //rgyal po chen
po zas gtsang 'di/ /A ra lis ni yang dag phye/ /de la ri gi sgyu ma che/ /'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag /don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lha mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya'o/ /sgra
gcan bzang po bde ba che/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las/ /sgyu ma chen pos 'tsho nyid/ /rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /sras
ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags/ /yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin/ /de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin/ /lte ba chos kyi
@#/ /'byung gnas gsungs/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phrul bas/ /don grub nyid ni gzi brjid can/ /ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /lha mo ri gi nga
tshig nyon/ /las la spyod pa rab brtags pas/ /lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs/ /dga' ba yang ni shi shir gsungs/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma/ /dga'
bral dga' ba bde chen ma/ /lhan cig skyes dga' sdom pa ma/ /mi zad ma ni 'o ru gsungs/ /rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid/ /sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che/ /mthe bong mchu ni
'jib pa nyid/ /dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de/ /sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid/ /rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te/ /'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no/ /rdo rje ra li 'dod chen
can/ /'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab/ /si si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi/ /de bzhin ha yi
rnam pa bzhi/ /'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo/ /rdo rje A ra li nyid ni/ /khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ri gi bde ba chen por
gsungs/ /ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod/ /bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs/ /bud med sgyu ma sangs
rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed/ /snying po'i sngags ni/ oM A ra lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si mi gsal bar bzlas so/ /gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni/ /ha ha ha
las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni/ de yi sngags su rab tu bsngags/ /snying po yi ni sngags yin no/ /nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yin/ /sgom pa bde chen myang ba ste/ /de bzhin
dam tshig mchod pa nyid/ /thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la/ /mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags/ /klu gzir gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste/ /rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags/ /bsad
la ma he dam tshig go /dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags/ /khrag dgug pa la dam tshig ste/ /'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid/ /rengs pa la ni ne'u'i sha /kha na ma tho med rnyed

byed yin/ /A li nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can/ /lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o/ /bcu dang brgyad kyis rtsa
rnams nas/ /dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams/ /de yi dbus nas drangs nas su/ /A li'i dbus su thim par 'gyur/ /'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis te/ /sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin/ /
rlung dang me yi bdun don la/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar/ /sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan/ /mchar pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/ /dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/ /de yi dbus su
gzung bar bya/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur/ /kA li me tog kun tu mnan/ /rdo rje can gyi lus ma tog /'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste/ /sa dang kun
gyi ma zhes bya/ /ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /de bzhin gshegs rab chu srin nya/ /gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni/ /thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te/ /ban du ka ltar kha phye ba'i/ /sbrang rtsi bdud
rtsi yi ger gnas/ /kA li bdud rtsi'i de nyid ni/ /me tog chu yi de bzhin bskor/ /yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni/ /lha rnams
kyi ni rigs kyi yum/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /dngos dang dngos med las grol ba/ /de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong / /A li bung ba zhes
byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin/ /lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag /bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba/ /
@#/ /dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can/ /lu gu rgyud kyis dkri bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis/ /lus can bdag nyid bkru bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /gang
gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing / /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par/ /bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba kun shes pas/ /rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya/ /
bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon/ /gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis/ /myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni/ /rigs la 'gran
dang reg 'gro dang / /lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas/ shes dang 'dra bas longs spyad bya/ /rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni/ /de yi sa bon gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi sems kyis
longs spyod na/ /rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya/ /bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te/ /de yi yan lag la sbyar ba/ /hUM
zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/ /lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya/ /gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni/ /gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid/ /rab tu sbyar nas bsams nas su/ /rnam par rtog
pa ring du spang / /rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa/ /thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dzaM zhes pa/ /dag pa'i shel ltar bsams par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste/ /sri zhes bya ba bkod de bza'/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo / /bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang / /khyad par ru ni tshes brgyad la/ /dngos grub
'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin/ /sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas na/ /spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang / /las rnams thams
cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'gron yang / /myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbul po nor gyis

phongs pa yang / /khyim ni 'byor zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la/ /yi ge bcu yi sngags
dag ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te/ /mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin rlabs la/ /sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug /'gro ba thams cad
rmongs par 'gyur/ /gur gum dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcud phan tshun ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya/ /skyes bu 'gro la skal bzang 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas
dbang dag ni ldan pa yi/ /yan lag dag ni byugs nas su/ /reg na shi yang mi gtong ngo / /dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi/ /rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyin
@#/ /byas na/ /dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang / /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin rlabs nas/ /de dag las su sbyar bar
bya| |ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni/ /thig le byas na go char 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir/ /'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma/ /sems can rnams la sdug par lta/ /bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed ma/ /de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes/ /thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma//
mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can/ /skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma/ /kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni/ /blo ngan srid pa'i ngo bo 'joms/ /lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni/ /yid 'ong
bdud rtsi ldan grags ma/ /yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid/ /lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol/ /de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod
par bya/ /pho nya'i las kyi bya ba yis/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni/ /bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal/ /pho nya'i las su
sbyar ba yi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /las rnams kun gyi snying po bas/ /rab tu 'bad de pho nya sgrub/ /shing gcig gi ni drung dag tu/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas/ /
khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi/ /thang ka la ni bri bya ste/ /mtheb sor bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis mgo bor thal sbyar ba'i/ /'od zer me 'bar lha
mo bri| |sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su/ /'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam/ /dri dang me tog dmar po dang / /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/ /nye bar
spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /rdzas lnga dag ni dngos po lnga/ /mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas/ /dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri ma nam/ /gsum par shing ni 'gul
'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang / /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /oM dI pe shwa ri hUM phuHlag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /spyi
bor bzhag ste brjod par bya/ /dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ /dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag pa
g.yon pas bzung nas su/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med par/ /byin gyis rlobs la bdag sgrubs shig /de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas/ /bza' dang btung sogs ston
mo dang / /gser la sogs pa ci yang rung / /bka' bzhin myur du ster bar 'gyur/ /thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad/ /'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /gal te grub par ma
@#/ /gyur na/ /de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla/ /sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis/ /'bar byed ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /sems can don 'bad sgrub pa pos/ /'bar ba
chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la/ /mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /de 'og gzugs
ni bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes/ /phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu
bsnams/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /mig g.yon ha har bzhad pa dri/ /dur khrod kyi ni sa phyogs su/ /sgrub pa po yis bris sku
dgram/ /kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni/ /me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod/ /me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba
yi| |nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin cing / /rnal 'byor sgom pas bzlas nas ni/ /'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su/ /kha ru bcug ste
bgad par bya/ /oM DA ki nI hUM phruM phuHsgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs/ /gsum pa mdun du snang gyur
nas| |bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi/ /dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis/ /ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya/ /dgra rnams
bsad cing gtse ba dang / /yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ /gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na/ /rdo rje ma
yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni pags pa la/ /'bad de thang ka brkyang bar bya/ /'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug /
kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon pa bri/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /
lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /lci ba yis ni byugs byas la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me sogs/ /'byung
po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong / /bza' ba dag dang sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin/ /'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla/ /
oM tsu ShI Ni A kaR+Sha ya phuHphaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni/ /snyim pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas
@#/ /pas| |'jigs byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi ni ngur ba'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod/ /gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas/ /bsdigs
pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /sems
can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nas nyi ma re re zhing / /gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ /ro
langs snying po gzir te bzla/ /sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/ /'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so/ /chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su/ /kam po tsi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba lang
la sogs ko ba ni/ /brkyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru gzhug /lus ni sprul gyis brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gos
dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ha har bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa/ /khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas
bdug/ /rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin//
rnal 'byor pa ni bsgom zhing bzlas/ /'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs/ /mdun du rdo rje'i sgra 'byin cing / /
gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM k+ShAM kruM phraM phuHphaT/
lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya 'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par
'gyur/ /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /rtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang rung / /nga 'dod pa de khrid de shog /gser dang
dngul dang zangs la sogs/ /bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha mi'i chung ma gang yang rung / /ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid
par byed/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /las gzhan gyi ni bsgrub par bya/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa
yis| |mnan te lnga brgya bzlas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni/ /dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/ /kriM
@#/ /zhes bya dang gsod pa mtha'/ /hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni
dbang phyug ma'ang / /gal te ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na/ /b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i
yungs kar ni/ /nyi ma phyed na hUM zhes ni/ /brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ba'am/ /cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su/ /nges par
las rnams sgrub byed par/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste/ /khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong / /nor bu rin chen ches bcings pa'i/ /dbyug pa phyag
na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /dpa' bos gnang gi gtang du gsol/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /bzang po sgo 'di phye ste thongs/ /rnal
'phyor rnal 'byor ma gsang che/ /gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i
mtshan nyid ni/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan
ma'o| |thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /g+ho g+hu/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yi/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bo 'tshir bar byed pa yi/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /mu g+hu/ lag pa rna bar
brdebs pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor mo brdabs pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /Da Sh+Ta/ sha ba'i mgo ltar stod byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed
pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes
pa'o| |b+ha k+Sha so/ /lag pa skra la 'ju byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwe ra ti/ lag pa snying gar reg byed na/ /da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa Ta pa ta/ sna rtser khu tshur
'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shU n+ya tA/ lag pa brkyang ste ltor rdebs na/ /phun sum ldan par yong zhes pa'o/ /bi pa d+ha ka si Da/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas
bza' bar 'dod pa'o/ /tsaN+Da li ka/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /nye gnag gtum la drag pa yin/ /nI la daN+Da pa ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod
pa ni nga la ston/ /a nam gA yud+d+ha/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag /da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur ka ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par
@#/ /'dod pa'o/ /tA ra ga NaHtshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ /nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg /gi ri
to| |steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o/ /sa ma ts+tsha yA/ 'dzum dang bcas pas lta byed cing / /lag pa lag pas bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor
bzang byin zhes bya ba'o/ /dzrI N+Na ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /sal+ya pa ta/ mthe bong gi ni srin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la
sogs/ /suR+ya bad/ rnal 'byor pha dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya dang / brda'i mtshan nyid do/ /gzhan gyi gang na zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi
pa'o|| ||mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu/ /shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ /'khor ba
las sgrol mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dang po de nyid rdo rje ni/ /dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o/ /bgrang ba'i phreng ba gsum pa ste/ /ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/ /de
nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs gyis/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol sgrol/ /dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad/ /thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa/ /lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung / /nub tu snang ba
mtha' yas dgod/ /byang gi phyogs su don yod grub/ /rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so/ /pad+ma byang chub yan lag brgyad/ /ji bzhin sa ru gzhag par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /nam mkha'
dang ni kun tu bzang / /gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /shar la sogs par ji bzhin bsam/ /dbus kyi bcu gsum
sgong ru| |ye shes lnga ni thim par bya/ /pad+ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du/ /zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste/ /de ltar lha mo bzhi po
dag /de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin/ /mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba/ /skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog ming can de/ /gzhan
gyis mi thub zhes bya ste/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ste/ /nub
tu de bzhin ro lang sma/ /lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje de kho na yi lha/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /cha gsum gsal bar bzung ba
la/ /ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan/ /ut+pal ku mu da ltar mdzes/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu/ /rtse
@#/ /mo dgu yi lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /chu srin las ni byung ba yi/ /rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas/ /rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba/ /ye shes rdo
rje 'gro ba sgrol/ /rdo rje'i de nyid gang yin pas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje yi ni sems su bya/ /rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas/ /chos
rnams rdo rje las gzhan med/ /thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin/ /rdo rje las kyi snying po yis/ /rdo rje 'pho ba sbyor ba'i bdag /rdo rje 'khor ba sgrol bar byed/ /rdo rje 'gugs pa sbyor ba'i bdag /
rdo rje bcing pa'i sbyor bar ldan/ /bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan/ /rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su/ /phyogs kun du ni snang bar byed/ /rdo rje'i sgrub pa
la sogs kun/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid blta bar bya/ /chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste/ /thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje 'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas su/ /de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje pad+mor
zhugs pa ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams/ /nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni/ /thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i/ /
nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par/ /byang chub snying por rnam par gnas/ /thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu/ /gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams mthar thug /phyogs
brgyad ces ni bya ba rnams/ /lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya/ /shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste/ /byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo/ /nub
kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/ /lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang / /bzhi pa rdo rje phreng ba mo/ /dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /gzugs kun rdzogs
shing shin tu mdzes/ /pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung / /gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni/ /shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dag la/ /de yi dbus kyi stan
dag la| |shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas/ /steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams/ /snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste/ /thams
cad spro dang sdud pa po'o/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis/ /phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor bas/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin
te| |thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so/ /g.yas par nyi ma bsams nas su/ /g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgod/ /lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa lag tu bskor/ /lus
rnams la ni thabs dang sbyar/ /rang 'dod lha rnams bsam par bya/ /rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste/ /'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung / /hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
@#/ /rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis/ /sems can thams cad mdzes par bya/ /rnam thar chos su bya ba ste/ /rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog /oM badzra

g+haN+De ho hUM/ oM badzra d+harmA ra Ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsA li te/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA dA swa b+hA ba na badzra d+harma hr-i da ya a ba san+to Sha Ni hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a a a swAhA/ shes
rab thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi chos kyis ni/ /'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs bya 'am/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems
can don phyir dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje de kho na yis bzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas/ /shes rab thabs su blta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i
rnal 'byor pa/ /glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi/ /dngos grub ring bar shes par bya/ /de nas gsang dang phra ba yi/ /rdo rje'i mtshan nyid bzung ba
ste| |yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa/ /dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya/ /de nyid kyis ni cha gcig gi/ phra ba'i rdo
rje rab tu brtag /spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa/ /rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcang / /slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog /bgrang phreng
la sogs gzung ba ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang / /gzhan
yang nor bu dkar po sogs/ /zhi sogs las la khyad par gyi/ /bgrang phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang / /pad+ma sa bon khyad par du/ /rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng ste/ /
mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya/ /gur gum la sogs dri zhim pa'i/ /dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las/ /ril bur byas te dmar por btsos/ /dbang du sdud par rab tu grags/ /ru
'drA k+Sha dang lung tang dang / /mi yi rus pa de bzhin te/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la/ /bo de tse ni las kun byed/ /sngags
sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste/ /dbang la de yi phyed du bya/ /zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te/ /rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni drug cu 'o/ /las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar/ /las kyi
bye brag ji bzhin du/ /bgrang phreng dag ni brtag par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu/ /lha dgu yi ni skud pa la/ /lha dgus byin
gyis brlab par bya/ /gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang / /gtsang zhing dad ldan snyan par smra/ /de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis/ /grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur/ /skud
@#/ /pa thams cad sangs rgyas tshul/ /ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom yin/ /'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan/ /steng ma chos kyi dbyings yin no/ /mchod rten chos kyi
dbang po'o/ /lag par nyi ma bsams nas su/ /dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni/ /lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu/ /dmar po la ni dmar po sgom/ /g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni/ bdud rtsi'i
yi ge bsam bya ba/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam/ /g.yon pa pad+ma'i 'dab mar sgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis/ /
kha sbyor dbus su phreng bzhag la/ /de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis/ /bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sor mo dag gi bye brag gis/ /de nas sngags pas bzlas pa bya/ /rdo rje ma
dngos g.yon pa ste/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o/ /dkar po dud pa dung dang ni/ /pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste/ /gi wang dri gsum 'jigs pa dang / /sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang //
ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis/ /lag la sogs pa'i las can ma/ /zhi ba la ni khro bo bgrang / /rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste/ /srin lag la ni dbang du bstan/ /mtha' mar mngon
par spyod pa ste/ /mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni/ /lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin/ /mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nyid med pa'i
rnal 'byor pa/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang / /de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril/ /phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis grub pa med/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni/ /de nyid thams
cad kun bya'o/ /yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos/ /sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i grangs bzlas na/ /rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub/ /bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs

gcig/ rnal 'byor ma ya dri ba 'grub/ /oM pa de pa de mahA bde dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha mahA b+hA be hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ AHswAhA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas na/ /bgrang phreng gis ni lha rnams 'grub/ /
las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur/ /ye shes de dag bye phrag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /ye shes bye brag ring du gnas/ /thun mong ye shes
brjod pa ste/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa can/ /gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/ /klu dang byol song gsang ba pa/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci/ /mi dang yi dwags mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmyal bar
'tshed pa'i sems can dang / /byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste/ /phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus/ /chu dang me dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /bstan pa de nyid thams cad dang / /rtswa
dang 'dab ma phra ba dang / /bong ba rdo dang brag la sogs/ /thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur/ /ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o/ /ye shes thar par
@#/ /gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' s+cal pa/ /nyi shu rtsa
gsum lha yi gnas/ /gong nas gong du nyis 'gyur te/ /'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag/ gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel/ /gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste/ /lha min ye shes khro bo'o/ /yi dwags ye
shes zhen pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing ngu / /byol song ye shes glen pa ste/ /bstan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /bye brag tu ni shes par bya//
glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /bud med ye shes slu brid do/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis sbyangs pa/ /skye ba bya
ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /sgra sgrogs phyi rol bstan bcos ni/ /gar gyi gnas
dang mtshungs pa ste/ /blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob/ /snying po snying po bstan bcos te/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi
rab tu byed pa las/ rim par phye ba dang po'o// //'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dang / /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang / /srung
dang mngon par spyong pa dang / /re mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo las kyi kha dog gis/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /sa bon

de dag thams cad ni/ /phyag 'tshal tha ma dbus su bya/ /dbus su ming dang srung ba yi/ /tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus/ /bdag gis las ni bkru bar bya/ /mnyam
nyid thams cad rig pas gnas/ /srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes can gyis srung bsgoms na/ /'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur/ /sems can dngos po med pa ru/ /sbyor ba'i
dngos pos 'jigs pa la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya/ /sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgoms pa yis/ /bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul/ /oM tA re swAhA/ mig
la'o| |oM tut+tA re swAhA/ /mig la'o/ /oM tu re swAhA/ /sna la'o/ /oM tu swAhA/ rna ba la'o/ /oM re swAhA/ lce la'o/ /oM tA re ni swAhA/ snying gar ro/ /yan lag drug tu rtag tu dgod/ /'phags
ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni klubs/ /kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /gzhan gyi sna ru ut+pal bsnams/ /thams
cad 'od zer rnam bsgoms nas/ /khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /thams cad yon tan can du sgom/ /oM tu re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /srung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so/ /rgyal po'i
@#/ /btson ra dgra phyogs dang / /nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang / /yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni/ /chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs/ /gang dang gang du 'jigs
pa'i gnas/ /de dang der ni bsam par bya/ /shes rab zhan dang le lo sogs/ /'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya/ /srung ba bzang po 'di yis ni/ /'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur
srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /de nyid sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su/ /dbus su thog ma tha ma ste/ /bzlas pa thams cad
bzhag par bya/ /mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su/ /'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya/ /yan lag thams cad phye ba yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsam nas su/ /sngon gyi mtshan
nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis/ /las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur/ /oM pradz+nye pradz+nye mahA pradz+nye hUM swAhA/ /'od zer sna
tshogs 'bar bas su/ /dngos po bsgoms pas bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil
krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar/ /shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su/ /sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas/ /shes rab myur du 'bal
bar 'gyur/ /glen dang snyoms las blun po yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel/ /snying po re mig dgu ru bya/ /de bzhin bar ma bcu gnyis te/ /phyi rol re mig bcu drug go/ mthar thug
mu khyud de bzhin te/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i/ /dbus su bdag gi sems bzhag la/ /sgra dang thig le ldan pa yi/ /yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod/ /bcu gnyis pa la dbyangs
sa bon/ /ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya/ /sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams/ /yi ge lhag ma gcig dang bcas/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag/ bcu drug gnas su gzhag par bya/ /gsod pa'i
yi ge mu khyud la/ /thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor/ /dang po dkar por bsam bya ste/ /gnyis pa ser por bsgom par bya/ /gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste/ /de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po 'o/ /sngon
bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas/ /mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su/ /'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms pa yi/ /'grub
'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni/ /bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed/ /ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis/ /kun nas
nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang / /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgoms byas la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yis//
@#/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste/ /sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge dang po bzung nas su/ /lcags kyu
yi ni gzir bya ba/ /rtsa bar re pha sbyar bya ba/ /bdud rtsi'i thig le steng du dgod/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas
bsgom| |rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang / /yid can gyis ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /'bum phrag gcig
gis dbang du sdud/ /bu mo rnams kyi gang bsams pa/ /ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni/ /bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /ngas bstan pa la the tshom med/ /sngon gyi mtshan
nyid thams cad ni/ /sngar bzhin du ni ston pa nyid/ /thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas/ /'od zer sna
tshogs rnam par 'phro/ /'od zer ser po shin tu mdzes/ /gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsam/ /rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa/ /thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug/ sgrub
pa po yi lus la ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /kha dog la sogs dmar bsam zhing / /gzugs kyang kha dog
dmar por bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /g.yon pa
lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni/ /yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yi/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thigs pa dang / /rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya//
bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du 'grub/ /de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas nas su/ /sor mo yang ni bskyod byas nas/ /bsgrub bya'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar/ /'bum
phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor lo 'dab ma med pa la/ /mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /mu khyud mkhas pas bskor bar bya/ /sde tshan lnga pa
gang yin pa/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/ /i dang re pha sbyar nas su/ /'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di/ /sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la/ /'dab ma rnams
la'ang de nyid bya/ /'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas/ /gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid
ldan pa ru/ /sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/ /de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi/ /gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bya/ /gzugs mjes shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun
@#/ /gyis rnam par klubs/ /thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin/ /g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams/ /dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i
mtha' sbyar te/ /de ltar bsgoms shing bzlas pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin/ /bdag nyid bye brag gzhan
dag tu/ /rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no/ /bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /stong pa'i de bzhin bsgoms nas su/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom/ /'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lor ni/ /dbus su sa bon bsgoms nas ni/ /phyi rol 'khor
lo'i mu khyud la/ /dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi/ /gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon
par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste/ /rang gi lus la bsgom par bya/ /gang 'dod yid ni rtogs bya'i
phyir/ /de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med pas/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /rmugs dang glen dang snyoms las dang / /shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams//
rnal 'byor pa yis skad cig la/ /snyoms las la sogs ring du spong / /mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su/ /rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas ni/ /thams cad
