rim pas kun snang bya/ /ye shes sems la bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur/ /sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su/ /mnyam gzhag 'khor lor blta par bya/ /mnyam
nyid ye shes mthong ba yis/ /'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sa bon gyis sprul te/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi/ /kha dog dkar
po bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /snying ga'i phyogs su 'tshir bar mdzad/ /kha dog
dkar po mdzes pa yi/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro/ /spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas/ /sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzad/ /shes rab rdo rjes 'gro
sgrol ba/ /dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon/ /mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /sa bon 'di ni bsgoms nas su/ /mnyam gzhag dngos por bzlas
nas ni/ /byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed ba las/ rim par bye ba gnyis pa'o// //byin rlabs sbyor ba'i ngo bo dag/ gang gis sems
@#/ /can rnams la bstan/ /byin rlabs rim pa ji lta bu/ /lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal/ /sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis rlob pa'i chos
bstan pa/ /yang dag 'khor ba sgrol ba yi/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/ /snying gar zla ba bsam nas su/ /hUM gi sa bon dbus su bsams/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /nyi ma'i dbus
su gzhag par bya/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /me yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis/ /kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su/ /
sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi/ /dang po stong pa nyid du bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya/ /dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /gya
gyu phyag na rdo rje ste/ /lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no/ /mgo dang bum pa byams pa ste/ /steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni/ /'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba po/ /'jig rten gsum gyi grub
'dod na/ /sa bon de ni bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid ye shes kyis bsrung
bya| |phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /steng gi rdo rje cod pan la/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod//
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom bar bya/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /rdo rje dbyug pa gug skyed bcas/ /lu gu rgyud
la sogs pas dkri /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /de yi 'og tu las rnams bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan
pa la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya/ /de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur/ /babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya/ /rol cig rol cig rdo rje
khyod/ /zhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad kun nas khyod kyis gsol/ /skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral/ /glu 'di yis ni gar byed de/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha
yo ga mahA kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ /'di ni tshim bya thams cad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bstan par bya/ /dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la/ /de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya/ /oM yo ga a be sha ya/ /
shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /'di yis sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang / /hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis/ /sgrub pa
po yis 'dis gdab bya/ /sngar gye smos pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /oM ma na g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+hi sti tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na/ /
@#/ /bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi/ /mthong bar byas te gar byed do/ /oM ma lam la hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyis
'grub 'gyur te/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bebs bar 'gyur/ /oM mahA ci li tsi li hUM hUM phruM phaT/ /'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis/ /skyes sogs ring bo nas kyang 'bebs/ /oM ba ta li ba ta li
hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni/ /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /yi dwags 'byung po gsang ba sogs/ /lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /oM pa ta ni pa ta ni hUM phaT/ rnal
'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig /bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni/ /shing rnam kun la 'bebs par byed/ /dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/ /sngon du bsnyen
pa byas nas ni/ /shin tu ngul zhing brtags pa yis/ /de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam/ /lha ni mnyes par ma byas na/ /bdag nyid la ni co 'dri yin/ /oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM g+h+raM phuH
phaT/ thal bar lan bdun bar du ni/ /mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor/ /nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang / /cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM phu ru phu ru/ maM tre dzaHhUM phuHphaT/ /skud
pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru/ /yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yis/ /gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na/ /lce spyang bzhin du 'khyam par 'gyur/ /skud pa dang ni bral gyur na/ bdag nyid
'dod pa bzhin du byed/ byin rlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom zhing bzlas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya/ /rgyan
rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mngon du 'grub pa bya bar bsam/ /rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni/ /sa
bon stan du bsgom par bya/ /sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni/ /rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par/ /rlung gis bskor ba snying gar bzhag/ thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam/ /rang gi dbugs kyi
rtse mo yi/ /rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya/ /oM yuM pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yi gsang sngags 'di/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gro ba la sogs bzung
nas su/ /dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas su/ /thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yi/ /skud pa dmar pos dkris nas ni/ /shing
gi rtse mor gdags par bya/ /rlung gis spur bar bsgom pa ste/ /gang du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba/ /de yi phyogs su 'go bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di
la the tshom med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar bsams te/ /bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na/ /gnyis med gang
@#/ /ba'i gtor ma ni/ /de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /oM badzra DA ki nI de sha mA kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya oM hrIHhUM pheM phrung phuHphaT/ maN+Dal dmar por byugs nas ni//
seng ldeng phur bu brgyad kyis gdab/ /dbus su ming ni bris nas su/ /gtor ma yongs su gang bar ldan/ /skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang / /lan bdun bskor bas drang bar bya/ /rdo rje
lcags kyus drang nas su/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na/ /dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas/ /las 'dis bzlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu/ /
las 'dis 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mkha' 'gro drag mor bsam bya ba/ /rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar/ /mkhas pa yis ni
bsgoms nas su/ /nya mo gcig ni bzung nas su/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlab/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/ /nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni/ /rkang pas mgo ni
rab mnan la/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /oM phruM phruM a mu ka s+ya mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hrI hrI hrI/ puM phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur/ /thams
cad chu la bya ba ste/ /las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni/ /bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya/ /gang du nya ni gnas pa yi/ /nya yi kha ru gzhug par bya/
mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni/ /lan re bzlas te zar bcug na/ /bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /
bdag nyid tsaN+Da li yi gzugs/ /gzugs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni/ /de yi dbus su rab tu bya/ /

lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas pa/ /ming dang sngags kyis bzhag par bya/ /oM stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM/ b+ha g+gaM mu trAM phru phruM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su//
lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams/ /las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya/ /mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis/ /bkrus na
bcings pa las grol 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom/ /kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes/ /'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar/ /yongs su rdzogs
shing mdzes par ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /yi dwags kyi ni gdan la bzhugs/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung / /gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi/ /las ni de ru
byas nas kyang / /'bras phye la sogs khyad par las/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs ni byas nas su/ /khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya/ /ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams
@#/ /ni| |las der byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM kro d+he shwa ri phru phruM phaT/ brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje gsang bar gzhug par bya/ /las 'di sbyar zhing
gzir ba yis/ /b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste/ /phyung na de las thar bar 'gyur/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /las ni de ltar sbyar bar bya/ /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom/ /rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya/ /ban+du'i me tog rgyas pa yi/ /dbus su
lcags kyu'i yi ge ste/ /kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar/ /gsang zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya/ /khro bo'i sor mo rtse mo ru/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /sor mo 'di yis
bskyod par bya/ /sbyor pa gsum ni bsams pa yis/ /de yi dbus kyi gnas rnams su/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag bar bya/ /chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la/ /'di yis b+ha ga
brtag par bya/ /'od zer can dang bla mar bya/ /smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas/ /gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsres/ /mar nag chen pos bskol bar bya/ /sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu
dang ni/ /lce yi dbang pos myang bar bya/ /'dir ni smye 'gyur the tshom med/ /mar zos pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dwags gos ni ma lhung bas/ /mar me yi ni sdong du bya/ /klu dbang
gi ni gong du bzung / /rkang gi mar gyis spar bar bya/ /gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis/ /du ba dag ni dbab par bya/ /dur khrod du ni gtor byin la/ /brgyad
brgya ru ni bzlas nas su/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung / /gang la du ba byugs pa des/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis bzung la/ /dur khrod kyi
ni sol ba yis/ /tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni/ /bya rog sgro rtsas bri bar bya/ /oM ki ri ki ri kro d+he a mu kaM phruHphruM phaT/ snod ni gnyis la so so ru/ /gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris

la| |gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni/ /khro bos bkang ste drud par bya/ /oM ka li brtA li brtA li kro d+ha mu khe a mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badzra tiSh+Tha mu khi phruM phroM phroM phaT/ brgya phrag gcig
tu bzlas nas ni/ /myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi/ /dbang bskur na ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las/ rim par
phye ba gsum pa'o// //gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste/ /gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin/ /sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba/ /rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal/ /
gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ so sor bzung ba'i de kho na/ /yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang / /chos kyi dril bu lha mo 'o/ /
@#/ /kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste/ /thabs ni de ru thim pa'o/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor bas/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas

dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya/ /oM swA b+hA wa shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHsra b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ gzung
dang 'dzin pa las grol bas/ /sbyin pa'i ra bas sbyin par bya/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin blta bar bya/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'gro rnams
gtse bar mi bya sogs/ /sems can don ni dgag mi bya/ /steng du tshul khrims dra ba'o/ /gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs/ /bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdab/ /phur bur ba dra ba
yis| |sdang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad/ /bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur/ /rang gi sems kyis bsdams pa'o/ /rang gi rang sems btul ba na/ /bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga
la 'gyur/ /mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya/ /lus la ste 'jog tsan+dan byug /sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor
pas/ /'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya/ /mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis/ /rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/ /shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste/ /khams gsum gyi ni
mun pa rnams/ /mar me 'di yis bcom nas su/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya/ /sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya/ /mchod pa'i dus dang khyad
par du/ /gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni/ /shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul/ /bar du khru
gang bzhag nas su/ /mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya/ /snying gar hUM ni bsgom byas la/ /thams cad rig pas kun stong bya/ /khams gsum zad par byas nas ni/ /thams cad nam mkhar yang
dag gnas/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su/ /pho brang yangs par ci 'dod par/ /ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya/ /lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad
ldan/ /rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhin/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /hUM gi thig le las byung ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje bsgoms nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
rang bzhin du/ /bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya/ /yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas su/ /mkhas pas go cha byas nas hUM/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /gangs dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/
phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba
@#/ /la| |sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro/ /dngos po sgom pa bsgoms nas su/ /hUM gi sgra yis dgang bar bya/ /rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis/ /ye shes sa bon
bzlas par bya/ /btso ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar/ /sems can kun gyi don la chags/ /de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
dbus gnas par/ /sngar mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis/ /dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni
rnam par spro/ /de ltar bskyed lus rnams ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /kha dog cung
zad 'dres pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste/ /go 'phang mchog
ni bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li las byung ba'i/ /de yi sa bon bzlas bar bya/ /'dod chags sems kyi stobs kyis ni/ /btso ma gser gyi 'od dang bcas/ /sems can bsgral phyir kun tu
'khyud/ /nu ma 'khyud cing zhal gnyis 'jib/ /rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni/ /lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni/ /bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /bcu dang
brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas pa/ /mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su/ /shar gyi phyogs
su blta zhing bskyod/ /rol pa'i stobs kyis lha mo ni/ /rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs kyis mnan/ /dril bu g.yon gyi rlung mnan pa/ /nu ma lag pa gnyis kyi gzir/ /sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin
can te/ /'og mas gnon po btsir bar bya/ /dril bu lag gnyis gsang bar sbyor/ /de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas/ /shar phyogs su ni bskyod pa yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol
bar 'gyur/ /lha mo g.yon pa nas su/ /lho ru kha ni blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su/ /rkang mthil gnyis kyi de bzhin btsir/ /dril bu lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /rked pa bsdams
te btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas nu ma dang / /de bzhin gsang bar rtse bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis/ /lho phyogs
sems can sgrol bar 'gyur/ /nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis/ /lha mo nub tu blta bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis/ /g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya/ /mgrin pa'i rgyab
nas gnyis 'khyud de/ /dril bu'i lce ni bskyod nas su/ /rdo rje lce la reg par bya/ /de bzhin sbyar nas gnyis ka bzlas/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam pa'o//
@#/ /dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang / /rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya/ /gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas/ /de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
sngags bzlas nas/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur
cig /skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor dang / /skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can/ /kun nas kun tu skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni gsang sngags ston/ /dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas
pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni/ /gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de/ /rang nyid lha mod bsam pa bya/ /slar yang 'di nyid rab tu bya/ /rang gi rjes su chags pa'i
sems/ /de nas rdo rjes kun tu 'khyud/ /de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru/ /ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya/ /rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu las byung
ba'i me tog ni/ /gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las/ /rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste/ /ban du ka ni rgyas pa 'dra/ /thong ga gnyis kyi sa bon rnams/ /sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no/ /'og tu chu
yi rang bzhin la/ /myu gu me yi sa bon no/ /sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su/ /dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can/ /ska bo che la sogs pas dkri/ /lha mo'i
gzugs su bsams nas su/ /sa yi nang du thim par bya/ /dus me'i yi dwags mer sbyor cing / /yi dwags me dang dus me sbyor/ /lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba/ /mthe chung mthe bos mnan nas
su| |gsum bo dag ni rtse mor sbyor/ /phyag rgya gnyis kyi mgor btsugs nas/ /bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam ba yis/ /gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas//
dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya/ /g.yon gyi cha ni ban du ka/ /chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can/ /chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la/ /der ni phyag rgyas bskul

bar bya/ /rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i tshul du bya/ /thong ka la sogs gnas kun tu/ /de nas sor mo gdab par bya/ /de nas rdo rje rtse mo ni/ /phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya/ /
gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+mo bsgul bar bya/ /hUM gi sgra yis bkang nas su/ /lha mo thams cad tshim par bya/ /dril bu yi ni dngos po yis/ /A li sa bon kun tu sbyin/ /ye shes sa bon

rdo rje rtse/ /bdag gi lha ni mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu lus yin te/ /phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /de kho na yis so sor bzung / /rdo rje de kho na bskyod la/ /dril bu
rang dgar dkrol bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te/ /phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin/ /lus ni gnyis ka mnyes par yis/ /sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /gnyi ga yi ni bdag nyid
@#/ /sems/ /chu de byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sgeg cing bskyod par gnas ba ste/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje rol pa'i rkang pa ste/ /dril bu g.yon gyi brla
yis rol/ /lag g.yon 'khyud cing nu ma bzung / /g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor bar bya/ /bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa yis/ /yang dang yang du spro bar bya/ /dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /brla yi stan
la 'dug nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni/ /dku yi gnas su gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa gcig gis 'khyud nas ni/ /g.yon pas dril bu gsil bar bya/ /ngo mtshar bcas

bzhad sgeg pa yis/ /yang dang yang du sprad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje glu blang zhing / /sna tshogs hUM zhes bya bar 'dod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su/ /slar yang glu ni blang bar bya/ /'khor lo stong
pa snying po med pa ni/ /snying po dag ni shin tu bsams pa ste/ /rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste/ /dngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub/ /phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa/ /
de yis don ni yang dag byed par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbus su snying po 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas/ /de nas de ltar glu blang bya/ /
mnyam gzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /las ni gang zhig bsam pa rnams/ /de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sman la sogs pa'i khyad par

rnams/ /bskyod pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya/ /gur gum dang ni gi wang dang / /ka ra sbrang rtsi pa la sha/ yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa/ /sbyor ba'i gnas su bzung bar bya/ /rdzas de dag ni bsgos nas su/ /
rtag tu thig le byas gyur na/ /rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas/ /thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /dbang po lag dang ru rta dang / /rmongs byed ma dang rangs byed ma/ /bdag gi lnga dang yan lag lnga//
lnga po thams cad cha bsnyams la/ /bza' dang btung dang so rtsi dang / /zhib tu btags te sbyar la sbyin/ /thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te/ /'chi ba na yang gtor mi 'gyur/ /khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor
ba yis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur/ /bdag gis lus la gshegs gsol ba/ /bdag nyid ji ltar
dga' bar bya/ /sems can don phyir blo ldan pas/ /thams cad dbang du 'du bar sgrub/ /brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos/ /zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos/ /rgyas
pa'i las ni sbyar bar bya/ /rje rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis/ /dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya/ /lham mkhan bshan pa nya pa mos/ /mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags/ /kla klo gdol pa tshos
mkhan mas/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya/ /gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing par bya/ /sems can bsgral
@#/ /ba'i gnas yin te/ /gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bskyod/ /de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya bcing / /mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / /dbye ba'i stabs dang / zlum
po'i stabs dang / gsum gnon pa'i stabs dang / rus sbal gyi stabs dang / g.yas brkyang dang / g.yon brkyang dag/ gnas gcig pa dang / 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i cho gas dang /
rgya mtsho'i rlabs pa dang / ri bo dpung pa dang / rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang / mnyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi
me dang / snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o/ /rkang stabs bskyod pa bco brgyad ni/ /mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/ /yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i
gnas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ snying gar btsir ba dang / rkang pa sbyar ba dang / phreng ba'i tshul dang / nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyi ga sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud
pa dang / /lag pa gnyis sbyar ba dang / gsang par reg pa dang / lus mnye ba dang / kos ko la reg pa'o/ /lag pa'i thabs nyid bcu dang ni/ /zhal ni bzhad cing sgeg pa dang / /mtshan
nyid sna tshogs ldan pa yis/ /de yis las rnams 'grub par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /de kho na yis so sor bzung / /gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na/ /dril bus ji ltar 'bras

bu 'grub/ /rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang / nyi na mo zla bas ci zhig
nus/ /de bas rdo rje dril bu dang / /mnyam pa de nyid gsal bar byed/ /A li kA li mnyam bsgom nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa bos/ /A li rdo rje zhes byar brjod/ /kA li de bzhin gshegs
ma yin/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /sems can don rnams ma lus pa/ /lha yi gzugs kyis bri bar bya/ /phyi rol shes rab thabs rnams kyis/ /
ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /rmongs pa phyi rol sems ldan pas/ /de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin/ gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che/ /rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin/ /gang zhig
lung ni shes gyur pa/ /de yi rnal 'byor pa ru grags/ /shel ltar dag pa'i sems la ni/ /de yi chos ni bstan par bya/ /gal te sems ni the tsom na/ /skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung
'dod la dga' ba ma yin cing / /longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya/ /sems can don bya'i phyir du ni/ /rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs/ /gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thabs
kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te/ /rang dga' skad cig yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o/ /skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod/ /gsang
@#/ /ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par/ /A li'i sa bon gzung bar bya/ /bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla/ /gang yang cung zad
lus dang ngag/ lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya/ /thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson/ /dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis/ /'gro ba thar ba de ring thob/ /e
ma chos kyi mchog gi lam/ /e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po/ /e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam/ /tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ /smyung ba
med par bstan pa ste/ /'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod/ /bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed/ /las kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams/ /sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod/ /zla ba'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par/ /drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par bya/ /de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni/ /sngon bzhin de nyid bsgom par bya/ /sngags pas sum 'bum bzlas nas
su| |phyi nas las ni bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge nyis 'gyur thig le dang / /rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar bzhag pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du/ /
bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni/ /de nyis las rnams 'bad de sgrub/ /yi dwags gos la sogs bzung la/ /lha mo ser mo tshon rtsi bri/ /phyogs gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs can//
dkar dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus/ /ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste/ /skra ni lhug pas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dwags kyi ni stan la bzhugs/ /skyes bu'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs/ /don yod
grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /glang po'i pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /kha T+waM mchog gis brgyan pa ste/ /g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnams/ /hUM gi sgra yis
'jigs par mdzad/ /'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/ /lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya/ /sa yi dbus sogs sbyor bar bya/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa
yis/ /gnyis med gtor mas dgang bar bya/ /gal te 'byor na yi dwags mo/ /tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni/ /yam shing thang shing las byas pa'am/ /zho can lnga yi shing las bya/ /mchod
pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang / /sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya/ /sbrang rtsi khrag la sbags pa dag/ brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de lta bsregs pa tsam gyis ni/ /des ni mtshan ma ston
par 'gyur/ /oM smraM phruM phuHphaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya/ /dang pos ni 'gul 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul/ /gsum
pa la ni dri chen 'byung / /bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te/ /lnga par sgrub pa'i grogs por ni/ /seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su/ /drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i
@#/ /sgra ni sgrogs par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya sogs byin nas/ /gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang / /stan ni bdag gir
mdzad du gsol/ /de nas lha mo dngos bstan nas/ /bdag gis bu yi ci zhig sgrub/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas su/ /de la phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su/ /de
ltar bdag gi 'di mdzod cig/ bdag nyid la ni lha mo 'grub/ /oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hUM hUM hUM dza dza dza swAhA/ /spyi bor lag pa bzhag nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya/ /sha
dang khrag dang sran chen bcas/ /gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin/ /yi dwags bgrod par gnas nas su/ /rtag pa'i dus su byin gyis brlab/ /lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /dri za mi'am
ci dang ni/ /yi dwags mi mo gang 'dod pa/ /bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na/ /phran tshegs mi mo smos ci dgos/ /bka' ni bsgo btsam gyis su/ /lha min klu yi gnas rnams
kyang / /gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams/ /myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang yang dgra rnams gsad pa dang / /bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur/ /las rnams kun byed lha
mo ste/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /stag mo lce spyang 'ug pa mo/ /las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste/ /dngos grub de ltar shes byas la/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje dril

bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung / /rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing / /dril bu chos kyi lha mo'o/ /phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin/ /kun rig pas ni thams cad sgrub/ /sbyor ba'i gdan
zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// //rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i/ /slob dpon dag ni gzung bya ba/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor sogs ldan/ /'khor ba las sgrol
mnyam nyid kyi/ /ji bzhin lam gyi 'khor ba las/ /sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon/ /slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing / /bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi//
bcom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /cha
shas byang chub yan lag gnas/ /dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de/ /ba sbu rnams ni dgra bcom mo/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar
yon tan ldan pa'i skur/ /rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta/ /ye shes can ni shes bya ba/ /mtshan nyid gang yin bstan par bya/ /shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sems can
kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas/ /rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig/ /thams cad du ni snyan par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin lta/ /sbyin pa la
@#/ /sogs rtag tu dga'/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /mnyam nyid sems
ni bskyed pas na/ /sems can rnams kyi mgon skyob yin/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa/ /'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi/ /de nyid mtshan
nyid mnyan par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor blta/ /dam tshig spyod pa dang lta nyid/ /gtor ma gsang ba la sogs ldan/ /slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya/ /smad na myur du mnar
med 'gro/ /kun tu dam tshig med pa dang / /stan dang mal dang lham sogs dang / /gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams/ /grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya/ /bzlog dang gzir
ba'i tshig brjod min/ /'das na de ni dus kun tu/ /gdon gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang / /nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed/ /de yi grib
ma 'goms gyur na/ /mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod/ /slob dpon smod par gang byed pa/ /rmi lam na yang dngos grub med/ /slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yi/ /skyon rnams
nam yang gzung bya min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro/ /bslab ba sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/ /de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya/ /sngar bstan yi
ge gcig pa yis/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya/ /de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis/ /yi ge brgyad po
bsgom par bya/ /gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur ba'i/ /de yi chos ni shes par bya/ /sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la/ /ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dbang ni bskur
nas su/ /thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan/ /dang por slob mas bya ba ni/ /bla gos phrag par gzar nas su/ /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag/ /sa la legs par btsugs nas ni//
thal mo snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang gi lha ru rab bsgoms la/ /lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos
dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa/ /rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang / /don yod grub
pa la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus tshod 'di nas bzung nas su/ /byang
@#/ /chub snying por mchis par du/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing / /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis
chos khrims 'di bgyi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du/ /mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba

d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /lus bsdams
pas ni dam tshig srung / /sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya/ /de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas/ /gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya/ /
lag pas lag pa bzung nas su/ /slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi/ /sbyor
ba'i gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnam shes nas/ /rnal 'byor ldan bas sgrib g.yogs rnams su dral ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i nyes dmigs
bskyod pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su/ /rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de nyid rgyal bor 'gyur/ /AHni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /hUM ni nyon
mongs sreg pa ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste/ /sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab/ /de nas mig phye mthong ma thag/ kun la yan lag lngas btud nas/ /bdag
gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid/ /sbyor ba'i gdan du gding bar bya/ /de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/ /lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin
mtshon byas la/ /de nas bslab sogs yang bya ste/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin/ /ha zhes pa yis kha dog
'phrog /ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed/ /hrIHyis nus pa gzhom bya ste/ /la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni/ /mgo bos btud de

dbul bar bya/ /oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dzo pa s+thA nA ya At+mA naM ni R+ya ta yA mi/ oM A tsAR+ya pU dzo bas+thA nA ya at+mA ni ni R+ya ta yA mi/ oM sarba satwa pa ri trA Na ar+thA ya At+mA naM ni R+ya ta yA mi/ nga rgyal dang
ni khro ba dang / /brlang dang tshig rtsub spang bar bya/ /sdig pa'i grogs po sbang bya ste/ /srog gcod rku ba de bzhin no/ /longs spyod kun la mi chags shing / /bdag nyid nges bar chog shes
bya| |gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i/ /phyi rol bstan bcos zhes ni bya/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hoHa A/ aM aHhUM dza/ rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /yan lag drug gi sa bon bzung
@#/ /gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas/ /rtag tu bla ma yon dbul bya/ /rang gi
bu dang chung ma dang / /gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang / /glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu/ /rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni/ /gos dang 'bru
la sogs pa'i nor/ /stan dang mal cha lham la sogs/ /gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul/ /mthar ni rang ga lus nyid kyang / /bla ma'i yon du phul nas su/ /chos rnams
rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /dngos pos rang bzhin med pa ru/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan/ /sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la gzir mi bya/ /gzhan
la tshig rtsub smra mi bya/ /thams cad mi dgar bya ba min/ /tshul khrims sdom pa srung ba dang / /skye bo rnams la gnod mi bya/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya ste/ /de bas shi bar gyur
kyang bla/ /rab tu 'bar me mtshungs pas na/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /dngos la sred pa'i blun po rnams/ /bdag nyid srid ba mi bzad ltung / /rags dang phra mo tsam la yang //
rnal 'byor pa yis rdzun srung ngo / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /de la rdzun smra yod pa min/ /spyod la legs par bsdams pa dang / /bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs
par bsdam/ /dga' dang rtse la'ang legs par sdoms/ /gtor ma'i dus su'ang legs bsdam bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams/ /sems can dga' bas 'grub bar 'gyur/ /
gang zhig kun shes slob ma la/ /sems can spro ba bstan par bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni/ /thams cad mnyam par blta bar bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya/ /rnal
'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya/ /sems can dman pa sred pa'i gzhis/ /tshong byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te/ /de yi myu gu ljon shing gis/ /'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gog par byed/ /
mtho ris longs spyod 'dod pa yi/ /lus can rnams ni byams pas na/ /dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis/ /bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /glegs
bam bklag par mi bya'o/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing zhing / /sngags kyi ye shes bzla mi bya/ /bstan bcos dag na rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa bka'/ /slob dpon dag gi lung
gis ni/ /khas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni/ /bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog/ /bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar
bya| |gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las/ /rim par phye ba dang po'o// //der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba/ /nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa
@#/ /rnams/ /srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung / /lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas/ /de nyid chos ni stan du gsol/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni tshad ma ci/ /sngags dang phyag
rgya ji lta bu/ /chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi/ /lus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gtor ma'i las/ /rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang / /gang gis 'gro ba sgrub pa yi/ /mtshan
nyid tshad mas ji ltar lags/ /mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad/ /ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon/ /bdag gi khams ni mi brtan pas/ /gtor ma'i las dang bzlas pa dang / /dkyil
'khor me dang chu yi las/ /phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi/ /'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang / /srid pa'i rgyu mtshor ltung bar 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ /
srid pa so sor 'byung ba rnams/ /gang gis de yi tshad ma ste/ /sems ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /yid ni the tshom skyes par 'gyur/ /'khor ba khyod kyis dris pa nyon/ /sems ni yid
kyis bkrus nas su/ /rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa/ /mkha' 'gro rlung gis bcings pa yis/ /sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par/ /bsam gtan dmigs pas
'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams/ /rtag tu 'dod yon spyod pa ste/ /de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni/ /rang 'dod sa la sogs pa 'grub/ /de las sgrol
ba'i dngos po rnams/ /de yi don ni gang yin pa/ /nga yis legs par bshad par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus nyon/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnam shes dang / /lhan cig 'gro bas 'gro bar
'gyur/ /rnam shes rnam par shes pa yis/ /phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub/ /sems kyi ngo bo the tshom pas/ /bcom ldan de yang bshad du gsol/ /shes rab rnam shes dngos
rang bzhin/ /mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags/ /rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis/ /the tshom gyur pa nyan par 'tshal/ /shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i sems/ /sems la skyon dang
yon tan med/ /yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yis/ /srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin/ /gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos/ /yul gnas pa yi zhi gyur nas/ /ji ltar gnas bzhin rab
sbyor ba/ /bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya/ /de yi dbus su shes bya ba/ /rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra/ /kha dog med cing thams cad mtshon/ /mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste/ /gzugs med
po ni kun gyi gzugs/ /de bzhin thung du ring po min/ /sems kyi de kho na nyid kyis/ /dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid thams
cad ster ba'o/ /dngos po med par bsgom pa yis/ /bsgom pa dag ni mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste/ /thams cad kun nas
@#/ /dmigs pa yis/ /rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med pa 'o/ /gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po/ /rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag/ bstan bcos klog la sogs
sbas shing / /yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang ring / /mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni/ /bla ma'i lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing / /sems kyang
gdung bar mi bya 'o/ /lus ni gdung bar mi bya'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas
nas ni/ /lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag /mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su/ /dbugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar gzung / /thong ga kun tu spangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar
bya| |'bad de mnyam nyid sems kyis ni/ /de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la/ /yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang / /yid kyi me tog mchod par bya/ /rang bzhin dri yis byugs nas su/ /
shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus/ /kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya/ /kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste/ /drag
por ldan pa'i sa bon nyid/ /tshangs pa'i sgo ru shin tu bsrung / /thams cad gzugs kyi 'jig byed pa/ /dril bu chu yi yi ge ste/ /stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /sna dang rna ba dag la
dgod/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni/ /lce dbang rtse mor gzung bar bya/ /seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis/ /thong ga kun tu
gzung bar bya/ /ce sbyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni/ /snying ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /lte ba'i tshigs ni gdan gyi sgor/ /phyugs kyi sa bon gyis bsrung ngo / /lha mo brgyad du sbyar nas ni/ sa bon
brgyad po gzung bar bya/ /de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste/ /lus kun du ni shin tu 'bar/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis las ni/ /dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab/ /'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin/ /'jug
pas brlabs pa'i mdog lta bu/ /steng gi mche ba gnyis kyi ni/ /lce yis bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu/ /lce chung gsang ba'i nang du dbab/ /dpral ba'i sde dang sna dang ni/ /rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab
dag tu/ /kha zas lta bu'i dngos po ni/ /kun nas drangs te gzhag par bya/ /mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog/ bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus nas su/ /lhag ma
'og tu thim par bya/ /'og tu rlung gi sa bon gyis/ /'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs/ /chu ni mjug do rtsibs logs dang / /de bzhin mchan khung gnyis dang ni/ /dus dang yi dwags
me rkang pa/ /tshigs rnams kun dang snying gnas/ /bdud rtsi btung ba gang yin pa/ /ba lang rmig par thim nas ni/ /sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur bzhag /lus kun la ni gnas pa yi/ /
@#/ /bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa dag/ lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas/ /de yi rnal 'byor brtags pa yin/ /snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba/ /mdangs ldan shin
tu mdzes shing gsal/ /gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra/ /zla ba de dbus 'o ma'i rgyun/ /bdud rtsi'i kun rig gug skyed bcas/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od ni shin tu bsil/ /ma ning rnams ni spangs
pa yis/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi/ /gnas rnams kun tu bskor bar bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/ /rtag tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas
su| |gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi/ /ye shes lus su bsgom par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la/ /'o ma'i zla ba sa bon dag/ phyag 'tshal
srog pa'i mtha' ldan pa/ /mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas byas nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang / /bkres skom la sogs med par
'gyur| |lo ni brgya phrag du mar 'tsho/ /gzugs dang gzi brjid na tshod ldan/ /rims dang dug la sogs pa dang / /grang dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams/ /ye shes can gyi ye shes
lus/ /yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi'i rtsa ba dmigs pa yis/ /myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur pas/ /gzugs dang ye shes bdag nyid
che| |de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni/ /stong pa'i brag la sogs par brten/ /bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems/ /ye
shes can gyi de kho nas/ /dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan/ /ye shes dbang las nyan par 'tshal/ /gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni/ /'dod chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yi/ /rang gi lus
ni bkru bya ba/ /ye shes sems dpa' mnyan par gyis/ /rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi/ /stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis/ /phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na/ /lus ni shel dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /
shel dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos/ /dri med dung dang kun 'dra/ /ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyi/ /chos kyi tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /nyes byas legs
byas las byung ba/ /gang gis rang bzhin las rgyal ba/ /ye shes kyis ni snang bar bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis/ /'gro ba'i dngos kun zad par bya/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed
pa yis/ /gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na/ /de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba/ /zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon te/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /de yi dbus su btu bar bya/ /de yi sa bon de
nyid kyis/ /'od zer phreng ba bsam par bya/ /sa bon de nyid gang gis ni/ /myur du ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ /gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yi/ /ye shes sku ru de nas bsgom/ /
@#/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ /sa bon gang zhig bzla ba ni/ /sde tshan
gsum pa gang yin pa'i/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /dbyug pa spyi bo rdo rje dang / /ska bo che la sogs pa dkri/ /sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas
par bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po sgom byas la/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas/ /'og min la sogs snang bar bya/ /'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis/ /
sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam/ /rnal 'byor snang bar 'dod pa yis/ /rtag tu sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /snying gar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hUM zhes bya ba dbang phyug
mchog /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sna tshogs
'bar ba yi/ /ye shes sa bon de dbus bsam/ /de las byung ba'i ye shes lus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid de/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i
stan la bzhugs pa ste/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'o ma'i sa bon bsam/
kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu de nyid bsgom par bya/ /kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las/ /kun tu rdul phran dkar pos dgang / /pha rol dngos po dmar po ru/ /zla ba'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsams nas su/ /gang gi snying gi dbus su ni/ /de yi rnam shes gzung bar bya/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i phyogs
brgyad du/ /kha dog dmar po bsams na ni/ /rtag tu mnyam nyid lta ba yis/ /blo ldan pha rol sems shes bya/ /kun nas dpag tshad phyi rol du/ /rnal 'byor bas ni gang bsams na/ /
de yi bsam pa thams cad ni/ /yi ge de yis ston par 'gyur/ /gal te pha rol cha yis ni/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas/ /gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis/ /kun nas thams
cad shes byas la/ /dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /de nas me yi las kyi bdag /sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /ye she sme yi bdag nyid
la| |sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/ /thams cad sems kyis byin brlabs pas/ /skye bo'i lus can ye shes me/ /thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pa/ /me yi de nyid mnyan
par gyis/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsregs pas ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus nyid kyi/ /dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste/ /me yi thabs kyi gnas
@#/ /yin la/ /klu dbang 'khyil ba'i bskor ba yin/ /yi ge thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /de dbus pad+ma rig pa yis/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /
ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung / /mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha mi logs su ni/ /drag mo thim bya me dang 'dra/ /lte ba dmar po 'bar ba
la| |lha mo'i rtse mo ro langs ma/ /g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la/ /drag tu 'bar ba gtum mo ste/ /me lnga yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta/ /chu dang me
dang rlung dang ni/ /sa dang ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la/ /sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no/ /bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas/ /dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya/ /ba
lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni/ /'dzag pa der ni thim par bya/ /me yi dbus su bsreg pa'i gzhi/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /'di ltar da khyon bsgoms nas/ /bdag nyid
rgyas phyir bsreg par bya/ /cung zad bzang dang btung la sogs/ /rung bar byas nas bza' bar bya/ /'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bu lon du yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i
gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las/ /rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// //spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa/ /mnyam nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi/ /lus kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan
nyid rnams/ /lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal/ /'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang / /gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon/ /sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ /nye bar zhi nas kA lir 'jug/ lus las spu rnams
skye ba ni/ /kun tu chu yi tshad ma ste/ /chu la lus ni ma yin te/ /lus la chu yi tshad ma yin/ /lus kun la ni khyab pas na/ /blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o/ /lus ni rdo rje lha mo yin/ /lus kyi yan lag
thams cad la/ /me 'bar lta bur dro ba ste/ /kha zas smin pa'i tshad ma yin/ /me ni tshad mar rab tu grags/ /yan lag thams cad khyab pa yi/ /me ni kun rig dmar yin pas/ /lus ni drag
mor bstan pa ste/ /bdag nyid tshad mar rab tu grags/ /bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas/ /rang gi lus kun khyab pa ste/ /dbugs rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis/ /mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar
grags/ /lus la brten pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su/ /thams cad lha mo ro langs mar/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te/ /gzugs
sogs dbang po yon tan ldan/ /gzugs la sogs pa snang ba na/ /sa ni tshad ma'i gnas yin no/ /mdzes ma zhes bya rab tu grags/ /de ni lha mo gtum mo ste/ /kun gyi gtso mor rab tu
grags/ /yid ni the tshom gcod pa ste/ /byed po sdud po za po'ang yin/ /dbang po kun gyi sems rnams kyis/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa/ /
@#/ /yul la sogs pa nyer spyod kyi/ /rnal 'byor tshad ma mkhas pa yis/ /lus la ye shes bstan par bya/ /sems las chu ni byung bas na/ /rnam shes chu
ru gyur pa ste/ /gal te chu ni gzhan yin na/ /ci phyir zhe na chu mi 'byung / /lus la nges par drod yod na/ /chu yi nang du bying mi 'gyur/ /lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas/ /lnga po gcig gi
bdag nyid 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas/ /rnal 'byor ba yis 'gro ba brtag/ de yi mtshan nyid shes bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/ /de nyid
rnal 'byor grogs kyi ni/ /'khor ba'i pha rol brgal bar 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po'i ye shes ni/ /gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur/ /sgong skyes khyim gyi gnas su ni/ /dbus
su gnas pa bcing ba bya/ /'byung dang 'byung min sems kyi ni/ /g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya/ /bcing ba'i gnas dang stan dag ni/ /rnam shes pad+ma'i stan la'o/ /rnal 'byor pa
yis de yi phyir/ /rnam shes rang bzhin mtshon par bya/ /gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yi/ /rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur/ /lte bar
chu shing me tog ni/ /snying gar yang ni 'greng ste gnas/ /rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te/ /mkhas pas rtag tu bzlog par bya/ /ge sar dang ni ldan pa yi/ /rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad du
'gyur/ /de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni/ /ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba ste/ /sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char/ /de dang mthun pa'i sor drug pa'o/ /mdud pa yi ni nub phyogs char/ /'og tu sor ni
lnga pa'o/ /zhing de la ni sa bon dang / /'od zer tshogs kyi myu gur 'gyur/ /sa bon de yi 'od zer gyis/ /chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi sa bon la/ /lto yi 'og nas dgar
bar bya/ /pad+mo mdzes pa bkas pa yis/ /'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+mo de yi stan la ni/ /sgong skyes ye shes gnas dag la/ /dbus su shel ltar dag pa yis/ /ye shes
rnam shes dbu ma nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar gnas pa ste/ /dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon/ /mtshams su sen mo la sogs pa'i/ /ma ning yi ge
sngar bstan bzhin/ /snying gar dngos po dngos po yis/ /snying gar yi ge blta bar bya/ /ba lang rmig pa'i steng du ni/ /sgo dgu pa yis bdud rtsi yis/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bkru/ /yi ge dkar
po brgyad po rnams/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge dkar po yi/ /'od 'bar ba spu'i khung nas spro/ /rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad du/ /'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang / /nyal ba la sogs dus
kun du/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon bzla/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom bzlas na/ /ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa/ /'khor ba'i pha rol
@#/ /brgal bar 'gyur/ /g.yo ba med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid/ /ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par
gyis/ /lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa/ /'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya/ /sgo dgu po ni ji lta bu/ /ye shes sgo yi bye brag gis/ /yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu/ /ye shes dbang las mnyan
par 'tshal/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams/ /yang dag par sbyor mnyan par gyis/ /lam bzang po yis mdzes pa'i gnas/ /lam ngan srid pa'i skyon gyis gos/ /thig le lte ba spyi
gtsug dang / /mig dang sna dang rna srid sgo/ /chu dang chu min sgo yin te/ /sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin/ /lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te/ /thig les gzugs khams kyi lus can/ /
steng nas steng du gnas de ru/ /mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag
por 'gro/ /srid pa'i sgo yis yi dwags te/ /de bzhin gci bas dud 'gro'o/ /chu min rnam shes myur ba ru/ /dmyal ba brgyad du shes bya'o/ /sgo rnams kyi ni bye brag gis/ /'khor ba'i
bye brag 'byung ba yin/ /de bas sgo yi bye brag las/ /sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa ni/ /rims la sogs pas ma phog
par/ /gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog/ sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yi/ /sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis/ /sgo ni dgag pa bsgom bya ste/ /de la 'og gi
sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum pa can du sgom/ /lus ni rlung gi

mdog tu ste/ /sems ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sa bon drag mo yis/ /
lcags kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis/ /gnas nas drag tu drang bar bya/ /gnas dad gnas nas steng du dbye/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng du bya/ /steng du smin

pa'i sa bon dang / /yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis sbyang / /drag mo'i nga ror brjod bya ste/ /brgyad ni mtha' yi sa bon la/ /sde tshan dang po'i dang po ni/ /yi ge phyed du sbyar bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi
dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya/ /rlung gi sa bon ldan pa yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams nas/ /gong nas de bzhin
steng gnas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la/ /steng gi rtsa la bzla bar bya/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /
@#/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag/ lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /srid pa'i skyon las
ring du 'gro/ ji ltar 'dam nas skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ /dus min lha rnams gsod
par 'gyur/ /de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams/ /mthong nas mkhas pas sbyor ba brtsam/ /rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis/ /de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun
rig pas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bsgom par bya/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam/ /de 'od nyi mar 'bar ba yis/ /gzugs rnams zad
par bsams nas ni/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par bya/ /gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnas par bsam/ /sa
bon gyis ni bskyed bya ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /spyan
gsum cod pan gyis brgyan zhing / /bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yi/ /kun da zla ba ltar dkar zhing / /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' bsnams/ /sems
dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro ba mdzad/ /g.yas kyi dang po mda' yin te/ /gnyis pa yis ni lcags kyu rnams/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon pa khro ba'i
sdigs mdzub ste/ /gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa thogs/ /go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsnams/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ /dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya/ /yan lag brgyad
du rab 'bad nas/ /sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon ji bzhin ba tu bar bya/ /'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams/ /kun tu kha dog dkar por bya/ /chu shing me
tog pad+mo la/ /snying gar sgong skyes gzhag par bya/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /de nas
phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su me yin te/ /me yi dbus su nyi ma la/ /
A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /de yi sa bon dmar por dgod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang 'jug par bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /dbus su bsnun dang
ldan par bya/ /'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /'byung ba 'jug min bzlas bya zhing / /'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung
@#/ /'jug dang / /bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya/ /'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang / /'jug pa yis ni mtshon byas la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dag /
de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /pha rol
sems dang rjes mthun par/ /mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag sti bsam/ /gang gi lam nas bsams nas ni/ /
'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las/ rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// //gsang ba'i gdan gyi gsang ba nyid/ /sems
dang ye shes 'dres pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim ci 'dra/ /ye shes dbang las mnyan par 'tshal/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don/ /byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon/ /'dod
chags la sogs rim spangs nas/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed par bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni/ /khams dang sems ni bde ba yis/ /
snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya/ /yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos/ /slob dpon lung gis rjes 'gro zhing / /gsang chen de nyid don sgom pa/ /gcig nas gcig brgyud de nyid
can/ /thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas/ /thams cad stong pa nyid du bya/ /dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni/ /byang chub rim pas btso bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye
shes mkha' 'gro bsam byas te/ /zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi/ /kun da zla ba ltar dkar mdog/ zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams
kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/ /nyid kyi thugs kar 'tshir bar mdzad/ /gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ /ye shes
sems dpa' bdag ces brjod/ /chu shing me tog lte ba nas/ /snying gi bar du 'greng ste gnas/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlog nas/ /sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par bya/ /ge sar dang ni lte bar
bcas/ /'dab brgyad shin tu mdzes pa ste/ /dbus kyi sgong skyes la gnas par/ /yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya/ kha dog dmar po dag cing gsal/ /dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i
gtso/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /shar du byams par ldan pa yi/ /mi bskyod pa yi sa bon bsam/ /lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste/ /rin chen sa bon de
nyid do/ /nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med kyi sa bon dgod/ /byang gi cha yi 'dab ma la/ /don yod gtso bo bsam par bya/ /dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon/ /thig le
@#/ /dbyug par ldan rim bzhin/ /'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste/ yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /phyogs mtshams dag ni bzhi po ru/ /sngon du bstan pa'i
ma ning dgod/ /de yi dbus su de yi sems/ /yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya/ /stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las/ /ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi/ /sems ni ya mtshan skyes par gyur/ /bcom
ldan bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las/ /chu shing snying ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin/ /snying po med pa'i snying por gyur//
de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon/ /dbus na gnas pa ye shes te/ /ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing / /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku/ /dngos
dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /yi ge'i gzugs ni yi ge med/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni/ /rnal 'byor can kyis de nyid bzung / /gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas/ /
mnyam nyid ye shes ldan pa dang / /de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni/ /ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid/ /
bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan/ /de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad/ /'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru/ /'di ni kun tu bsgom par bya/ /rgyas pa'i lnga yi mchod rten te/ /bdud
rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/ /'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag pas bkru/ /thigs pa'i dbus su sa bon ni/ /mthe bong tsam gyi zlum por bya/ /de yi dbus kyi
sa bon ni/ /A li kA li dag las btu/ /kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro/ /de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni/ /thig le bsam par rab tu grags/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya yi
cha| |rdul phran gzugs su kun tu bsam/ /rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi/ /mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes pas/ /thig le gnas kyi go 'phang
blta/ /snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni/ /thigs pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu/ /bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya/ /phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang / /bstan bcos
las kyang ring ba yin/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor pa rnyed par dka'/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i/ /thabs dang ldan na sgrub pa bo/ /bla ma'i lung gi lam gyis
ni| |mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya/ /mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po sgom/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te/ /yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis 'dag /
de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin/ /blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya/ /gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas/ /snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya/ /sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa/ /de kho nar ni gzugs
@#/ /min no| |rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/ /de kho na nyid mthong ba min/ /gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la/ /sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya/ /kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang / /'og

dang 'og min yang dag gnas/ /rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar bya/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni/ /thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /phyi rol dag ni spangs nas su/ /yid kyis

bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /rtag pa chos kyi dbyibs nyid kyis/ /mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas/ /rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas/ /ye shes la ni rnam shes thim/ /rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas/ /byang chub

rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /mar me lta bur thams cad du/ /snang gyur mtshan ma dang po ste/ /srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul/ /mthong ba'i mtshan ma gnyis pa yin/ /gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor pas/ /nyon mongs
'joms pa'i mtshan ma ste/ /rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de bzhin phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa lha yi longs spyod rnams/ /sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste/ /mtho ris gzugs kyi

lha rnams ni/ /sems kyis mthong ba lnga pa yin/ /gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste/ /bdun pa chos kyi sa la 'o/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rang dgar spyod/ /mchod rten gzugs
kyi khyad par las/ /dbyibs kyi gzugs ni ji lta bu/ /lha yi rnam dag bsgoms pa rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /lus can rnams la yang dag blta/ /yang dag de nyid shes nas su//

de nyid sbyor bas cam pa yi/ /rab sbyor rdo rje mnyan par gyis/ /snying gar zla ba bsams nas su/ /dbus su hUM ni bsgom par bya/ /me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal/ /spyi gtsug dkar por yang dag ldan/ /me lce 'bar bas

bcom nas ni/ /thams cad kun nas zad par bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas/ /de nyid stong pa nyid du bya'i/ /de nas zla bar sa bon ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas su/ /mchod rten pho brang gnas nyid ni/ /de
la sems kyis bskyed par bya/ gya gyu sa zhes brjod pa ste/ /phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na/ /dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas par/ /lhun po'i lha yi gnas nyid do/ /'dod na spyod pa'i lus can rnams//

pre ru nges par brtag par bya/ /'og dang steng dang dbus nyid kyi/ /dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos/ /gzugs khams zhes bya'i mtho ris rnams/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /gzugs can bcu dang brgyad

por ni| |go rims ji bzhin rnam par gnas/ /gzugs med srid pa'i sems can ni/ /chos kyi srog shing nyid du thim/ /lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/ /gzugs su mchod rten bskyed par bya/ /steng gi sgo nga skyes gnas su

ni| bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste/ /sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gzugs dang stong pa'i mtha' dang ni/ /de bzhin dngos dang dngos mad nyid/ /gzungs dang 'dzin pa la
gzhan/ /legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams/ /mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid du ston pa'o/ /de yi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i/ /rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas su/ /mi g.yo 'tshe

@#/ /ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /de nyid bstan bcos lung la sogs/ /rnal

'byor dmigs pa goms byas pa'i/ /slob ma chen po'i lus can rnams/ /gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na/ /bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yis/ /rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de/ /bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi myong

ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ye shes sku ni myur du 'thob/ /ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag dang gzhan don mchog tu 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /gsang chen sbyor ba'i

mtshan nyid kyi/ /de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid/ /gang gis byang chub lam gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /bdag nyid rang dgar

byed pa yi/ /rta rgod lta bu'i sems de nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsdom par bya/ /ji ltar bung ba me tog bsnyung ba yi/ /chang gis myos shing sems ni brtan gyur te/ /longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs dang bral/ /de bzhin

bsgom pa'i lam gyis yid bcings bya/ /yid bsdoms pas ni 'grub 'gyur bas/ /dang por yid ni bsdams par bya/ /yid kyis sgrub pa'i bye brag gis/ /byang chub ye shes mtshon par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus

gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po snying gar bcing / /ston gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas/ /yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams/ /yi ge'i gnas su dgod par bya/ /rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi//

sgo ni dgag par bsam bya ste/ /bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis/ /rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya/ /me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis/ /chu dang chu min de bzhin bsrung / /chu shing me tog pad+ma ni/ /mdzes shing 'khyil ba rgyas pa dbye/ /de yi dbus

kyi sgo ngar ni/ /dud dang zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /phyogs phyogs gnas su sa bon de/ /phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi po yi/ /phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms/ /'od zer kun

nas dkar zhing dag/ lha mo'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo 'o/ /de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni/ /sems ni rang dgar bsgoms pa yis/ /phyi nas gzugs ni gzhom par bya/ /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams

dag tu/ /phyogs phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su/ /rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi/ /lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid/ /shar gyi phyogs su chu yin te/ /kha dog dkar po kunada'i 'od/ /me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar//

rtag tu byang du bsam par bya/ /rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya/ /sa yi sa bon ljang gu ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bsam par bya/ /phyogs mtshams 'dres pa'i kha dog gis/ /grwa bzhi dag tu sbyar bar bya/ /

lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te/ /sgong skyes bcas pa gzhom par bya/ /de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o/ /sems kyi dngos po stong pa bas/ /rang bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/ /rnam rtog

stong pa'i dbus dag tu/ /rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs/ /A li kA li sa bon ni/ /rdul phra na zhes bya dbus su ste/ /rnam pa med cing brjod du med/ /thams cad rdul zhes bya ba la/ /stong nyid du'ang mi dmigs te/ /gzugs

@#/ /la sogs par mi lta'o/ /rdul ni sa bon ma yin la/ /rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med/ /rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te/ /mnyam nyid dbu mar mtshon par bya/ /gzugs dang stong pa de bzhin dbus/ /de

bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung / /bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste/ /lung gi dam pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyad nas su/ /lung dang bcas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi g.yo'ang 'tshe ba med pa ru/ /dngos pos

dngos po bsgom par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dngos pos dpyad nas ni/ /byang chub rim pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /sems can don byed mchog tu brtson/ /kun rtog lus dang sems kyi ni/ /gang tshe

yul 'khor srung 'dod na/ /ye shes dbang po'i longs spyod can/ /rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing / /khams gsum ye shes kyis blta dang / /rang 'dod yid kyi gnas dang ni/ /nam mkha'

rgyu ba'i lus can dang / /sems can kun gyi gzhan don gnyer/ /mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur/ /lus dang dbang po don gnyer bas/ /bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /sbyor bas 'khor

ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams kyi yang / /sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer 'gyur/ /sgrub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang / /sgra sgrogs skye bos dben pa yi/ /tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu/ /gnas nas de ru bsgom par bya//

nA ga mu lab la sha/ /ru rta cha ni gsum po dag/ ma ga dA ni srang gcig ste/ /cha bsnyams phye mar byas nas ni/ /ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas/ /phye ma bzhi char bsres nas su/ /'di ni nyen re rnal 'byor pa/ /mkhas pa yis ni

bza' bar bya/ /rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ /nges par shin tu smin pa yis/ /grangs dang bkres skom la sogs grol/ /sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru/ /brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni/ /'dul
ba srung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /lus ni rtag tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /gnyis sprod gtam tu smra zhing ston pa ste/ /de ltar lam bshad 'chi ba yod ma
yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de ltar bstan pa min/ /rig byed chu dang de bzhin dUr ba rnams/ /bram zes spyir bzhag sangs rgyas pas gzung min/ /dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis
'jigs pas ni/ /gnas ngan lha tshogs rigs la phyag mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
'dun bye ba phrag brgyad cu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tshim nas/ thams cad kyi ye shes thob par gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can
rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/ rang dgar sems can sgol ba yi/ /rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyi/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing / /

dung ltar dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /gnyis su sbyar ba 'dzin pa po/ /te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi/ /
@#/ /'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu med dngos/ /ten hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ /srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan/ /'od zer rnon po stong phrag
nyi ma stong 'drar ldan/ /rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug mchog dang / /rol pas gar mdzad ces bya ba'i/ /bkra shis sgra
yis bkang nas su/ /thams cad kun nas glur blangs so/ /ji bzhin lam ni rdo rjes nyon/ /bstan bcos shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /gang zhig su yang rung ba las/ /yi ge'am
tshig tsam nyan byed na/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur bar ro/ /'dri 'am 'drir 'jug klog pa dang / /shin tu dad ldan sngags zlos pa'i/ /rnal
'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /srid pa'i gzugs kun bsam bzhin 'grub/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams/ /myur du byang chub rim pa thob/ /ces bdag nyid kyis
bka' stsal pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis dga' zhing mgu nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'bum phrag bco
brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsa tuHbI ThA khya ta tan+ta rA jo man+ta aM sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags
kyi cha zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig la spyod pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum
pa yi ni dang po'o/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni/ /sngags kyi de nyid khyad par nyid/ /snying po yi ni snying po'i chos/ /rab sbyor gsang zhing gsang ba yi/ /de nyid de nyid de las mchog/ snying
po'i de nyid bsdus pa 'o/ /bla ma'i ma ning gnyis bzung la/ /rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/ /spyi bor 'od dang zla ba 'o/ /sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /zla ba dkar dang kunada'i
@#/ /mdog/ gtso bo'i sngon du sbyor bar bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya zhing / /dbyangs yig mngon par mthong ba ni/ /las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/ /
bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/ /myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid/ /srid pa mchog tu sgrol ba'o/ /dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi bsgom
pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya/ /don grub 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yi/ /ban du ka yi me tog 'dra/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/ /de nyid du na rnam par thim/ /dkar po zla bas
mnan pa yi/ /gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/ /pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang / /bdud rtsi yis ni bkru bar ldan/ /dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis/ /dbyangs yig kun la khyab pa'o/ /dkar
zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/ /gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/ /bzhi par nam yang ma yin no/ /ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i/ /khyad par dbyangs yig sa bon nyid/ /mtha'
yi sngon du sa bon nyid/ /de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni/ /mnyam par gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /mgo smos go ba'i lus
nyid do/ /yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/ /lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni/ /lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya/ /dmar dang gnag sogs
sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /lnga pa drug pa'i sa bon ni/ /thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o/ /dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/ /dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang / /zhi rgyas dbang
la sogs pa ni/ /kun kyang sgra yi dbye ba'o/ /thams cad las la sgra yis ni/ /kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags/ /bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis/ /skyes bu rang 'dod pa yi las/ /nges
