sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i dam tshig go/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs ka nas 'od zer spros te/ lha
thams cad kyi dbu la 'od zer thim par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par gyur to/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ru/ /mchod
pa'i tshogs ni rnam par bstim/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya lha mo dpag med de/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis yang dag mchod/ /kye kye mtha' gnyis rnam par mi
g.yos shing / /sprul pa'i gzugs kyis 'gro don dpag med mdzad/ /'jigs byed chen po 'gro ba kun sgrol zhing / /srid pa gsum na dgyes par gar mdzad pa/ /srid pa'i
chu bo skems shing mi mthun bdud rnams 'joms/ /srid pa'i rlung gis ma g.yos thugs rje mi g.yo mgon/ /rab brjid mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan
'das kyi bstod pa chen po'i dam tshig go /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyal po rtag ldan thod pa ru/ /lcags kyu lnga sogs gzhag par bya/ /rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor
gzhag /thod pa ru ni yang dag gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud rtsi chen po dam tshig go/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /tshangs pa brgya byin gshin rje dang / /chu bdag
gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sogs/ /me dang srin po rlung gi lha/ /'byung po sa yi lha mo dang / /lha ma yin sogs 'khor bcas dgug/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na
@#/ /twat+ta swAhA/ oM khA hi khA hi pheM pheM swAhA/ bdud rtsi sha dang khrag la sogs/ /gtor ma thams cad sbyin par bya/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba
chen po las/ mngon par rtog pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad
du bya| |sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor nyis 'khor ring thung la/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /'khor lo lta bur byas nas kyang / /
rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhir bgyi/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus su ral gri chen po dgod/ /shar du rdo rje yang dag
dgod/ /lha ru rin chen phreng ba ste/ /nub tu chos kyi pi waM ste/ /byang du rdo rje rtse gsum mo/ /sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu mkhas pas bzhag
bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa'i dam tshig go /de nas char pa mi 'bab na/ /stegs bu gru bzhi'i steng du yang / /dngul gyi gzhong pa bzhag
nas kyang / /bag zan las ni byas pa'i gzugs/ /pad ma sum brtsegs dag tu bya/ /steng du klu yi gzugs gzhag la/ /gur gum gyis ni byugs byas la/
mtshams su oM dang baM bkod de/ /tsan+dan dkar pos sbyin sreg bya/ /kha dog mang po sbyor ldan pas/ /klu yi gzugs ni nges par dgug /des kyang 'bab par ma gyur
na| |kham pa'i gab tshe dkar po ru/ /phre yang ku yi khu ba yis/ /ral gri brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bri/ /rgya mtsho'i ngos las sa blangs la/ /klu yi gzugs ni mngon byas
te| |nam mkha' lding gi khu bas byugs/ /til mar la ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /khams phor ser bo'i nang du ni/ /bsgrub bya gzugs
gzhug ldong ros yis/ /ri rang rtse mo brgyad pa bri/ /des ni yang dag gnas par bya/ /shin tu rno ba'i lcags dag la/ /khru do tshad kyi ral gri bya/ /maN+Dal dkar po'i
steng du bzhag /zla ba drug ni rig pa bzlas/ /til mar gyis ni bskus byas nas/ /zla ba gzas zin tshe na bsgrub/ /thogs pas mtha' la lding bar 'gyur/ /bdud
rtsi lnga dang sha sna lnga/ /grib ma dag la bskams byas te/ /lcags gsum dag gis dkris byas nas/ /shar bltas zas ni bsnyung bar gnas/ /gzas zin che na khar
gzhug bya/ /mnyam par bzhag ste nyi shu bzlas/ /khar bcug gzhan gyis mngon mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dngos grub chen po'i dam tshig go/ /de nas yang dag
@#/ /bshad bya ba/ /sa gzhi dkar la zlum pa la/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i me sbar te/ /ser skya'i mar gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /dngos grub chen po thob par
'gyur/ /yungs kar gyis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'thob/ /til nag pos ni sbyin sreg bya/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /'dur ba'i myu
gus sbyin sreg bya/ /tshe yi rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ /seng ldeng dag la phur bur bya/ /gsang sngags nyi shu gcig bzlas nas/ /'dod pa'i gzugs la dbab par bya//
dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po las/ dngos grub kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das yongs su dgyes nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa rnams la rnam par gzigs na/ oM AHhUM zhes bya ba'i sgra gsungs te mi snang bar gyur ro/ /de
nas rab tu dga' ba'i tshogs kyis rang gi bdag po mthong bar ma gyur te/ phyogs bzhi nas mngon du phyogs nas 'di yis gsol ba btab bo/ /e ma bcom
ldan ngo mtshar che/ /stong pa'i ngang la ci ste bzhugs/ /bdag ni tshangs spyod byams pa ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa kun nas slong / /e mo'i bde ba chen po'i sku/ /tshig kun
gyis ni ma spros pa/ /bdag ni rjes chags snying rje che/ /'gro pa yang dag sgrol bar mdzad/ /e ma dri med dag pa'i sku/ /stong pa'i ngang la ma bzhugs par/ /rab tu dag pas bdag la rol/ /'gro ba'i
don la rjes chags brjod/ /e ma'o don kun grub mdzad pa/ /dag pa'i ye shes dri med sku/ /bdag gis 'gro kun gzung ba'i phyir/ /gtso bo khyod ni yang dag bzhengs/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das rab tu dgyes te sku yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so/ /oM Ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba

big+h+naM ban+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ gsang sngags dang / phur bu'i sngags so/ /oM na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ badzra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM hUM tra Ta hUM/ maM baM haM maM tra Ta hUM/ ma ma hUM hUM
phaT swAhA/ shin tu rno ba'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /de nas 'khor rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi don khong du chud par gyur to/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud
gsang pha chen po las/ gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rgyud gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar
skad du/ kro d+ha rA dza sarba man+t+ra gu h+ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ khro bo mi
@#/ /g.yo mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /khams gsum zhes sdang can gzigs nas/ /zhe ldang thams cad zad pa'i phyir/ /
bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /zhe sdang mi g.yo mgon por mdzad/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang / /rnam dag bsam
gtan 'phrin las rnams/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ /dur khrod 'bar pa 'khrugs pa'i sar/ /'dzin pas btud de nges zhus la/ /kye kye yang dag khro chen
gtso/ /ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir/ /mgon po mi g.yo'i gsang rgyud las/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gang / /ngo mtshar thar pa nges par gsol//
de nas yang dag ye gsungs pa/ /dpa' bo dur khrod gnas pas legs/ /rus pa'i rgyan nges phyag rgya drug /gnas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de/ /rgyu bzhi
tshad med bzhi ru gnas/ /ye shes rtog pa'i rtog pa'o/ /rgyun ma chad pa'i dam pa yis/ /nyi zla shes rab thabs kyi gdan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas//
gyur pa'i mtshan ldan ye shes lnga/ /phyag rgya drug mdzes byin brlabs nas/ /dur khrod ma ni 'khyud pa'o/ /phung po la sogs thub par gnas/ /pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis
brlabs/ /srung ba'i sbyor ba med pa dang / /mtshan ma bral dang 'dus ma byas/ /byed pa rnams med rtog pas 'das/ /sku ni dug 'joms gang pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje zhags pa bsdigs
gnas pa/ /g.yon brkyang gnas pa spyan rtsa dmar/ /pad+ma gri gug shes rab tshul/ /g.yon 'khyud tshim byed rgyan bral ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab ma chags dang / /tha ma byis
za mnan te gnas/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus sa'o/ /hUM la rgya gra ma rdo rje gnas/ /e las chos 'byung grub pa mo/ /mtshon cha ra ba dra bas so/ /rten pa phyag rgya lha lnga
gnas/ /mos pa rnams par dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya/ /gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni/ /'khor lo mi bskyod ye shes
mgrin pa phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung / /rna cha gzugs kyis 'od dpag med/ /rus pa'i rna rgyan don yod grub/ /thal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go/ /mig la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /rnam
zhes sdang ma zhes grags/ /sna ni ser sna'i rnam par bor/ /lce la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /lus la rdo rje gti mgu go/ /yid la chos kyi dbang phyag ste/ /dkyil 'khro lus nyid rnam
dag pa/ /rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te/ /ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/ /bdud rtsi rnam lda tshon sna lnga/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo nyid de/ /so sen ba spu twa ra na/ /snying gi dbus kyi
@#/ /lte ba nyid/ /phung po lnga yi gtso mo ste/ /khams dang skye mched lha mor grags/ /'byung ba sgo ba bzhi nyid de/ /'dom gang gru bzhi lha ma pa ste/ /mi
g.yo mgon po rnams par des/ /lus kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //oM AR+ya a tsa la mAR+yar ya kro d+ha hUM phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM AR+ya a
tsa la kro d+ha bi ba ti sa hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ha na ma hI/ swAhA/ bau Sha Ta he/ hUM hUM ho/ phaT haM/ rgyan byin gyis
brlab pa'o/ /oM pad+ma po larga mi yaM/ TaM haM maM byaM/ badzra pra ta ka ko la hUM phaT/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /ka sa mA ra kha na hi mA ra kha ni sa mA ra
ya phaT/ pa cad pa'i 'o/ /sarba a margaM me a hUM/ thun mong grub pa'o/ /a gats+tsha phaT/ bskrad pa'i'o/ /swAhA/ ran+ta/ rgyas pa'i'o/ /d+ha ma gu ta hUM/ dbang gi'o/ /karma pu ta
shAn+tiM ku ru hUM/ zhi ba'i'o/ /sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i rtog pa'i dum bu las/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i
sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshed bya ba/ /yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /khro bo'i tshogs rnams spros nas ni/ /
gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag bkang / /lag pa g.yas pa gshin rje gshed/ /g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya/ /rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung
pa g.yas par mi ga lo ba/ /g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po 'o/ /pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/ /dbyig pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /pus mo g.yon par stobs po che/ /spyi bor
gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya/ /yang ni yab yum sbyor ba las/ /byang chub sems sprin 'du 'phro
las/ /hUM tshogs khro bor spros nas ni/ /gtso mo shes rab yan lag dang / /lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon na gzhan gyis mi thub mo/ /de yi khar ni khro gnyer
ma| |gsang bar ral pa gcig ma 'o/ /gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas par/ /de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma/ /g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni
bsgoms par bya/ /pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las/ /spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma/ /rkang
ba gnyis las yi ni/ /sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba yis/ /byang chub sems sprin 'phro 'du las/ /gdod grub pa'i sangs rgyas rigs
@#/ /phung nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod/ /de dag phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /rjes chags chen po'i sgra yis ni/ /bde gshegs tshogs rnams bskul
bya ste/ /de dag la ni yang yang gzhug /oM sarba ta thA ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ chu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin ni/ /kun
kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /brjid pa'i khro bo gar dang bcas/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis par/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bstan par bsgom/ /dngos grub rab mchog

thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir nan tan bskyed par bya/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las/ lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rigs kyi khro bo spro ba ni/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /rnam par 'phrul par bshad par bya/ /rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /gti
mug mi g.yo mngon po ni/ /zhal ni gang dang dkar dang dmar/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /dbyig pa 'khor lo rdo rje rnams/ /phyag g.yas na ni bsnams
par mdzad/ /thugs kar bsdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa ni/ /dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang / /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad/ /pad
ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs gyur pa/ /rnam snang dbu rgyan ldan pa'o/ /rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /ser sna'i mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /rin chen 'byung
ldan dbu rgyan can/ /gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum gsus chen nor bus brgyan/ /ser dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rnam
par rgyu/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /rdo rje dbyug pa rla gri ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /drul bu
dgra sta g.yon pa na/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag mdzad pa/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs na bzhugs par gyur/ /rang sngags
yi ge las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags mgon po mi g.yo ba/ /spyan gsum pad ma rA ga'i mdog /zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba
dang / /'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas/ /'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrug/ /pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na
bsnams par mdzad/ /snyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang / /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /klu rnams
@#/ /skrag par mdzad nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /phrag dog mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /don yod rdo rje'i
dbu rgyan can/ /sngo ljang ut+pal 'dab ma'i mdog /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs la ni rnam par 'gyur/ /gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/ /'bar
ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pas phyag mtshan cing / /dril bu dgra
sta g.yon na bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /bgegs chen 'jigs pa bsal
mdzad nas/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs/ /mthar byed rab tu zad mdzad nas/ /sems can yongs su btul

byas te/ /zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang / /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje bdud rtsi gsang ba'i pad+ma la bzhugs so/ /gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i khang pa
na| |mA ma kI dang thabs cig tu/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can rol te/ /de nas lha mos de zhus pa/ /gsang chen zhes bya cher gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog /sngon du lha khyod
kyis gsungs pa/ /bdud rtsi yi ni sgrub pa'i thabs/ /bde ba chen pos bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes bshad/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bsam med
zad med phra mo ste/ /don yod dbang po las 'das pa/ /dam pa zhi ba rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis/ /mA ma kIr chags dang ldan
nas/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang chen mngon sum du ni mdzad/ /rgyud rnams kun la gsang ba yi/ /ye shes rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog /de ni bdag gis bshad par
bya| |brtan por 'khyud dang 'o byed dang / /dga' ba'i rol las mnyam sbyor dang / /dbyangs dang sil snyan gar rnams kyis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud kyi mchog /de ltar myur du 'grub
par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi khu ba zhes gsungs te/ /'gro ba gsum ni nges bskyed do/ /khyod la dga' ma zhal bzang ma/ /de yi sgrub pa bdag gis bshad/ /nyon cig de yi sems kyis
@#/ /tshig /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sems can don du phan don du/ /sbyor ba'i rdo rje bdud rtsi mchog /rnal 'byor gang gis shes gyur na/ /
'khor ba'i bcings las myur bar grol/ /bstan du med cing ye shes che/ /dngos grub 'jig rten gsum sgrub bo/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub don du/ /sgrub pa pos ni bde
ba spyod/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung bar bya/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab ste/ /rdo rje mA ma kIs 'o btab/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes de
gsungs so/ /b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o btab pas/ /de tshe dga' ba'i lha mo des/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ba'i/ /nyams dga' gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhus/ /cho ga'i rim pa gang
gis ni/ /mchod pa dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /'dir ni mchod pa ji ltar te/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/ /dga' ba chen po thob dga' ba/ /rab tu dgyes nas
bka' stsal 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/ /'o btab pas ni dgar 'gyur te/ /bzhad nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi sgrub don dang / /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrub pa'i phyir/ /dga' ba chen po sbyor ba yis/ /mA ma kIs ni 'dir dris pa/ /zur gsum dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /gsang ba'i
pad+ma mA ma ki /nang du snying po dang ldan pa'i/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa ni bya/ /de dbus gsang chen rig ma dang / /gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /
g.yas pa la ni dkar po 'dod/ /g.yon du dmar por rab gsungs te/ /lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan byas pa/ /lha yi na bza' me tog phreng / /lha yi dri yis byug byed pa/ /lha
yi dngos grub byed zhi ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /phyi rol du ni dkyil 'khor yang / /sgo bzhi pa ni rab tu brtags/ /shar du khro gnyer ma gzhag ste/ /lho na 'jigs par 'jigs
byed ma/ /nub na rta yi gzugs can ma/ /byang du tshogs kyi 'dren ma mo/ /mkhas pas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /rig ma brgyad ni mnyam par bri/ /mdzes pa mo dang zhi ba'i zhal//
zla mo dang ni dung can mo/ /ri bong 'dzin dang dkyil 'khor mo/ /ri bong 'dzin ri mo yid dga'/ /yid la bde bar byed ma dag /rig ma brgyad dang dge ma brgyad/ /thams cad
zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni yid dga' ma/ /phyogs rnams dang ni mtshams dag la/ /rtag pa ru ni bri bar bya/ /mchod pa pi wang rnga de bzhin/ /de bzhin
sbos dang me tog sogs/ /dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa ni/ /dga' ba rol pa sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba che/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bsgrub par bya/ /ma dang bran mo
@#/ /bu mo dang / /sring mo gnyen mo de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi de dag las/ /blangs nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod/ /ma las bdud rtsi blangs
pas ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi dang mnyam 'gyur/ /sring mo nad med na so gzhon/ /bu mo yi ni 'dod kun sbyin/ /bram ze mo'i ni don yod grub/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la

bdun gyis ni shi 'gyur ro/ /bshang gci khrag dang bsres pa yi/ /sha chen gyis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /dur khrod kyi ni sreg shing yang / /shing gcig pa dang lam mdo na/ /me yi
hom khung bris nas su/ /nyin phyed nam phyed sbyin sreg bya/ /khro chen gshin rje'i gshed po yi/ /sku la thal bas bskus pas ni/ /bsgoms nas dgra la cher gnod na/ /gdon
mi za bar shi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud

@#/ /hUM mdzad kyi/ /sgrub pa mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i rim pa yang / /de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga zhes/ /khams gsum rnam
rgyal las byung yin/ /gru bzhi par ni thig gdab ste/ /khru gang yang na khru do'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba/ /'od zer 'bar ba la 'khrugs ba la/ /dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad
bzhag /zhal gsum de bzhin phyag drug ste/ /rgyan thams cad kyis yongs rdzogs pa/ /phyag rgya yis ni phyag brgyan pa/ /rig ma bzhi dang mnyam ldan pa/ /u ma'i sra
ba'i nu mar bzhugs/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /khro dang ldan par bzhad byed zhal/ /g.yas pa la ni mda' bris te/ /de kho na bzhin g.yon na gzhu/ /phyag bzhi
pa ni bris pa la/ /phyag gnyis pas ni nu mar bsnams/ /rig ma thams cad zhal gsum ste/ /de bzhin me tog spos me ma/ /dri yang yang
dag bri bar bya/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin dbyangs/ /gar mkhan yang phyag drug nyid/ /de bzhin gling bu ma bri ste/ /bi wang ma dang rnga chen ma/ /rdza rnga ma dang sil snyan kun/ /
dkyil 'khor la ni phra ba'o/ /bdud kyi rgyud chen las/ /gal ba bzang po yang bzhag ste/ /phyag gnyis ba la zhal gcig ba/ /bzang po de dag kho na'o/ /rgyan ni thams
cad kyis brgyan pa/ /sgrub pa po yang mdun bri'o/ /bgrang phreng de bzhin rdo rje dang / /dril bu 'dzin pa bri bar bya/ /gtor ma'i gtor ma mchod rdzas dang / /chang skyems ro dang dga'
ston mchod/ /nag po'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/ /dkyil 'khor la ni rdul tshon gdab/ /dbus su gru bzhi bri ba'o/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sngags yig gcig
pa gtso bo ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgrub par bya/ /phyi nas slob dpon la mchod pa/ /bdag gam rgyal srid dbang nyid dam/ /bran mo bu mo de bzhin du/ /ma dang sring mo dbul
bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi/ /dngos grub gal te bdag 'dod na/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal las byung ni/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi las byung ngo / /bdud rtsi lnga dang mnyam ldan pa/ /ngan song thams cad med byed pa/ /rdo rje se gol mnyam sbyor gyis/ /dpal ldan rdo
rje hUM mdzad 'grub/ /rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /byang sems rnam par sprul par gsungs/ /lan grangs du mar rig ma dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni rol par
bya| |b+ha ga'i dbus la myang byas pa/ /gang dag dpa' bo sngags la gnas/ /pad+mar kha yis 'o byas nas/ /bdud rtsi khu ba kho nar blang / /lag pa yi ni sor mo la/ /gnas de la

bo| |de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /khu ba'i gzugs can bdud rtsi ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom ldan rdo rje de gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

ni| |rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ma lus pa yi khams gsum la/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi dpe med bas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi rigs chen mo/ /shin tu chags pas dga' byed

yig 'brus rdo rjes gyur pa'i mgon po khyod/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gang gis khyod mthong nas/ /de dag 'khor ba ru ni ga la 'gro/ /de ltar dbyangs ni blangs nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni
rnam par byed/ /rked pa dang ni rkang pa dang / /dpung pa dang ni mgo bo'i gar/ /gar gyi gzhung gi mtshan nyid do/ /rjes thabs rjes su rim pa dang / /bstod pa dang ni 'gying bag
ste| |rgyas dang 'dud dang gsal po ru/ /rgyas pa dang ni smin bskyod gar/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /stabs brgyad kyis ni gar byed bya/ /rgyas pa'i pad+ma mA ma kI/ /gar
byas nas ni lha mo des/ /rdo rje gis rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje be con 'o btab byed/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes kyang / /'o btab mA ma kI pad+mar/ /ston cig lha mo pad+ma ni/ /de la
mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /bzhugs shig mi g.yo bar rig mo/ /bdud rtsi bsam gtan brtsam par bgyi/ /de bzhin nyid mchog brtsam pa ni/ /bdud rtsi thig le'i gzugs

bar bya/ /skyon can min dang g.yon can min/ /dam tshig la ni mi sdang ba/ /chad par lta ba med pa la/ /bla ma la chags 'dul ba can/ /phrag dog chags pa spong byed pa/ /

nas| |de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / thugs

ba| |rig ma brgyad kyis yongs su bskor/ /dur khrod chen po bzhir bzhugs pa/ /phaT yig sngags kyi nga ro can/ /'byung po ro langs tshogs pa dang / /dur khrod la ni rol

gar yang byed nas dbyangs blang ngo / /'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs/ /rgyu ma phreng gi rgyan skud brgyan/ /sha chen dag ni gsol byed pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung

no| |sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi/ /mthu chen nyon cig mA ma kI/ /lan cig tsam gyis sngags bzlas na/ /skad cig 'jig rten gsum 'jig go /khams gsum ma lus
pa rnams kyang / /zos par byed par the tshom med/ /de yis 'dod pa thams cad sbyin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom

yis ni yongs su dgang / /dang po yi ni gnyis pa ste/ /stong pa nyid ni gdan ldan pa/ /stong pas steng nas gnon pa'i sngags/ /mtha' nas swAhA sbyor byed do/ /gtan
du shin tu dga' 'byor nas/ /bdud rtsi bdud rtsi phyung nas su/ /bdud rtsi bdud rtsi sbyor ba yi/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgrub par bya/ /don kun dngos grub thams cad kyang / /
de yis myur bar bsgrub par 'gyur/ /pho 'am gal te mo dag gis/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dran byed na/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /de yi phyag mthil la kun gnas/ /
rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /dus rtag par ni bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas ro langs chen po yis/ /sgrub pa gzhan yang
bshad par bya/ /nag po'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/ /ling+ga gcig dang lam mdo dang / /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri dang chu 'gram de rnams la/ /las thams
cad ni bsgrub bya ste/ /de bzhin ro langs slong ba ni/ /'gags nas shi ba mo rnams ni/ /mtshan thams cad ni kun rdzogs pa/ /gdol pa ma dang sme sha can/ /khyim tshos
ma rnams de dag ni/ /mdzes pa bzang ba rma med pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bsngags pa ste/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed/ /bud med ro yi skra bzung ste/ /gtsang ba'i chu yis bkru
bar bya/ /sngags dang sman gyi rdo leb la/ /ga bur tsan+dan dmar po yis/ /de la byug par bya byas te/ /sna tshogs me tog spos rnams kyis/ /mchod cing gtor ma
@#/ /dbul bar bya/ /mar khu chen pos bskus nas su/ /yungs kar do la brdeg bar bya/ /khrag 'thung zhes bya sgrub pa pos/ /de la dkyil 'khor yang bri
ste| |thod pa zhes bya zla gam mam/ /gzhu yi tshul gyis bkang bar bya/ /thod pas nye bar rgyan byed cing / /rig ma brgyad dang ldan par bya/ /sha yi khams can thod pa dbang / /
kha T+wAM thams cad kyis 'dzin te/ /zhal gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs/ /phyag drug ral gri phyag na 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol du/ /sgo srung ma ni rab tu brtags/ /
glang rna dang ni glang chen rna/ /zhal mdzes de bzhin zhal gdug ma/ /drag mo zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin/ /mi sdug 'jig pas 'jig byed rnams/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag
gnyis pa/ /me tog mchod pa yang dag bri/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rig ma yang / /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod pa bri/ /de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa pos/ /dung chen gyis ni brgyan
byas pa/ /thod pa'i phreng thod bcings pa yi/ /khrag 'thung gzugs ni sgom byed pas/ /de la cang te'u brdungs nas su/ /gar byed cing ni khang par 'jug /de yi snying gar

pa'i ro langs de yis yang / /sgrub pa po la 'di skad smras/ /dpa' chen po kye las gang yang / /bdag la bka' stsol rdo rje can/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /mkha'

yang 'dren/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom ldan rdo rje de gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / /gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud rtsi
bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po las/ ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje bdud
rtsi bde chen pos/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor te/ /cang mi gsung bar cher bzhugs so/ /dbugs dgag phyir nas mi g.yo nas/ /mi 'jigs pa dang mi gsung bar/ /ting 'dzin
@#/ /mchog la bzhugs pa la/ /mA ma kis ni yang zhus te/ /bcom ldan rdo rje phra mo ni/ /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /ci ltar rnam pa gang

bshad pa nyon cig mA ma kI/ /ye shes zhes bya sgrub byed pa'i/ /khu ba dwangs par bza' bar bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bsgrub don du/ /khrag chen rab tu bsgrub bya ste/ /
gang zhe bud med rnams kyi 'am/ /bu mo yi ni rtag tu blang / /khrag chen des ni mA ma kI /don ni thams cad byed pa po/ /drag shul shi ba rnyed na ni/ /sha chen po yang bza' bya ste//

cad gyi/ /'khor ba las 'dren gtso zhes gsungs/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bde chen po/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes de gsungs so/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyud chen po/ /ston pas dga' ma
la bstan nas/ /phra mo'i gzugs su rdo rje can/ /de nas b+ha gar bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje can rdo rje bdud
rtsi bde ba chen po'i rgyud las bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud lo tsA ba
gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus ta gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tA re ku ru kul+le kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma ku
ru kul+le'i rtog pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor rgya
mtsho'i rgyud kyi ni/ /gzhung dang rtog pa nyams shing nub par gyur nas yang / /sgrol ma 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin zhes bya rgyud kyi gtso/ /de yang nub par gyur nas rtog pa 'di yang
'byung / /sems can mang po'i don du rnal 'byor pa/ /rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud las bsdus byas nas/ /rtog pa 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gsungs/ /byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad mnyan par gyis/ /'jig rten skyabs med gyur la rnam bltas nas/ /'gro kun don byed pa yi tshul 'di ni/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal
gyur bltas nas/ /gus pa chen pos khyod kyi sa blang bar byos/ /'jig rten rnam rtog zhi bar bya phyir rtog pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni rab tu gsungs/ /dpal
ldan gru 'dzin ri la 'jam dpal dang / /pad+ma bsnams dang rgyal bar byed pa dang / /sgrib pa rnam sel blo gros rgya mtsho dang / /byams pa la sogs tshogs rnams thams
cad kyis/ /gang yang chos kyi tshig 'di thos gyur nas/ /rjes su yi rang spyi bos gus phyag byas/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mnga' byas bstod pa'am/ /yang na glu dang dbyangs
@#/ /dag byas pa yis/ /sna tshogs gar gyis 'di ni mchod pa byas/ /gnod sbyin srin po yi dwags 'jig rten dang / /sna tshogs bu mo dang ni rgyu
skar dang / /sa yi dbang dang lag na rdo rje dang / /rlabs rnams sna tshogs can gang gnas pa yi/ /klu yi bu mo zur gyis lta bas blta ba dang / /sa 'og skyong dang lha dbang
grub pa'i bu mos mchod/ /dri za'i rgyal mo nu ma shin tu rgyas pa dang / /rig pa 'dzin dang mi 'am ci yi chung ma dang / /gnod sbyin chung ma ri yi bu mo'i bu dag ni/ /gang yin
bdag dang skyabs med ces ni 'di skad smra/ /gang phyir skyabs med skyabs gyur sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir/ /mgon med mgon gyur 'jig rten mgon po khyod/ /bde ba
bskyed cing ngo mtshar che gyur gang / /mgon po tshogs kyi tshig dbang 'di thos nas/ /nyid kyi dbang du byed pa'i gsang sngags gsungs/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kun
thos pas/ /mthar thug sangs rgyas bde ba du ma 'byung / /rdo rje reg pas khams kyang 'dzag par 'gyur/ /zur gyis lta bar byed pas lta byed cing / /rkang pa dag kyang
sa la gya tshom 'dor/ /'dod chags shin tu bde bas khu 'bab tshe/ /'di ltar mthong nas lha yi bu mo la/ /'gro ba dbang byed ku ru kul+le'i sngags/ /ras ris bris dang
gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dus la bab pa'i tshig 'di mgon smros zhes/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs/ /de tshe 'jig rten dbang phyug las rnams
rab tu gsungs/ /ku ru kul+le'i ri mo'i lugs/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pa po yis 'bras thob pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig
gis/ /tshes grangs gang dang dus gang la/ /sgrol ma 'byung las bshad pa bzhin/ /de ni bdag gis bshad par bya/ /ri mo mkhan ni gang zhig gis/ /gang gi mig ni dmar
'gyur zhing / /lag pa de bzhin rkang pa dmar/ /bya yi mig can a n+ya'i rkang / /des ni sgrol ma bri bar bya/ /dpyid kyi zla ba dang po yi/ /mya ngan med pa'i tshes brgyad nyin/ /thun
ni phyed dang gnyis pa la/ /sgrol ma'i mig ni bri bar bya/ /mngar gsum bza' zhing nya la sogs/ /sha dang chang yang spang bar bya/ /dmar po'i gos kyang rtag tu bgo /dmar po'i
dri yis rtag tu byug /byams pa'i sems ni bskyed byas la/ /tho rangs khrus byas bsangs nas su/ /lan gsum gos ni brjes byas su/ /dbang du byed ma yang dag bri/ /zhal
gcig mig ni yangs pa dang / /phyag bzhi ma la gur gum mdog /bcu drug lo lon sgeg bcas 'dra/ /bud med sgyu mas rgyags pa bri/ /gzhon nu ma dmar ser mos byas
@#/ /pa'i skud pa las ras byas la/ de dang thags mkhan gnyis ka zan dang / 'o ma bza' bar bya zhing / de nas pad+ma'i gdan la stod g.yogs dmar po'i gos
dang bcas pas rin po che'i rna cha dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / gnyis pas mda' rna rtser 'gengs pa/ g.yon pas gzhu 'dzin
pa dang / ut+pal dmar po gnyis pa na bsnams pa dang / 'od dpag med cod pan na bzhugs pa ri'i phug na gnas pa'i ku ru kul+le'o/ /ku ru kul+le'i 'og tu ni sgra gcan
'dzin no/ /de'i steng du 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa'o/ /'dod pa'i lha'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la pad+ma dmar po'i gdan no/ /de la gnas
pa'i sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can gyi bcom ldan 'das ma bris la ras ris rab tu gnas pa bya'o/ /de'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa bco brgyad byas la yar gyi ngo'i
tshes brgyad zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM ku ru kul+le hrIHhUM swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /de nas sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum
tsam byas la/ yang ston zla tha chung ngam/ dpyid zla 'bring po'am/ dbyar zla 'bring po'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i dus tshigs kyi nyin par tho rangs kyi khrus byas la gso
sbyong bzung nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchod rten gsol/ /de nas theg pa chen po gsang sngags pa'i tshogs la mchod ston byas nas
yon phul la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gang na
bzhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po la dga' ba'i tshogs rnams la phyag byas nas bzod par gsol te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras ris bkram pa'i phyogs der
nye bar song la/ dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i don du rig pa 'dzin pas bsam gtan dang ldan par gnas la yi ge grangs kyi 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /cha gcig gis ni
shes rab 'phel/ /cha gnyis kyis ni dbang du byed/ /gang zhig cha ni gsum pa yis/ /mis ni dug kyang 'gugs par 'gyur/ /tshogs shing 'gying pa'i bud med rnams dang
ni| |'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba goms pas lha mo mdzes rnams la/ /sngags 'chang des ni ji ltar 'dod par spyod/ /de yi ming tsam gyis ni
mtshungs med dug can 'bros pa dang / /gdengs ka'i gtso bo'i 'od kyis dpal ldan dag kyang nya bzhin 'gyur/ /bzlas brjod ldan pa yis ni dag gi dbang phyug byed 'gyur bas/ /rigs
@#/ /pas 'gyings pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa'ang lan mi byed/ /rig pa 'dzin pa glang po rta yi rgyab tu zhon pa dang / /rig ma mdzes mas legs
par 'khyud cing mgul nas 'jus pa las/ /sngags rig pa yi gtso bo yi ni stobs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mthar gyur pa yi rgyal srid longs spyod dag la yid kyis
spyod/ /'dod pa'i lha las dga' ba'i bu la sogs pa ri khrod ma/ /sred med bu las dpal mo mi phyed pa las bde sogs dang / /tshogs bdag las ni dri med dbyangs
kyi dbang phyug dkar mo dang / /sa 'dzin lha las phun tshogs mnga' ba sngags kyis rnam rgyal byed/ /gsang sngags ldan par bcom ldan 'das ma gang zhig sgom
byed pa/ /des ni sna tshogs gter dang gser dang dngul dang rna cha dang / /gos la sogs pa'i nor rnams kun la ched du gang bsams pa/ /sems kyis thams cad
ma lus kun nas longs spyod byed/ /rgyal las rgyal srid dbang po'i yul 'das pa yi shing las 'bras bu dang / /klu dang chu klung rgya mtsho rnams las chu rnams
'gugs/ /sngags dang ldan pas 'thung zhing zas la sngags kyis dag par byed/ /skye bo sngags med par ni longs spyod grub pa med/ /nags skyes glang po rta mchog
ri dwags dang ldan pa/ /dug bcas gdengs ka can gyi sprul mchog dang / /chu srin chu glang stag dang bse dag dang / /rang gi sngags kyi stobs kyis bkug nas ni/ /zhon yang ngo
mtshar med par byas pa'i yid ni mig dag gis/ /lta bar gal te gsang sngags grub pa de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gal te snying rje'i lta bas 'jig rten 'di ltar sdug bsngal
pas/ /rgud par gyur pa'i mi mnyam pa la sngags pa des/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'jig rten la phan sgrol ma yin/ /'jig rten ma lus sgrol mar byed cing zhi bar byed//
bdud rnams bcom nas nor gyi char rgyun 'bebs par byed/ /dpag bsam shing du gyur nas 'gro rnams ci 'dod sbyin par byed/ /nor gyi dbang phyug ma lus pa yi nor
rnams kun bkug nas/ /sems can ma lus kun la phan phyir sbyin par byed/ /de bzhin phongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams phyir gos dag dang / /stan dang khyim dang bla re dag tu
sgrol ma dang / /rgya mtsho'i gling du tshong pa'i gru zhig phongs pa la/ /gzings dang gru la sogs par sgrol mas mdzad par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma de bsgoms rnal 'byor pa/ /dang po
sdug bsngal gyur pa de/ /de spangs nas ni cung zhig na/ /mis ni ston mo rnyed par 'gyur/ /gnyis par gos ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin btsun mo dang yang 'phrad/ /de nas so
@#/ /rtsi longs spyod 'gyur/ /ma blangs par yang ci 'dod spyod/ /gal te tshangs spyod yin na yang / /lha mchog bskyed pa'i bu mo spyod/ /sems can gsod
la dga' ba yis/ /bstan pa 'di la 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dge ba bcu la dga' 'gyur zhing / /theg pa che la sems gcig pas/ /rdo rje chos kyi bka' bzhin du/ /dngos
grub mchog ni des spyod 'gyur/ /'di ni ras ris la 'jug pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o// //chos mchod pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /gang gis chos nyid brnyes
gyur na/ /chos kyi dbyings su rang gyur pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /de'i rjes la dpag bsam shing gi sgrub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /brag gi yi ge las byung
ba| |dpag bsam shing ni rnam par sgom/ /ut+pal yongs su gyur pa las/ /shing ni g.yon du bsgom par bya/ /sna tshogs nor gyi char pa dag /nam mkha'i dkyil nas
'bab pa yis/ /'dod pa'i bsam pa rdzogs byed pa/ /de ltar bsgom na nor bdag 'gyur/ /gling bzhi pa yi sems can rnams/ /sems kyi 'od zer gyis bkug
nas/ /rtag tu rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /de dag la ni rab sbyin bya/ /yongs kyi gtso bo rin chen dang / /de bzhin rin chen rgya mtsho skyes/ /bud med rin chen rta rin
chen/ /de bzhin ral gri rin chen dang / /glang po rin chen sogs rin chen/ /sangs rgyas rnams la yid kyis dbul/ /bud med rgyan gyis brgyan byas la/ /sna tshogs
gzugs can 'gying ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu dbul/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rig pa 'dzin
pa thob par 'gyur/ /rin po che ni yongs rgyas pa'i/ /yongs kyi gtso bo nor dbang phyug /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar
bya| |de bzhin rin chen gzhan dag kyang / /gus dang bcas pas yongs btang na/ /rdo rje chos su gyur nas ni/ /sems can kun gyi don byed 'gyur/ /'di ni dpag bsam
shing gi sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas thams cad do/ /sems nyid kyis ni rnam par grol/ /sems kyi 'ching ba rnams las thar/ /sems kyis grol ba
dang ldan 'gyur/ /sems ma gtogs par dngos don rnams/ /gzhan dag gzhan par ma mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub kun/ /gang phyir phun tshogs
gnan ma mthong / /gang yang snod dang sems can rnams/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa dag /zag med lhag par mthong ba yis/ /sems tsam yin zhes rab tu bsgrags/ /de
@#/ /pas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sems kyi me long phyis byas na/ /rang bzhin glo bur ba yi skyon/ /rim gyis rab tu zad par 'gyur/ /dbyangs yig
dang po las byung ba/ /dri med rdzogs pa'i zla ba ste/ /sems nyid zla ba bsgoms byas nas/ /de yi steng du sa bon dgod/ /dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni/ /me yi mdog gi steng na
gnas/ /yi ge i dang yang dag ldan/ /nam mkha' gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan/ /de yi sna tshogs 'ong rnams kyis/ /'gro ba dri ma med byas nas/ /stong gsum 'di sogs
mkha' dbyings te/ /ku ru kul+le'i rir zhugs pas/ /de yis sgrol ma bskul nas ni/ /bkug nas mdun du gnas par byed/ /de nas mkhas pas sa bon la/ /mchod
pa chen po'i sprin rnams spro/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /de bzhin dri dang lha bshos sogs/ /phyag rgya phreng ba de bzhin du/ /gar dang glu yis mchod sogs mchod/ /
dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rje yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzungs/ /sngags 'di lan
gsum brjod nas ni/ /de nas gshegs su gsol bar bgyi/ /sems ni byams pas gnas byas la/ /slar yang der ni gzhag par bya/ /snying rje'i sems ni bskyed byas
nas/ /rab dga'i sems kyang bskyed par bya/ /phyi nas thams cad btang snyoms la/ /sems tsam la ni mnyam par gzhag /tha mal rnam par spang ba'i phyir/ /sems kyang slar
yang stong par bya/ /yang srid len pa'i phung po lnga/ /stong pa nyid kyi me yis sreg /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /yud tsam stong pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/ /byas
nas sems ni ngal sos bya/ /sngon gyi dam bcas dran byas nas/ /sa bon tsam zhig yang dran bya/ /gcig pu mya ngan 'das pa yis/ /sems can bslus pa 'gyur
ba'i phyir/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' med las/ /bdag gis de dag ci ltar bsgral/ /'di ltar bsams nas brtse ldan des/ /sems med pa yid stong pa yang / /chos
kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sems/ /sems nyid kyis ni bskyed par bya/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs las sa bon/ /de la ut+pal zhes par 'gyur/ /ut+pal dkyil du zla ba'i
gzugs/ /yi ge a las byung ba'o/ /slar yang zla ba de sa bon/ /de la 'od zer 'phros gyur pa/ /de yis ma lus 'jig rten khams/ /rnam par sbyangs par bsgom par bya/ /
de yis sbyangs shing gsal byas nas/ /'od zer kun gyis sangs rgyas tshogs/ /ut+pal la zhugs bsgom par bya/ /de las sgrol ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bstan 'dra'i lha
@#/ /mo btsod mdog can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /dam tshig gzugs ni mnyam bskyed nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo yang dag bkug /
yud tsam gyis ni des rdzogs pa/ /ye shes 'khor lo mdun gnas pa/ /dam tshig phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /kha yi lam nas gzhug par bya/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar byas
nas/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgom par bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni rtse mor sbyar/ /rtse mo'i nang du ming med gzhug /mdzub mo gnyis ni dbu mar sbyar/ /mthe bong gnyis ni
'og tu bkug /dam tshig phyag rgya 'di bcings nas/ /'khor lo bkug nas gzhug par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tshigs bcad 'dis/ /dbang bskur zhes ni
gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /
rgyal ba'i dbang bskur zhes bya bas/ /spyan la sogs pa lnga pa'o/ /rgyal po'i me tog dbang bskur zhing / /chen por gyur pa de gsol mdzod/ /rdo rje chen pos dbang
bskur ba/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas sgrol ma dbang bskur
bas/ /chos ni gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur/ /'od zer dmar po sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba gsum po snang bar byed/ /dbang bskur rin chen thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub thams cad
rab sgrub byed/ /ji ltar slar bstan cho ga yis/ /lo phyed brten par brtsams nas ni/ /gtor ma dus gsum gtang par bya/ /sngags 'di yis ni khar ba'am/ /khur ba la sogs
cho ga yis/ /rmi lam mtshan ma thob par 'gyur/ /ral gri sa 'og dngos grub dang / /mi snang ba dang bcud len dang / /mi mthong ba dang mkha' spyod nyid/ /de bzhin rkang
byug mig sman dang / /rmi lam mtshan ma ston 'gyur zhing / /dngos grub rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te de la dga' 'gyur na/ /grub pa phra mo sgrol mas grub/ /'khor
los bsgyur nas rgyal srid dang / /dbang po'i longs spyod thams cad byed/ /sgom dang bzlas par ldan pa la/ /rmi lam du yang rab grub byed/ /zla drug tha ma'i zla gcig
go |mtshan gcig rangs par bzlas byas te/ /ut+pal phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /bzlas nas phyag rgya yud kyis 'bar/ /phyag rgya 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /btsun mo dang bcas
tshangs pa dang / /dbang po nye dbang drag po sogs/ /bkug nas dbang du 'gyur bar byed/ /de nas brtsams nas dngos grub kun/ /bdag 'khor 'chi ba las grol 'gyur/ /chu
@#/ /dang 'dam gyi skyon dag gis/ /pad+ma gos par mi 'gyur ltar/ /dngul chu reg nas du mar 'gyur/ /bsdus nas slar yang gcig tu 'gyur/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid 'gyur na/ /dngos grub thob pa'i sems de bzhin/ /grub pa'i dngul chus reg gyur nas/ /zangs ma gser du 'gyur ba bzhin/ /grub pa'i gsang sngags
kyis reg nas/ /sngags pa sangs rgyas skur yang 'gyur/ /lha yi dbang phyug tu 'gyur zhing / /khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rigs su
byung nas ni/ /'khor lo bskor ba yang 'gyur ro/ /bltams dang rab tu 'byung mdzad pa/ /dka' ba spyod pa'i spyod mdzad cing / /byang chub spyod pa'ang spyod mdzad
pa| |sangs rgyas nyid kyang dran par mdzad/ /lha las babs dang sprul pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa chen po dang / /dur khrod gshegs
pa de bzhin no/ /'jig rten gsum du lus spangs nas/ /rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs sku yis/ /gnas gtsang mar ni slar gshegs nas/ /sprul par byung ba'i sku
yang ngo / /glegs bam ras ris rim pa yis/ /chos kyi sku yang 'jug par mdzad/ /gang gis de yi grub pa'i sngags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis de nyid gsungs/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de nyid kyi thugs la rnam par brtags nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi sku sa'i phyogs gang du dus byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas lag na rdo
rjes sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' da dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis 'di skad du/ ci ltar na sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje'i sku chos kyi dbyings kyi sku mi phyed pa'i sku sa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig tu dus byed par 'gyur ba yin zhes smra/ de 'di skad nyon cig /byang chub sems
dpa' de dag gang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba can du 'gro ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ ci lag na rdo rje/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams chos sku spangs nas bde ba can du 'gro'am/ rigs kyi bu/ 'on te sprul pa'i sku spangs nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bde ba can du
'gro bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje/ chos kyi sku spangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ ci ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyi skyes bu gang zhig
@#/ /gis dgos pa'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir sgyu ma sprul nas dgos pa sgrub par byed do/ /de bzhin du/ gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /
sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /'khor los bsgyur ba 'das gyur nas/ /skye ba yongs su 'dzin par mdzad/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas 'das pa na/ /de tshe
'khor los bsgyur ba 'byung / /de gnyis med par 'jig rten 'dir/ /nam yang 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gdul bya'i 'jig rten la brten nas/ /rkang gnyis
mchog gis brtul nas ni/ /lo ni brgyad cur bzhugs mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i gnas su gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma spangs nas ni/ /rgyal
ba'i pho brang bde can du/ /rab zhi bde ba chen po la/ /kun tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs/ /byed po rtag pa gcig pus bzhugs/ /yin snyam drang srong
rnams sems te/ /de lta'i ngo bo de min zhes/ /de ni skad cig sdom par 'dod/ /bdag tu 'dzin pas 'khrul pa rnams/ /rtag tu rtag pa'i don 'dod pa/ /mi
rtag nyid la 'jug bya'i phyir/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gtong mdzad/ /dngos po kun gyi dngos bdag nyid/ /thugs kyis thams cad mkhyen te bdag /'di dag 'di
gnas ma yin zhes/ /byas pa'i nges pa yod ma yin/ /kun rdzob bden pa la brten nas/ /stong gsum 'di sogs gdul bya la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos
bstan pa/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa rab tu 'jug /sangs rgyas 'byung ba de nyid min/ /sangs rgyas 'gag pa'ang de bzhin te/ /thams cad ro gcig gyur pa yin/ /'byung
dang 'jig pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de ni chos dbyings gzugs gcig tu/ /sgrib pa lnga po spangs pa 'o/ /zab cing rgya ni che ba'i gzugs/ /de nyid ngo bor de nyid bzhugs/ /
gnyis ka yod pa ma yin phyir/ /gdod nas yod pa ma yin no/ /de ni gdod nas ma skyes pas/ /skye ba ma yin 'gag ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa rjes su ston pa mdzad pa/ skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa rtsi lta bu yin/ smras pa/
kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang sangs rgyas ji snyed pa de gang zhig yod pa yin nam/ 'on te med pa zhig yin/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje/ sangs rgyas rnams ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin no/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ ma skyes pa ni skye ba
@#/ /yin/ /skyes pa phyir yang skye mi 'gyur/ /don dam nyid du dpyad na ni/ /de phyir gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /de bzhin 'chi ba 'chi mi 'gyur/ /'chi
ba med pa 'chi ba min/ /mi gnas pa la gnas pa med/ /gnas pa de la gnas mi dgos/ /gal te ma skyes nyams 'gyur zhing / /ma skyes pa nyid skye 'gyur na/ /ri
bong gi ni rwa nyid kyang / /skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /gang tshe yod pa skye 'gyur na/ /skyes pa slar yang skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te med pa skye na yang / /mo gsham
bu yang skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir thams cad ma rig pa/ /'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid yin/ /phung po lnga ldan 'gro ba rnams/ /snang ba tsam du rnam par shes/ /re
zhig rigs pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mya ngan 'das pa shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
smras pa/ thams cad bskyed pa med pa'i phyir/ /sngags 'di ci ltar rgyud ci ltar/ /dkyil 'khor sgom pa ji lta bu/ /dngos grub de ni ji ltar 'grub/ /lag na rdo rjes
smras pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ /dngos po rnams ni 'byung ba ltar/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sogs brten nas/ /dngos grub rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
dngos grub rnams ni kun rdzob pa/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa yang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /kun rdzob nyid du rab sgrub 'gyur/ /rtog pa gnyis pa'o// //
sngags bzlas pa yi cho ga'i rim/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pos dngos grub 'gyur pas so/ /byu ru yis ni dbang du byed/ /
pus dkar gos ni dug zhi byed/ /shel gyis shes rab 'phel bar byed/ /las gsum la ni sbyar bar bya/ /skye gnas kyi rnam par dag pa a sh+w+t+tha'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa
lta bu'i thab khung byas la/ mya ngan med pa'i shing la me sbar nas/ cho ga bzhin du ut+pal dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/ gar mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la
mngar gsum gyis bsgos nas rtsa ba'i sngags dang / bya ba yin no/ /phyi nas 'khrul 'khor bya ba yin te/ zla mtshan gyis gos pa'i ras la dkyil 'khor gru gsum bris
nas dkyil 'khor du bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa po'i ming dang bcas pa'i bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas par bris te che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyur cig byas nas/ de nas
rtsa ba'i sngags kyis spel nas rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang / lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gi khrag dang / ga bur dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi rnams kyi tshon cis bri bar
@#/ /bya'o/ /shes rab 'phel bar 'dod na thab khung de nyid du arka 'am/ ka ra bI ra'i shing la bram ze'i sbyin sreg gi me blangs la spar la/ a ka
ru ka'i sha'i khyi'i ma'am/ shu dag gi sbyin sreg khri bya'o/ /dug zhi bar byed na thab khung de nyid du tsan+dan gyi shing la me sbar la/ pin ta ka ra'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o//
des ni ngag thams cad zhi bar 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /sna tshogs kyi zug gzer rnams med par byed cing zhi bar byed do/ /mkha' lding gi rig pa'i rgyud kyi cho ga'o/ /
khams gsum pa yi lam gnas pa'i/ /btsun mor grags pa ji snyed pa/ /sbyin sreg 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /de kun bkug nas spyod par byed/ /byams pa
chags pa'i lta ba yis/ /sems de yis ni dbang du byed/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub nges par spyod/ /'di ni dbang du bya ba'i
cho ga'i/ /tshem pa kun mkhyen zhes bya ba/ /shes rab med par thob mi 'gyur/ /de phyir de thob 'dod pa gang / /shes rab rnon po bsgrub bar bya/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg sbyor
ba yis/ /chos rnams kun la sbyod pa'o/ /blo ni dag gsal dri ma med/ /de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni grol bar 'gyur/ /gri ha pi da'i lo ma dang / /sha ti
dang ni shing mang dang / /bram ze mo dang ma ga ta/ /sbrang dang bcas pas bza' bar bya/ /shes rab 'phel bar bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /dug rjes sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas/ /'khor
lo bzang rtsa de bzhin te/ /mche ba'i dug gis bzung ba la/ /bskus dang 'thung pas zhi bar mdzad/ /dug gzhil pa'i sman no/ /dza ri tsaN+Da li dag dang / /nang pa'i sdi ni mar
khur bcas/ /lus kyi srin bu shi ba'i ro/ /zos nas dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ /dbang du bya ba'i sman no/ /dug 'gugs pas ni 'gro ba zhi/ /shes rab 'phel bas
sangs rgyas nyid/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni/ /skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan don rab bsgrub pa la/ /theg pa chen por thabs gzhan med/ /
rig pa lan gcig bsgrubs pa yis/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /hrIHyig myos pa'i snod bsams nas/ /bud med rnams ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /lce snying
dkyil du hrIHde nyid/ /bsams na blo rnams skye bar byed/ /mche bas bzung ba las bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi yi ge mdzes pa yis/ /yi ge dag ni dug zhi byed/ /sgrol
ma'i snying po khams gsum las/ /rgyal ba yin par brtse ba can gyis rnam shes bya/ /ngag gi skyon rnams zad pas dug sel sems kyi skyon spangs pas/ /shes rab
@#/ /'phel 'gyur lus kyi skyon rnams zad pas dbang du byed/ /de phyir 'gro ba 'di dag mi dge ba las zhen pas dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de
phyir rgyal ba'i sras kyi phan phyir mi dge ba rnams spang bar bya phyir bgyi/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i khyad par gyi ni nges par lus kyi skyon rnams zad pa 'gyur/ /sngags
kyis lce yi tshogs kyi skyon rnams gang yin pa yi sems kyi skyon/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i sems kyis dga' bar 'gyur par dad pa dri med kyis/ /lus kyi yid rnams
g.yo ba med pa de tshe sangs rgyas byin gyis rlobs/ /sdig med mig gis sdig lta snying rje ldan pa 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /sbyin pas bsod nams
stobs lhag gyur par sa steng gtso bo sbyin bdag brtson ldan 'gyur/ /le lo spangs pas mkhas pas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal cung zad kyang mi myong / /de phyir
sangs rgyas sras kyi snying rje'i nor dang brtson 'grus spyod pa dag la brten/ /nam mkha'i dkyil du sangs rgyas rnams bltas bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs
rgyas rnams la sems/ /rmi lam na yang rtag tu bdag nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor ba mthong / /mkhas pas 'chi ba'i tshe yang ri rab rtser gshegs dang / /gzhon
pa sna tshogs zhon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mthong gyur pa/ /sdig pa byas pas dmyal ba'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur/ /de rnams rnam
dag rgyud yin te/ /blo yang der ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na ci nas kyang / /gos dgar dag gis btsun mor 'dod/ /de nyid dug ni zhi byed pas/ /rta mgrin gyis
ni go 'phang gnas/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i tshig 'byung ba/ /'gro ba gsum po dbang du byed/ /'dod chags kyi rigs kyi rgyud sgrub pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba
gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /slar yang gru gsum gzhan zhig go /dbang po phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /oM la sogs
pas mkhas pas bri/ /mtshams drug tu ni sa bon drug /chos kyi sa bon dkyil du 'o/ /yi ge phuHyi nang byas pa/ /de ni sgo yi ma them bri/ /sbrul bskrad pa'i rgyud do/ /
de nas bud med skal ba dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba gzhan bshad par bya ste/ 'dab ma bdun pa'i ut+pal byas la/ de la yi ge bdun sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i lte ba
la hrIHgnyis kyis brten pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming dbang du bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du gro ga'am/ yang na me tog dang bcas pa'i ras la bris la rig pa'i ril bu byas nas
@#/ /dpung pa la gdags par bya'o/ /bdag po bud med bran du 'gyur/ /rgyal po'ang zhabs 'bring nyid du 'gyur/ /shin tu dag cing gtsang ma yi/ /
sngags 'di btu bar bya ba yin/ /dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /srung ba'i don du 'khrul 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ut+pal 'dab bzhi byas nas ni/ /de la dbus su
zla ba bri/ /shar du mda' ni bri bar bya/ /lho nyid du ni gzhu bri 'o/ /mi 'jigs lag pa nub tu 'o/ /byang du ut+pal bri bar bya/ /dbus kyi zla bar bsrung bya ste/ /sa bon bdun
gyis bskor ba 'o/ /'khor lo'i phyi yi rim pa la/ /ut+pal phreng bas brgyan pa 'o/ /'di ni gro ga la bris la/ /rang gi dpung la gdags par bya/ /gzhan yang byis pa rgan
po dar la bab/ /'khrul 'khor gyis ni rang srung 'grub/ /gal te dbang phyug thob par bya 'dod na/ /sa bon gyi grong khyer bris la/ de'i dkyil du gzhu bri bar bya'o/ /gzhu'i
dkyil du rin po che'i rnam pa lta bu'i ut+pal gyi myu gu bri bar bya'o/ /ut+pal snying po'i dbus su yi ge dzam la yi ge bdun gyis bskor ba'o/ /sa le sbram gyi byang bu la
mngon par bris la khyim gyi steng du nges par gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi rol nas ut+pal la'i phreng bas mngon par bskor bar byas la tshes bcu gnyis sam/ brgyad la rin po che
lda dang ldan pa'i bum pa gang bas phab la khrus byas nas mchod nas bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ lo gcig gis nor 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu'i
rig pa'i ril bu yang dag par gdags par bya'o/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mig dmar la bab pa na 'gron bu gan rgyal du gnas pa rnyed na
lag pa'i mthil du bzhag nas/ sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa na rgyan po 'debs pa na pha rol po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'gron bu de blangs la ku ru kul+le'i
sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tshes bcu gnyis sam/ brgyad la khrus byas nas mchod la dar gyi nang du gtums nas dpung pa la btags na/ 'dis nor gyi dbang
phyug chen por 'gyur ro/ /'gron bu de snod du bcug pa'i nang du spa ba byas na nyin rer kAR+ShA pa Na re re rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /don sgrub pa dang / rgyal srid sgrub pa dang / rgyan po
rnyed pa dang / 'bras bu sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ /rtog pa gsum pa rdzogs so// //gang gis rdul tshon mthong tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas myur du thob par byed/ /
dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i rim pa bzhin/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis nye bar brgyan/ /de yi dkyil du lha mo bkod/
@#/ /b+ha ga'i rnam pa kha dog legs/ /mda' ni shar du bri bya ba/ /gzhu ni lho yi phyogs su 'o/ /mi 'jigs lag pa nub tu ste/ /byang du de bzhin ut+pa
la'o/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad du'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sogs de bzhin/ /gos dmar po yi stod g.yogs bgos/ /dar dmar pos gdong bkab pa yi/ /
slob ma der ni gzhug par bya'o/ /'dis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'khor lor me tog dbul bar byas te/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra hoHzhes bya'o/ /g.yogs pa
bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /dkyil du bab na ni mchog go /mda' la bab na ni dbang du byas pa'i las la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jig pa sbyin pa la
bab na ni dug 'gugs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /ut+pa la la babs na/ shes rab 'phel ba la bslab par bya'o/ /gzhu la bab na ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
la bslab par bya'o/ /'jug pa'i dus su 'di skad smra bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di dkyil 'khor du ma bzhugs
pa gang gi'ang mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung par 'gyur ta re
zhes pa brjod nas/ /de'i rjes la dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par rgyud las grub pa yin no/ /mna' bsgag
par yang bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po dam tshig che/ /nga las blangs nas 'ga' nyams na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag /gsang sngags spyod mchog spyod pa rnams//
khrag chen dang ni snying chen kyang / /de tshe phyung nas gsol bar byed/ /chos kyi bstan pa skyong byed pa/ /nga la khyod kyis brnyas mi bya/ /rtag tu gos dmar bgo bya zhing / /phreng ba
dmar po bcing bar bya/ /mtshal gyi phye ma dag gam ni/ /dmar po'i bris kyang byug bya zhing / /rin chen dmar po sogs kyis brgyan/ /chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom
bya zhing / /sngags kyang chags pa'i sems kyis bzla/ /btsag gam sin+d+hu ra dag gis/ /pho brang dag ni bri bar bya/ /mtshal gyi phye ma dag gam ni/ /gur gum dang ni
tsan+dan dmar/ /byu ru'i phye ma dag kyang rung / /karke ta yi phye mas bri/ /sbyin sreg yang na 'khor lo'o/ /rab tu gnas pa de bzhin te/ /kun kyang dmar ba'i rang bzhin
sbyar/ /sangs rgyas dur smig mtshon byed yin/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /bden pa min pa yang mi smra/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /gzhan gyi chung ma bsten
@#/ /mi bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gang gsum pa'i/ /mi dge ba dag spang bar
gyis/ /chos dang de bzhin zang zing dang / /byams dang mi 'jigs zhe sa bya ba bzhi/ /sbyin pa khyod kyis rtag tu byin/ /med na bsam gtan las kyis so/ /bsdu ba'i
dngos po bzhi dag kyang / /khyod kyis rtag tu bsten par bya/ /pha rol phyin pa'i sku dag dang / /stobs rnams dang ni dbang dag dang / /bud med 'gro ba brnyas mi bya//
sgrol ma'i ming can khyad par du/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyim pas kyang / /bud med de ni blang mi bya/ /grong khyer sgo dang grong dag dang / /yul gang du ni sgrol ma
ni| |sgo steng bzhi mdog rtsig ngos dang / /sum mdo dag tu khyad par du/ /gnas pa'i gnas der rtag phyag bya/ /bstod cing mchod pa chen po bya/ /gnas der gnas
pa byas nas ni/ /sngags la sogs pa bsgrub par bya/ /sgrol ma'i ming can bud med gang / /kha dog dmar ser mig lags ma/ /de mthong rnal 'byor gus pa
yis/ /yid kyis phyag ni bya ba yin/ /b+han d+hu ze'u 'bru'i me tog dang / /de bzhin ka ra bI ra 'dzin/ /gzhan yang me tog dmar po la/ /sgrub pa pos ni 'gom mi bya/ /
de ltar sdom pa byin pas ni/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i lha rdzas chu/ /bum pa bzhin gnas pa'i chus/ /slob ma sngags chus dag par bya/ /slob dpon gyis ni rim pa bzhin//
mda' gzhu sogs kyi phyag rgyas bkru/ /dang por mda' can bum pa ste/ /gnyis pa gzhu dang ldan pas so/ /gsum pa mi 'jigs pa lag ste/ /ut+pal gyis ni bzhi
par ro/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas shAkya yi/ /seng ge sras bcas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis khyod dbang bskur/ /khyod kyis
sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor 'di ru rnyed/ /rdul mtshon 'di gzigs sangs rgyas rnams/ /rab tu dgyes par gyur pa yin/ /'di ni 'chi med nad
med kyang / /mya ngan med cing phongs ba med/ /theg pa chen po gtsang ma 'dis/ /khyod kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob/ /mda' sogs bzhi yis dbang bskur bas/ /dam
chos snod du byas nas ni/ /slob ma la ni gsang ba dag /cho ga bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /de la re zhig dang por klu la bsdig pa la bslab par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na mo

bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa b+h+yaHna mo as+tha mahA a n+yaR+ya pra ka la yaM/ na mas+sa b+he b+h+yo/ bud+d+ha ko Ti b+h+yaH tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHhrI hrI sarba nA gA nAM/ a nan+ta ku lA nAM/ bA su ki ku lA nAM/ shaM kha pA
@#/ /la ku lA nA/ kar ko Ta ku lA nAM/ pad+ma ku lA nAM/ ku li ka ku lA nAM/ pun+da ri ka ku lA nAM/ ga na ka ku lA nAM/ me ka ku lA nAM/ dza la de ku lA nAM/ dza la d+ha

ra ku lA nAM/ badzrI mu ta ku lA nAM/ saM brta ku lA nAM/ e sa brta ku lA nAM/ ku mu da ku lA nAM/ ka ha raM ku lA nAM/ sai gan+d+he ku lA nAM/ ha na ha na sha re Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha tsa be na/ tA Da ya
TA Da ya/ up+ta la nAM/ birtaM na/ a b+ha yA na/ de hi de hi/ pra la ya/ ka le badzra la da ra/ ma b+ha ta ra ya na/ ba ra shAn+ta nA ga na pa shi ku su/ ku ru ku ru phuH ku ru pa ya ku ru pa
ya| phuHphuH oM ku ru kul+le hrIHhUM swAhA phaT// //sngags 'dis dgon pa'i lci ba las dkyil 'khor byas la/ cho ga bzhin du tsan+dan gyi byug pa pad+ma 'dab ma
brgyad pa bris la/ shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la dga' bo la sogs pa'i klu brgyad bzhag nas/ sha kha ra dang / gu gul gyis rgya skar snar ma la bab pa'i tshe brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas nas/ klu rnams la bdug pa byin nas de nas mchod pa'o/ /gal te char 'bab par mi 'gyur na/ chang gis khrus byas la seng ldeng gi me sa gdung bar bya'o//
de ltar byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te char mi 'babs par byed na ma dze thebs par 'gyur ro/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag bya ba'i zas dang ldan par bya ba yin
no| |phyis nas nye bar bsdus la chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o/ /lha yang dus su char 'bebs shing / /lo tog phun sum chogs par shog /'jig rten mtha' dag skyid pa dang / /rgyal
po chos dang ldan gyur cig/ /ces yongs su bsngo ba'ang bya'o/ /char shin tu ches pa bcad 'dod na/ sbrul 'dul ba'i mi las sbrul gcig blangs la tsan+dan gyis byugs
nas 'o ma blud par bya zhing / sngags 'di lan bdun sngags bar byas pa'i bum pa dmar po ma tshos pa'i nang du bcug la phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab nas/ bum pa bcag
par gyur na de ma thag tu char pa gcod par byed do/ /phyi nas tshogs kyi ston mo bya/ /yang na nyan thos dge 'dun mchod/ /khye'u bu mor zas skom sbyin/ /de ltar byas na klu rnams
dga'/ /char ni 'bab par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /gal te 'di ltar mi byed na/ /klu rnams dga' bar ma byas pa/ /mdze yis thebs par gyur pa yin/ /rgyal po'i bu dang btsun
mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa khrus byas la phyir ldog pa'i tshes lnga la/ phyir ldog pa'i tsa ba btsal nas 'o ma'am/ yang na mar dang sbyar te/ dngul gyi snod du blugs la btung
zhing dge slong la gsol bar byas na/ lo gcig gi par du sbrul gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dge ba'i las kyis gal te sbrul gyis bzung na sbrul de nyid
@#/ /'chi bar 'gyur te/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang mdze nad sos par 'dod na/ sngags 'di nyid kyis dug med
par byas nas mdze nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis chu la sngags la sbrul gyis bzung ba'i rma la bkrus na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /yang klu mthong bar
'dod na/ ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma la yi ge'i grangs kyis 'bum bzlas nas/ klu gnas shing byin gyis brlabs pa mtshe'u la sogs par btab na/ de'i rjes la
klu'i chung ma 'dar bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po la/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ ci zhig bgyi/ zhes bka' lung nod par byed do/ /sngags pas kyang 'dod pa de blang bar bya'o//
rtog pa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos gang gi tshe bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu bzhugs nas yang 'od ma'i tshal

badzra a mr-i ta hUM baM/ oM badzra ma ra Ni hUM hoH'di ni shar du pu shud kyi mgo can dang / lhor bya rog gi mgo can/ nub tu srin bya'i mgo can/ byang du khra'i mgo can no/ /'khor ba
phur bu sgrub don du/ /dbang dang byin rlabs zhu ba'i phyir/ /ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/ /ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang / /rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang / /
phur pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab/ /sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab/ /pho nya chen po'i dus la bab/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dus la
bab/ /sa bdag chen mo'i dus la bab/ /khyi yi gdong can dus la bab/ /bsgral bar bya ba'i dus la bab/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas
sras bzhin du/ /rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni/ /gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs/ /bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams/ /khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /
yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas/ /mngon spyod tshul gyis bsgral ba dang / /lus ngag phye mar mdzad nas kyang / /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod/ /oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha naM/
@#/ /mo hi g+hA ta ya/ b+ha ga bAn/ hrIHSh+TIHbi kr-i ta badzra hUM kA ra hUM/ badzra kI li ki la ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsarba big+h+nan badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ bgegs byed pa
yi bdud rnams dang / /sdug bsngal sems la mnyam sbyor ba/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bdud/ /zungs shig rdungs shig rnam par chings/ /gtogs shig grogs dang
dbye bar gyis/ /ring nas khug la smra ru chug /phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis/ /bdag gi dbang du byas gyur nas/ /bsgo ba'i bka' nyan gus par gyis/ /hUM par

pid+yA ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na hUM phaT/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ trA sha ya trA sha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra/ ha sa ya ra/ hrIHdaN+Da hUM phaT/ shI g+h+riM A na
ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa lA pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A be she ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ pho nya bran dang mngag pa'i tshogs/ /khyed kyi thugs dam dus la
bab/ /mngon spyod ji ltar nges pa dang / /mngon spyod byin rlabs de bzhin mdzod/ /ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma thA ma thA badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/
su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka Ta ka Ta ye dza ye/ bi dza ye/ a dzi te/ a pa rA dzi te/ mA ra sen+yA pra marda ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' lung gis/ /sdig can gang
zhig 'da' byed pa/ /stobs chen khro bo chen po yis/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru gyis/ /nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams/ /nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed/ /hUM ma ma
pa shAM ku ru/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams/ /song zhig lha min lha yang rung / /nga la bar chad byed pa'i bdud/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod/ /sarba A na ya hUM
phaT/ ta tha' ya hUM phaT/ rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun/ /bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams/ /rdo rje me yis snying bsregs nas/ /lus sems rdul bzhin brlag par
mdzod/ /khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya/ /kha taM kha taM kha taM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha kha
khA hi khA hi/ ha ha/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ chos nyid kyi bden pa'o/ /gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mthur
'gyur ro/ /brang pa de kho na nyid do/ /kI la ya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ /kI la ya lan bco brgyad bzlas nas sting dkar nag gi mtshams su'o/ /hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ /phaT
phaT phaT/ 'di brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dum bu slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dngos kyi rgya dpe dang mthun par dpal ldan sa skya paN+Di tas g.yas ru'i
@#/ /sa'i cha shangs kyi sreg zhing du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA kA la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/
nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo rnams
kyis ji ltar thob pa de bzhin bzhugs so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can de rnams thabs gang gis gdon/ 'khor pa lha gang
gis gang las grol bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa sbyor ba la ye shes su de dag brjod
par bya'o/ /lha mo/ legs par nyon cig /bskyed pa'i rim pas 'gog pa la gnas pa dang / de'i 'bras bu ster ba'i ji lta ba'i lam yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa la
nges par phyag rgya las dbang bskur ba'i bye brag bya'o/ /rgyu ba gcod pa la spyod pa de la yongs su brtag pa ste/ na ra dang / sbyor ba las ji ltar lam dang ldan pa bskyed pa'i
rim pa'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye/ bcom ldan 'das/ dgos pa gang gis rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa yin/ de ltar na so so'i bum pa la dgos pa ci yod/ bcom ma
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes pa la ni dngos med bkag pa ste/ rdo rje nam mkha' yin pa'o/ /nges par bdag med pa yin zhing / bde ba skad cig ma'o/ /ji ltar tshogs
pa ma lus pa dang / grong khyer ba de ltar skyes pa la stobs kyis 'gog pa yis bde ba rgyas pa 'chi ba med na ji ltar skye/ lha mos gsol pa/ kye| bcom ldan 'das/
lus bstan pa'i dgos pa gang lags/ lam la khrag dang / byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan gyi grol ba las med dam/ 'bras bu ster ram/ lta ba'i
don du 'dod chags kyi phyir rab tu sbyor bar brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus rdo rje zhes brjod pa'o/ /ji ltar sgyu mar sems dpas na ra dang sbyor
ba bzhin no/ /lam 'dus pa las khrag go zhes pa ni/ la la nA dang / ra sa nA dang / a ba d+hU tI rnams kyi phung po lnga la rnam par spyad pa yis thabs gcig tu mnyam par gang
gis shes pa'i tshe'i rdo rje la de'i lam 'dus pa las khrag ces brjod do/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i lus zhes brjod pa de ni rnam par spyad pa mi bzod pa gang 'dod pa de rab tu sbyor
ba'i lus so/ /rab tu sbyor bas rmongs pa'i phyir rab tu sbyor ba byas pa zhes brjod do/ /lha mos gsol pa/ chos gang lags/ chos kyi tshogs pa'i gtam brjod pa gang lags/
@#/ /mi rnams kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir ram/ don thob par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nad med par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i
phyir yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mir skye ba'i sems can chos ji ltar spyad na tshegs med par de'i dngos grub ji lta bar brjod par bya'o/ /dngos
grub chen po brgyad rnams ni ral gri dang / mig sman dang / ril bu dang / rkang mgyogs kyi dngos grub dang / sgrub pa'i sman dang / sngags rnams la nges par dngul
chu dang / bcud len te/ dngos grub chen po brgyad thob nas dngos grub gzhan brtags na/ ji lta bar sems can nag po chen po'i rgyud pa rnams kyis 'grub bo/ /'dir
tshogs pa med par nges pa'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ mig sman dngos grub 'di las 'jug pa la bcing bya bcing byed ji ltar phra bar brjod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ legs par srung ba dang / rmig pa'i sgra ltar brlag pa ji lta bar sbas pa de'i sdom pa rgyas par brjod do/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ dbugs 'gro 'ong dang / skad cig ma du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu so gnyis so/ /dbugs
'gro 'ong ni yongs su bcing ba dang / lus las skyes pa'i dbugs phyir 'thon pa ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dag gis bskyod pa'o/ /grangs kyi bye brag brjod pa ni drug brgya lhag pa'i stong
phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'gro 'ong ngo / /de las 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba skad cig go /lha mos gsol pa/ kye| bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i lha yi rab tu gsal bar
gang mdzad/ 'dod pa sgrub pa khyab 'jug gis kyang sgyu mas sprul pa byas pa bzhin lak+Sha me dang / dbyangs can ma dag gi phyir/ dbul po rnams la mun pa dang bral ba ltar
zhing skyong bas na sbyor ba bsgo ba byas pas yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye| lha mo/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can rnams 'khro ba na 'khor zhing
yod pa de rmongs pa dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog dang / phra ma rnams skyes par gyur pas dpal nag po chen po yis gang smras pa de gus pa dang bcas pas so/ /
khyab 'jug ltar 'dod pa'i lha dang / nam mkha' 'gro ma drug cu rtsa bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bskyed par brjod do/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye| bcom ldan 'das/
nag po chen po zhes bya ba ci la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nag po chen po la dmigs nas sdod pa de yis dus kyi grangs shin tu tshad mar byas pa dang /
@#/ /nyi ma re re zhing grangs gang la bzang por rgyu ba de nag po chen po zhes brjod do/ /gang la med pa'am/ gang la dus chen po'i mtha' dang ldan pa nag
po chen po ste/ nag po chen por yongs su bya ba 'di'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ yi ge ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ hA zhes bya ba ni ci la bgyi/ kA la zhes pa ni ji lta bu lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma zhes pa sems dpa'i snying rje dang / hA zhes pa shes rab dang sbyor ba ste shes rab nyid do/ /kA la ni gnyis tshogs pa las
dus te thabs dang / shes rab kyis snying rje chen po la sbyor ba zhes pa'o/ /rengs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / sde rengs par byed pa dang / mngon spyod rnams rnal 'byor gyi
dbang phyug rnams kyis ji ltar rig pas rnal 'byor ma brgyad rgyud 'dir bzhengs pa/ gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang / tsa rtsi ka dang / dus can ma dang / rigs kyi
dbang phyug ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / mche gtsigs ma dang / mi thung ma dang / dbang phyug chen mo rnams gang gis bsgoms pa las skye ste/ 'dzin pa'i shes pa
de dus kyi gtso bo grol bar 'dod pa'o/ /de ni bsgom bya dang / sgom pa med pa yin no/ /gang dang / gang gis bsgom pa rnams mi skye'o/ /des na yid kyi mnga' bdag gis
sems rab tu brtags pa med pa/ be tA li'i gzugs kyis yang dag par bsgrubs kyang mi skye'o/ /rigs lnga la sbyad pa yis ji ltar gsungs pa'i las de ltar 'grub po/
gzhan dang / gzhan du bgrod pa ni tshes kyi bye brag bzang po la ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don du'o/ /nges par gang dang gang thob par byed par 'gyur te/ rnam grangs
kyis 'bras bu de rnams so/ /dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ de kho na shes par byed pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //thab khung gi rnam pa'i le'u
bshad par bya ste/ lha mos gsol pa/ kye| rje btsun sems can gyi phyir dngos grub brgyad kyi bya ba de'i don du sdug bsngal med par byed pa gang gis nye bar 'thob/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba rgyu ba'i dus su dbugs phyir rgyu ba bzung ste/ gnas par nges par dngos grub chen po brgyad 'grub bo/ /gang gi tshe yongs su
smin par 'dod pas 'di byas na 'grub bo/ /bsad pa la thab khung gru bzhi pa/ rgyar khru gang bar me tog nag pos sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rengs pa la zlum po rgyar khru ngo pa'o/ /
dbang du bya ba la gru gsum rgyar khru gang pa/ sa sbyang ba khru gang brkos la bya ste/ me tog dmar pos sbyin sreg bya ba ni blo gros can gyis dom gyi pags pa la bsdad
@#/ /la 'di bya'o/ /rkang byug sgrub pa'i don du sbyin sreg gi thab khung gi mtshan nyid brjod pa zlum po khru gang pa las byang ba ni khru lnga brkos la bya'o/ /mig
sman don du sbyin sreg 'dir brjod pa sprul gyi mgo lta bu khru phyed dam do pa las sbyang ba khru bdun brkos pa na mig sman gyi thab khung ngo / /'dir ril bu'i bstan pa ni glang
po che'i rmig pa tsam pa la/ /sa sbyang ba khru bcu brkos pa 'di ril bu'i thab khung ngo / /bcud len gyi don du thab kyi dbyibs rna rgyan lta bu khru phyed dang gnyis pa la/ sa sbyang
ba khru gsum brkos pa ni bcud len gyi thab khung ngo / /rgyal po'i don du thab khung khru gang pa yin te dbyibs zlum po'o/ /sa sbyang ba la khru brgyad brkos pa ni dngos
grub sgrub pa'i don du ste/ sbyor ba 'di yis dngos grub nges pa'o/ /'dir brjod pa thams cad me tog dkar pos sbyin sreg byas na dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras
bu nye bar 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thab khung gi rnam pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas
sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya ste/ sngags kyi bye brag gnyis las/ /zhi ba'i sngags kyi rim pa ni/ oM yig gi ming gis rgyud 'dir zhes te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan
pa skyob pa zhi ba la dga' ba'i sngags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi dam bca' byas pa de'i phyir ye shes chen po'i sngags brjod pa'o/ /oM mahA kA la hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag gnyis pa'i
sngags so/ /oM hrIM hrIM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so/ /oM mahA b+hai ra ba sarba sid+d+hi/ dA ya ka DaM daM hUM kuM d+h+waM TaH phyag drug pa'i sangs so/ /oM AHhUM phaT hrIHhUMH
phyag brgyad pa'i sngags so/ /oM hI kAM hUM kI li kI la mahA nA da kA rA la bi ka rA lA k+ShI gri hAH da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sid+d+hi dA ya ka swAhA/ phyag bcu pa'i sngags so/ /oM
daM Sh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya saM saM saM ru ru ru ru hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag bcu gnyis pa'i sngags te/ las thams cad byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phyag byed pa
dang / 'jig rten gsum 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /oM ya ma dza ga ta k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ tA la pA tA la/ khA hi khA hi/ gr-i h+na ba li gra hAHgra hAH oM maM tsaM
mahA b+hai ra bA ya swAhA/ dngos grub thams cad kyi don du phyag bcu bzhi pa'i sngags 'dis gtor ma rgyun du sbyin no/ /oM maM maM raM hUM hUM maM rak+Sha pA la ya hUM badzra phaT/ bdag srung
