la ni ling+ga bzhag /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro/ /de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga
la ni ling+ga bzhag /rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling+ga
bzhag /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya/ /de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag /
sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu bsgom/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro/ /de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling+ga
bzhag /khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro/ /de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/
dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi khu ba'i thigs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod/ /de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis
ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu dbyung / /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya/ /de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sangs
rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis/ /bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig /de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rdo rje
chos kyi gsung gang yin/ /gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra ste/ /chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig /de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/
gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa/ /kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni/ /bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur/ /de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar
sgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig /de la sngags
@#/ /thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin/ /gsung gi sku yang rnam sgom pa/ /bdag
kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar/ /sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig /de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin/ /'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar
bya| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na/ /dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang
bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /thams cad ma skyes zag pa med/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med/ /khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med/ /de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran
pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin/ /gnyis med gnyis su med min bzhin/ /shin tu dri med nam
mkha' bzhin/ /de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed
pa| |rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te/ /bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya/ /'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni/ /chos 'dzin mchog gi
gsung dag kyang / /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub/ /gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te/ /bzlas pa tsam
gyis de 'grub 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin
pa chen po la/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che/ /nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /rgyal mchog
mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /
thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa/ /theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas/ /sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag /mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol/ /byang chub sems na rgyas pa'i
spyan / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag /phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams
@#/ /cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/ /kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa/ /sku dang
gsung dang thugs skal mchog /rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad/ /na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa/ /gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni/ /lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed/ /
byol song las kyang rab tu brtag /sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am/ /rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su/ /bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa'am/ /rgyal
ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya/ /nu ma'i dbus bar spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar/ /cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar/ /lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs lnga rnams
ni dgod par rab tu bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par/ /mkhas pas snying gar bsgom
par bya/ /zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na/ /bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ /rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la/ /'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi/ /
gnas de yin par rnam par bsam/ /bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro/ /mkhas pas ut+pa la dag dang / /pad+ma rnam pa lngar shes bya/ /
dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /me tog kar+N+Ni kA ra dang / /ma l+li kA dang yu thi kA/ /me tog ka ra bI ra bsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag /
dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas la/ /rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni/ /rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya/ /de bzhin pad+ma rdo rje dang / /ral
gri ut+pal mkhas pas bsgom/ /dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du/ /gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa/ /gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /rigs rnams
thams cad mchod pa'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis gnas su bsgom/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam/ /rin chen na bza' la sogs pas/ /
byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis/ /rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya/ /rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog /rin chen sna tshogs mchog
gis brgyan/ /sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la/ /dngos grub 'dod pas
sbyin ba'i phyir/ /nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul/ /bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la/
@#/ /reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus/ /
bla ma bshad dang gcig bas mchod/ /bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu
brtag /mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas/ /khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi
gsang / /sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ bshang gci'i dam
tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog /dbang phyug dam pa
kun don gyis/ /sku gsung thugs la longs sbyod pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi gsang / /nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas/ /lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang //
'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang / /dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams/ /bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag /sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni/ /rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur
pa| |bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni/ /thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus/ /sems can thams cad bsad na ni/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing
dag tu / rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste/ rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/
mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa/ /ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med/ /byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa ni/ /yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen kun gyi sbyor
ba yis/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag /nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su/ /rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na/ /nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra
par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang / /thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las/ /gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa
@#/ /nyid du shes par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags thar pa rab bsgrub pa/ /gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bka'
stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang / /bud
med lta bur sbyar ba ni/ /dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de ru bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /de dang mas cad
nye bar spyad/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o/ /'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/ sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o/ /
de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa/ /bdag med ye shes las byung bas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje tshig
gi brdzun smra bas/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang / /rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa/ /ye shes blo can
kun gyi gsang / /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad/ /'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta bu bzhin du spro bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po
rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas/ /rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dam tshig
dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te/ /gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang / /rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni/ /bsten na ye shes thob
par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur nas/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i skad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa thams cad kyis/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ dman pa'i 'du
shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu 'ang ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go /'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod
pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khongs
su gtogs pa'o/ /chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po
bzhi la 'ang mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing / sems can
rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar nam mkha' tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su

rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de 'ang gtsub shing la 'ang mi
gnas/ gtsub stan la'ang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la'ang mi gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang /
'ong pa la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /
rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang / /rnam par mi rtog dag pa las/ /kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa/ /sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags/ /dngos grub chen
@#/ /po'i tshul gyi mchog /yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso/ /'bar ba drag po spyan
yangs pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa/ /gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid/ /sku
gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod
pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad
de| phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing / dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang / de dag sngags spyod pa la
mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas spyan ras kyis
mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba/ sngags thams
cad kyi snying po kun du bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ rab tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin thams
cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so/ /oM AHhUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas sras dang
bcas pa kun/ /rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs
so| |nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM/ /rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag /rdo rje'i 'od zer cher
'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs/ /drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na/ /de ma thag tu der 'gyur ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo
@#/ /rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog /rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes/ /bskyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur/ /
'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin/ /rang sngags skyes bur bsgoms na ni/ /gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul/ /zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor
ba yis/ /kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi gsang ba'o/ /snying ga'i dbus su phra
mo yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig /de yi dbus su bsam par bya/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /rdo
rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya/ /de yis snying gar brdab byas te/ /lha rnams ji snyed bskul bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub rab bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje pad+mo'i rigs la sogs/ /rdo rje kyo ba rnam bsgom zhing / /snying ga ru ni bskul bar bshad/ /'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste/ /rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di//
zhag bdun bar du byas na ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang / /sku dang gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog stsol ba dag rnam par gzigs/ /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag
gyur nas/ /yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i/ /dngos grub rgya chen ster bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas/ /rmongs pas
'da' bar byas na ni/ /de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog /'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka'
stsal to/ /sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /dngos po thams cad brtag par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
sngags kyi dam tshig sgom pa'o/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab bsgom zhing / /chags la chags pas blta bar bya/ /'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas
rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras/ /thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtsos/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /
bud med ji snyed yod pa kun/ /phyag rgya che sogs spyor ba yis/ /de dag thams cad nye par spyad/ /bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya/ /bcom ldan
'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho/ /rdo rje
@#/ /sems dpa'i tshe des 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi rdo rje rig pa'i skyes
bu'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog /phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom pa/ /byang chub thams cad thob pa'i phyir/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /oM ni
ye shes snying po ste/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob byed pa'o/ /AHni byang chub bdag med pa/ /rdo rje gsung ni thob byed pa'o/ /hUM ni sku gsung thugs nyid de/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /dkyil 'khor
rdo rje kun skyes bsam/ /rdo rje'i sprin ni 'phro bskyed pa/ /de ru yi ge b+h+ruM bsam mo/ /de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /b+h+ruM| rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hUM zhes
bya ba rab tu bsgom/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge AHni rab tu bsgom/ /yi ge
b+h+ruM gyis gnas bsgoms te/ /rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya/ /snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa/ /oM ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog /oM
AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam/ /AHhUM ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jings/ /hUM| byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab
bsgrub pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung / /'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste/ /sngags kyi rig pa zhes kyang bsgrags/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms
pa'i| |dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar/ /sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na/ /rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub/ /gsal ba'i
dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te/ /rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed/ /yi ge oM ni snying gar bzhag /'od zer lnga yi sprin chen po/ /rnam par snang
@#/ /mdzad mchog tu sgom/ /'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra
ba'i mdog /rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas/ /zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /rang gi sngags kyi
skyes bu bskyed/ /AHni ngag gi lam bzhag ste/ /kha dog lnga yi pad+ma che/ /'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms pa yis/ /dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te/ /tshig gis dam
tshig lnga yi mchog /chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa/ /rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni/ /rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas/ /bcom ldan
'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la/ /sems la yi ge hUM gnas pa/ /dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni/ /kha
dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba/ /ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga ldan bsten
na ni/ /rdo rje skal pa gsum du gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam
tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya/ /lus rnams kun la khaM dmigs na/ /rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur/ /
khaM| sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / /skal ba gsum du dam tshig gnas/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
nam mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mi snang pa 'byung ba bkod pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor dbus su ni/ /rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas/ /snying gar rdo rje haM zhes pa/ /bzhag ste 'od zer rnam par sgom/ /haM|'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la/ /sku
gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
@#/ /to| |'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge th+lIM/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ /mtshon mchog rdo rje'i lus ngag gis/ /rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /
th+lIM/ nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog /rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni dngos
grub thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rab bsgoms la/ /ye shes oM ni bsgom par bya/ /oM| rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas
de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang / /gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du/ /mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par
'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la/ /rin chen oM ni bsam par bya/ /oM| rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje gsum
dpag med 'drar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od dang 'dra/ /de ni bdag med byang chub dang / /ye shes gsang ba 'dir gnas 'gyur/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin po che'i dam tshig longs spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to| |nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la/ /chos kyi oM ni bsgom par bya/ /oM| rdo rje
dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ni sems can
thams cad kyi/ /theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpal
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rdo rje pad+ma la bsgoms la/ /dam tshig oM ni rab tu bsgom/ /oM|
rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho/ /
@#/ /sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od
zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /rdo rje snang mdzad rab
bsgoms la/ /sku gsum oM ni rab tu sgom/ /oM| rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas/ /rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag yid rdo rje yi/ /rnam par
snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od/ /de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi de skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /lus dang / ngag dang / yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang / /klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang
ni| |dur gyi khrod la sogs par yang / /bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom/ /mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam/ /mngon
shes lnga po'i sbyor pa yis/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to//
rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /'bar ba lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur/ /me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi/ /rang sngags 'khor
lo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du/ /'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra/ /sangs rgyas 'jug
par rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag gi lus la snang mdzad bzhag /snying gar yi ge oM bsams
la| |sngags la rnam par shes pa bsgom/ /'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du/ /gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa/ /yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur
'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom/ /snying gar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas/ /sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag /sangs rgyas
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/ /snying gar yi ge AHbsams te/ /rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag /'di ni dam tshig mchog gi mchog /rdo
rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa/ /'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
@#/ /bsgom par bya/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge oM/ /bsams na de ni skal par gnas/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge AH/ /bsams na de ni skal par gnas/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /lus ngag
sems la yi ge hUM/ /bsams na de ni skal par gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sku dang gsung thugs
rdo rje yi/ /rnal 'byor 'dir gyur phyin chad ni/ /klog gam yang na sems kyang rung / /de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu
gcig pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pa/ /dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum/ /rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /
mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa/ /rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las/ /rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs
su| |me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan/ /ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub/ /maM| lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la/ /rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom/ /lus
dang ngag sems la spros pas/ /rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /dag
pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /rdo rje 'jam pa mchog gi dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung / /bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni/ /lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te/ /khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyed
pa'i| /thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od 'dra bar/ /de ma thag tu de 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs mchog can/ /rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms
nas| |sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /bsgoms nas sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang
'dra ba kun/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms nas//
@#/ /rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par/ /bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de snyed kyi ni bud med rnams//
yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur/ /drag po dag gis phyag byas pa/ /khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur/ /rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab
brgyad la/ /rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par/ /bsams na chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /rdul phran ji snyed
yod pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed/ /pad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ye shes lnga ldan rab
bsten na/ /bskal pa gsum du yun du gnas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed/ /'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od/ /
rang gi sngags kyi ral gri bsgom/ /mig yangs lag na thogs na ni/ /rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur/ /khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing / /tshangs dbang lha
min phyag byas pa/ /stong gsum na ni gcig bu pa/ /mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo
rje'i thugs las rab tu byung / /de lta bu yi dngos grub ste/ /ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni//
dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /
dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog /AHni ril bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /de ni de
ma thag tu yang / /byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog /hUM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i/ /'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas
ni| |dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i
dbus gnas par/ /rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na/ /'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms
te| |sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing / /ye shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms/
@#/ /te| |lag tu rdo rje rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing / /rdo rje'i mchog
'di sgrub pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par/ /rin chen rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na/ /rin chen rig
pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rin po che yi rigs bsgoms nas/ /rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing / /rin chen mchog 'di sgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings
chos kyi dbus gnas par/ /tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/ /lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na/ /pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i rigs chen bsgoms nas su/ /
chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing / /pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par/ /gdon mi za ba'i ye she bsgom//
lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na/ /ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas/ /thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing / /dam tshig mchog
'di sgrub pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ /rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs/ /rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis/ /bsam gtan des
ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung / /mtshan ma gcig dang
zhi gnas su/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub/ /sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi/ /sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
blo ldan gyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba btang / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin/ /dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa/ /rdo rjes
bkug nas nye bar spyod/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje pad+mo la sogs pas/ /rgyal gnas lcags kyu
bsams nas ni/ /dam tshig dgug mchog kyo bas bya/ /khams gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms
la| |lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /skyo ba la sogs rab tu bsgom/ /'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun
ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na/ /rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /lag tu bsgrub bya bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog /mchod
pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces
gsungs so/ /sha chen dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya/ /bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /glang
po'i sha yi dam tshig gis/ /mngon shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur/ /rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur/ /khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis/ /dngos
grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis/ /rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /sha rnams thams cad med na yang / /thams cad bsams pas
rnam par brtag /rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/ /snying gar
ye shes dam tshig dang / /dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa/ /dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i
mchog /dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya/ /dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog /rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms
te| |bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /thos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur/ /AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang / /'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mi phyed 'dra bar
'gyur/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig bdud rtsi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog /sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /nor
bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed/ /'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
gang+ga'i bye snyed thams cad du/ /grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod/ /dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas/ /thams cad
dam tshig mchog tu 'grub/ /mi snang gyur pa thams cad la/ /stong khams dag ni snang bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang / /lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod/ /gang+ga'i
bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang+ga'i bye snyed zhing rnams na/ /sgra bsgrags pa ni
@#/ /ji snyed pa/ /mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni/ /rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin/ /gang+ga'i bye snyed zhing dag gi /sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni/ /
sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi/ /rol mo las byung sems rig 'gyur/ /bskal pa gang+ga'i bye snyed du/ /'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan
tshig rnams/ /zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran/ /gang+ga'i bye ma snyed kyi lus/ /sangs rgyas sprin la sogs brgyan pa/ /bskal pa gang+ga'i bye snyed du/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog
gis 'gengs/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni/ /rdo rje'i spyan dang / rdo rje'i snyan dang /
rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang / rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gang+ga'i bye snyed grangs med
pa'i| |'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis/ /'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang / /nye
bar sgrub pa 'byung ba dang / /sgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang / /sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi/ /rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la/ /de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyen pa'i
ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba/ /byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la/ /rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad/ /sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis/ /sgrub pa'i tshe
ni bskul bar gsungs/ /sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe/ /rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam/ /ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i ye
shes bdud rtsi dag /thams cad du ni rtag par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang / /rab tu rnam
par dben ba dang / /ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su/ /rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yang na rdo
rje bzhi dag gis/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen pa bya/ /sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas/ /
blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni/ /ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM/ /bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad/ /zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang / /zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /rdo
rje dam tshig bsgrub na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul ba/ /nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan/ /gsang ba mchog las byung ba la/ /
@#/ /zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs/ /de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed
gsum 'byed pa/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te/ /rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//
de la sku yis mtshan pa yi/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do/ /de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi
phyed gsum 'byed pa/ /byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te/ /rdo rje gsung dang ldan par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs
rgyas rnams/ /de la gsung las byung ba yi/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do/ /de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo/ /rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal
dang ldan/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te/ /rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /phyogs bcu
na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams/ /de la thugs las byung ba yis/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na chos kyi
sems dpa'ang rung / /rmongs pas 'da' bar byed na ni/ /tshal par 'gas par gdon mi za/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang
ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas
bcom ldan bde gshegs kun/ /ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /sems can kun don yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /thub pa don kun rdo rje can/ /
ston pa che la phyag btsal nas/ /dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la/ /mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas tshul re bzang / /e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi
mchog /e ma'o chos kyi tshul re zhi/ /e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re brtan/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can/ /rnam par mi rtog yang dag rig /ye
shes 'byung ba rab tu bshad/ /yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che/ /sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang / /sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur
ba| |rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /sku dang /
@#/ /gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan/ /gsang sngags zlos pa de ring gsungs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gsan pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs
rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams/ /rdo rje sngags kyi rab bsgoms pas/ /ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas
ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung / /byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos/ /rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so/ /sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni/ /rdo
rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan/ /rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar/ /bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su/ /spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya//
rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /ye shes rdo
rjes byas na ni/ /rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs/ /bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab tu
bya| |'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o/ /yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis/ /so so dag tu spro bar bya/ /sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa/ /ye shes sems kyis yang
dag spro/ /brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni/ /rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yin/ /sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub/ /dngos dang
dngos med rnam dpyad pa/ /sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad/ /de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad/ /gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/ /sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa/ /gsung
gi rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad/ /thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub/ /gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa/ /thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ste/ /de ni thugs kyi
bzlas par bshad/ /don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid med bzang po yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa/ /de ni rin chen bzlas par bshad/ /sangs rgyas zhing
rnams thams cad du/ /sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang / /bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don/ /de ni thogs med bzlas par bshad/ /khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis/ /rang gi rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor grags/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa/ /de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad/ /'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa/ /kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'/ /sems can gti
mug gnas la 'jog /de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad/ /'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig /lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i/ /sems can 'dod chags mtshor
@#/ /gnas bzhag /de ni 'dod chags bzlas par bshad/ /zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems/ /lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i/ /sems can zhe sdang
gnas la bzhag /de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad/ /dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum/ /dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can/ /de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yi/ /bzlas pa ma ning zhes bya 'o/ /
'dod chags de nyid don sgom pa/ /rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni/ /sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i/ /'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad/ /rig pa chen mo spyan/
la sogs/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub/ /gti mug dam tshig las byung ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal po
rdo rje can/ /ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa/ /dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster/ /khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes/ /gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag /sgrub pa mchog gi chos can
la| |gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi/ /'khor
lo snying ga'i dbus su bsgom/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dbus su 'khor lo'i don bsgom mo/ /ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi/ /rdo rje snying ga'i
dbus su bsgom/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya/ /rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi/ /rin chen snying ga'i dbus su
bsgom/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya/ /pad+mo ye shes can rnams kyi/ /pad+mo snying ga'i dbus su bsgom/ /chos kyi
dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par bya/ /ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi/ /ral gri snying ga'i dbus su bsgom/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus
gnas par/ /ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams su/ /sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya/ /'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis/ /spros na
byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni/ /bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags/ /sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu ba bya/ /lus kyis
sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /sems kyis thugs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid/ /mchod nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis//
rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya/ /dbus su bdag po bsams nas ni/ /sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs/ /rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa
@#/ /bzhi dag tu/ /kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags la/ /snying gar sngags kyi don bsgoms pa/ /rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las/ /bsam gtan rdo rje can
dag byed/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin/ /zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/ /rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can/ /dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas//
rdo rje khro mo mngon spyod la/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba/ /sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste/ /bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa 'o/ /ma dad smra
ba'i sems can dang / /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang / /rab tu bskul ba 'di bya 'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i
'khor lo rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /dgra bos bsad par bsams nas
su| |de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhal bzhi pa/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems
dpar rnam par bsgom/ /dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che/ /lag pa g.yas pas 'di
bya'o| |phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis/ /bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su/ /rang gi lus la de dang gzhug /sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor
lo can/ /slar yang spro bar rab tu bya/ /khro bas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo rnams/ /mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa/ /gsod pa'i don
gyis don sems pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam/ /gdug pa chen po gsod par byed/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog stsol pa'o/ /rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor
gnas/ /nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /rmongs pas grub pa mi ster na/ /'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi
bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan/ /rnam par snang
mdzad rab tu bsgom/ /dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni/ /rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can/ /de yi phyag na bsnams par bsgom/ /phyogs bcu
nas byung sems can rnams/ /rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis/ /'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/ /de dag bdag gi lus la gzung / /spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /ye shes mchog gi
@#/ /gnyen gyis bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /bka' yi 'khor
lo rab sbyor ba/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi/ /zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'tshal/ /'khor
lo'i dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo che/ /
rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag /dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams/ /sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag /gshin rje gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /slar yang
sangs rgyas spro bar bya/ /dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang / /gdug sems can gyi dgra bo rnams/ /khros pas thams cad gsod par bsgom/ /'di ni rdo rje bka'i
dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am/ /rang sngags
don gyi yon tan nam/ /yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis/ /bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog /rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste/ /'di ni rdo
rje thams cad kyi/ /byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /chos kyi snang mdzad sku
mchog las/ /byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig dag /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /bsams nas gdan du de rab brtag /mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /rang sngags yi ge'i gnas ye shes/ /thugs kyi rnam par bsgoms par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du/ /
bsgoms nas slar yang rab tu bsdu/ /thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir/ /sku gsum la ni de dag gzud/ /rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas rim bzhin bkod nas ni/ /chu yi steng du bcag par bya/ /rkang pa
mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom/ /bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni/ /dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la/ /las kyi rdo rje rkang pa yis/ /de yi spyi bor gnon par bsgom/ /mu
@#/ /stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i tshul/ /ge sar
ser po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar/ /bsams nas spyi bor rab tu bsgom/ /sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na/ /mi dbang la ni dogs pa med//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ /dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig gi /bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas dag gis 'das na yang / /'gas par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so/ /hUM las phur bu bsam pa ni/ /rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste/ /rdo rje phur bu de yis ni/ /snying gar de ni
rab bsgoms na/ /khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang / /'jig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /grong ngam
yang na grong khyer ram/ /ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba/ /nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang / /'dis ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni/ /bar snang dag la rab tu
bsgom/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na/ /slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /spro ba dag kyang de nas bya/ /rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od/ /chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms
nas kyang / /dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya/ /rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/ /sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpal
ldan 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' der spro bya/ /bskal ba gsum gyi yun gnas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /
'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o/ /nad thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bsam nas las byung dam
bcas pas/ /gnas gang du ni yang dag spyad/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che/ /rdo rje phur bu rab tu
bsgom/ /me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yis/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam
pa ni / /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas/ /rang gi thugs kar 'dod pa bzhag /spyan pa sogs pa mchog rnams
@#/ /kyis/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom/ /bsdus nas 'od kyi gang bu yis/ /nad pa la ni dbab par bya/ /ba spu'i bu ga nas sangs rgyas/ /
sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe/ /de la dbang bskur rab tu rtsol/ /nad pa rdo rje dam tshig gis/ /skad cig gis ni dpal ldan
'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bkod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /chos 'dzin

bsdus nas ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od/ /lus dang ngag dang sems gnas la/ /'dod pa la de dbab par bya/ /ba spu'i bu ga nas rin chen/ /sprin rnams brtul
zhugs can gyis spro/ /chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nas su/ /dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya/ /rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni/ /dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs/ /sbyin

zla gam dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rdo rje nam mkha' chos mdun gzugs/ /'dod pa snying gar gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /nam mkha'i dkyil
'khor yongs su gang / /'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni gzi brjid dbab par bya/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byon/ /'jam dpal gyi ni mdog
dang 'dra/ /gnas las byed par de 'gyur ro/ /dbang bskur ba ni dga' ston che/ /dgyes pa'i bdag nyid de rtsol bas/ /bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang / /'gro ba thams

sna tshogs dang / /bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dgra bo rnams ni skrag par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa/ /

na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang / /zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /rdo rje

pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba shA pa ri pU ra ka sar+b+ban nA shA ya ri pUn/ ka ra ka ra he he b+ha ga ban/ kany+tsi
rA ya si/ ma ma sar+b+ba ar+thA na/ sa d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas 'di na gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ /'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' rjes su dran/ /thod pa ma chags ma gas pa/ /gzugs mdzes yid 'ong rnyed pa la/ /rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas/ /sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya/ /mA ma ki 'am
spyan yang rung / /rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba/ /lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni/ /de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs so/ /
@#/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ na mo badzra

kro d+hA ya/ mahA daM Sh+T+ro ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta

te| |byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/ /srin po ma rungs gtum po dang / /'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang / /rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyor na/ /las rnams cho ga
