ga /dzA li ta bi s+phu liM ga /aT+TaT+Ta hA sa/ ke sa ri sa Ta a ToM pa/ TaM kA ra/ badzra khu ra ni ra g+hA ta na tsa li ta ba su d+hA ta la/ ni shwA sa mA ru to ta k+Shi ba ta d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Na aT+TAT+Ta

a pa ri mi ta ba la pa rA kra ma/ AR+ya ga Na/ b+hI ta b+hU ta gaN/ d+hu Shi ta/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ ha ya gr-I ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+tA na/ tshin+da tshin+da/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ pa ra mu drA na/

ma me di sha/ a pe sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra pi shA tsA dI na/ sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha to b+ha ba/ badzra daMSh+Ta kany+tsi ra ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta gra haM duSh+Ta sarbaM bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/
@#/ /ma ra da ma ra da/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru/ shrI g+h+ri ha ya gr-I bA ya phaT/ badzrA ya phaT/ badzrA gA trA ya

phaT| badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra daMSh+TA ya phaT/ badzra khU rA ya phaT/ badzra khu ra nir g+hA ta na ya phaT/ trai lo kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba karme Shu a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badzra ku
la san trA sa nA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes/ /'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ye shes
rgyal po rjes su dran/ /mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba/ /rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /dug rnams thams cad med par byed/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM e h+ye hi/ b+ha
ga bAn nI la badzra daN+Da/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bA na/ bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tAn shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ da ra

da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba karmA Ni/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ a s+thi me da ma s+ya ru d+hi ra madz+dza me da/

ba sha madz+dza ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ sarba big+h+na ni/ sarba bir+yA ni/ sarba man+t+ra ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/ kri tri ma Ni Sha dI ni/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra da ma ra da/

i dam+me kAR+yaM sA d+ha ya/ hUM nI lA ya/ nI lA badzra daN+Da ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nan ba nA ya ka nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dIp+ta tsaN+DA ya/ sarba sha trUM NAM hrI da ya ni pi DA yA/ tshin+da tshin+da pa ra

bid+yA nAM ts+tshe da ke /hUM bid+yA nAM shiSh+Ta ka /sa ma ya nu sma ra/ badzra d+ha ra ba tsA nAM tsa/ marmA Ni ni krin+ta hUM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT
phaT/ hUM hUM kri tan+ta ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA pa kA ya/ /ha na ha na/ badzra daN+De na swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun/ /yid ni
'jigs shing rab skrag nas/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dran/ /khro bo'i rgyal po grags chen 'di/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang / /cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis/ /
gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ kun nas sprin dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
@#/ /zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT
phaT phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti ni ra nA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM mahA ba la ya swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag /stobs
po che yis klu rnams kun/ /yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas/ /sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran/ /bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par
byed| |than pa byung ba'i dus na yang / /chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi Dak+ki'i rgyal po khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka
tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ Dak+ki hUM dzaHde nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun/ /'jigs shing dam tshig ldan gyur nas/ /rdo rje sku gsum rjes su
dran| |rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ling ga rkang pa g.yas pas mnan/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/
de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba'i chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN+Ta/ naT+Ta maT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ shaT+Ta shaT+Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ha na ha

na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badzra ha sa ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ marda ra Ta marda ra Ta/ gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ mahA man+t+ra/

bA la ka /d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+han mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TAM/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarbAM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ mahA biSha Na badzra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ tri ba lI ta raM/

ga na rta ka /AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ti ka trA Ta/ mahA ba la shA ta ya/ sa ma ya ni/ g+ha ta ya/ pa ra sa man+t+rAn/ AM AM/ hAM hAM mAM shud d+h+ya tu lo ka/
tuSh+yaM tu badzri/ na mo sta A pra ti ha ta pa le b+h+yo/ dz+wA la ya/ ta Ta a sa ha na nam swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis/ /lha rnams 'khor du bcas pa kun/ /brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag
nas/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran/ /khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis/ /lha chen dag la sogs pa'i lha/ /mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas/ /kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur/
@#/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam

tshig khro bo gnod mdzes 'di/ /nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na yo b+ha ga waM bi
d+ya rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni/ /skra bshig gos dang bral gyur nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' zhabs kyis mnan/ /da bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /bu mo rnams ni 'gugs pa'i mchog /de nas bcom ldan
'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam
tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zhags
ba rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas sku gsung sbyor ba yi/ /'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rtag tu nges
bar khugs par 'gyur/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas/ /'khor lo pad+mo rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis/ /sngags rnams thams cad dgugs pa'i mchog/ thams
cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba/ /rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni/ /mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi/ /snying gar rdo rje kyo ba sbyor/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /nges par rtag
tu 'gugs par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen bsgom/ /de na sha ci gnas par bsam/ /rdo rje mi 'chi'i sbyor ba yis/ /lan
grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni/ /nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po/ /'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni/ /nam mkha'i
bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog /khro bo rdo rje dam tshig ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa dag /shU la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas/ /lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas/ /btsag gam rdo rgyus dag
kyang rung / /rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe/ /khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya/ /tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha/ /rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni/ /rdo rje
gsung gi bka' bzhin du/ /'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /
@#/ /rdo rje kyo ba rnam par bsam/ /bskal pa'i sreg pa'i 'khor lo che/ /bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dag spyad/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang / /sngags
kyi dbye bas thams cad du/ /dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs/ /gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar
bya/ /de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyal po mchog tu rtag pa 'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun du rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje ral pa gcig pa dam tshig chen po'i gsung rdo rje'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM bU le ni swAhA/ de nas 'di
ni gsung tsam gyis/ /klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams/ /tshig par gyur cing gos dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su dran/ /sngags kyi rig pa 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams thams
cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /klu yi bu mo mig bzangs dag /bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer can 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba b+ha ya/ nA sha ni trA sa ni trA si/ trA sa ya trA sa

ya/ bi ra Ta b+h+ri ku TI/ ta Ti/ bai ra Ti bai ra Ti/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Di ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig 'dzin bdag nyid skyes ma kun/ /'dar zhing 'jigs par gyur pas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje
rjes su dran/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog /gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba rnams/ /sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang ni/ /dam tshig mchog gis dgug par bya/ /'gog ba rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /yongs su rdzogs
pas mdzes mchog gis/ /ye shes rdo rje gsum las byung / /kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs/ /yang na khro bo thams cad ni/ /dben pa'i gnas dang chen po ru/ /sngags pas 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /lam
rnams thams cad phyed par bshad/ rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gzhan/ /theg pa che mchog smod pa dag /rab tu 'bad pas gsad par bya/ /yang na gnas nas spo bar bya/ /'di yis byang chub mchog gi ni/ /
sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /yang gsungs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi/ /lus dang ngag sems gsod
pa ni/ /chog bzhin du bsgom byas la/ /gdug sems can gyi dgra rnams ni/ /khrag dang chu yis gsher ba'am/ /gshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /bgos nas ling+ga rkang pas mnan/ /

khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs bzlas na/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /yang gsungs pa/ chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas/ /khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis/ /ling+ga rkang
@#/ /pas mnan na ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos/ /ngan pa rul pa'i dri mnam pa/ /bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na/ /skad cig gis skams 'chi

par 'gyur/ /thal ba'i skyo mas gsher ba'i gos/ /bgos nas phro bas 'khrugs bzhin du/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'jig par 'gyur/ /yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de skra bshig
la| |'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs shing 'gyur/ /rkang pas ling+ga mnan na ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang /
mtshan gcig dang ni shing gcig drung / /mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya/ /mi rus las byas phur bu ni/ /sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/ /dgra bo'i sgo khar
sbas na ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa/ /zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis/ /bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na thod pa gang ba dag/
khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal/ /der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas par bya/ /dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu/ /sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur/ /ta la'i lo ma'am
gzhan la'ang rung / /khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la/ /dgra yi grong ngam sgo dag tu/ /sbas na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dpal rdo rjes
de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo / /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka
tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun/ /brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas/ /nam mkha' rdo rje thugs
dran 'gyur/ /mi rus las byas phur bu 'am/ /yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes/ /lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag /rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed/ /'od 'phro 'khrug
cing mdangs bzang ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag la/ /rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar/ /gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyar bar bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya
chen nam/ /yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag /bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis/ /gdug cing khro ba tshar
@#/ /bcad la/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang / /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin/ /snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i mthar/ /rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom/ /
gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya/ /'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin/ /bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rgyal po che/ /phur bus btab na myur du 'chi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM badzra tshin+da tshin+da/ ha na ha na/
da ha da ha/ dip+ta badzra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya/ /mthe bong bzhi ni rab tu bsdam/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te/ /rdo rje phur bus nges par
gdab/ /btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung gi dam tshig tsham ngam gnod
pa rdo rje'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hri b+hur b+hu ba/ ye shes pad+mo kha bye ba/ /rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag /'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul
gnas te/ /rdo rje'i phur bus nges par 'debs/ /btab ma thag tu rdo rje che/ /sku gsum dri med las byung ba/ /btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi ba'i gnas
su 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po/ /thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham
dam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM badzra rA dza hUM/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni/ /'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par
bsgom/ /rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te/ /rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab/ /btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dri med gsum las byung / /btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur//
yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga legs par byas nas ni/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par/ /phur bus 'debs par
gdon mi za/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /sems can khams la phan mdzad pa/ /
@#/ /mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog /e ma'o snying po kun bsdus
pa| |e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba/ /e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te/ /sku
gsum thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /phur gdab de nyid las byung ba/ /sku gsung thugs ni
mchog sbyin pa'i/ /sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo
rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas/ /rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa/ /smre sha can gyi bdag nyid che/ /bu mo
lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub/ /bshang gci dam tshig la sogs pa/ /de ru cho ga bzhin du ni/ /dkyil 'khor
gru bzhi lham par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yis/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag /rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs
pa| |pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams su rnam par bsgom/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang / /mchod pa'i
gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can/ /rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur//
rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /btso blag mkhan ni bdag nyid che/ /bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog /'dra bdag ni rtag tu sgrub/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni/ /byas nas las
rnams brtsam par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /rgyal po
chos rnams kun dang mtshungs/ /'dod dang thar par bsgrub pa/ /rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing / /bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba/ /
sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub/ /de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag /sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur/ /rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog /bram ze
@#/ /rgyal rigs rje'u'i rigs/ /dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni/ /rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi
ma nub nas ni/ /sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya/ /skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /sgom pa'i mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su
rdzogs/ /spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na/ /grub pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /sangs
rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par
bya| |'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rdo rje can gyi grub 'dod na/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya/ /'di ni dngos grub thams
cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba/ /de nyid bla
na med pa 'grub/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang / thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kr-i tA na na/ sarba sha trUn nA sha ya staM b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar/ /lan tsha ske tshe yungs mar te/ /khro zhing
tsher ma'i me la sreg /bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas/ /nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na/ /'di ni yong ye rab tu shis/ /shes rab can gyi gru gsum du/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul
bzhin bsreg /bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir/ /'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang / /de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas sam ni chos
'dzin pa'am/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni/ /de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur/ /bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la/ /dur khrod sol ba blangs
nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na/ /de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur/ /sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /bsam gtan dag
gis bris na ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis/ /phab na nges par ltung bar 'gyur/ /hUM ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba
@#/ /rab tu bsgom/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas/ /skyes pa'am bud med
gzugs bris la/ /lag par sta re bsams nas su/ /mid pa bcad par rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog /sems can kun la phan 'dod
pa| |'di yang snad par 'gyur ba'am/ /shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba/ /me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can/ /dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni//
chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yin no/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na/ /rlung la sogs pa byung na ni/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su/ gdug pa'i dgra ni dran par
bya| |sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang / /mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te/ /gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang / /sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de la 'di ni sngags
thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /phaT| ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor pa yis/ /dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru/ /bud
med rtag tu gzhag par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing / /pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas/ /sngags 'di rnam par bsgom
par bya/ /hUM| 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba bsgom/ /rang lus dag sems rdo rje la/ /phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /rnam
par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to| |bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi/ /bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin/ /dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /gsang ba blangs nas bza' bar bya/ /de ni de ma thag tu
yang | |'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam/ /mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /dzam+bu'i gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur/ /bshad ba'am yang na bza' ba'am/ /
sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya/ /cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni/ /zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong / /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /bshad pa cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ /kham phor sbyar mar gzhag par bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo / /khyi yi
@#/ /sha dang rta sha dang / /sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin/ /blangs nas sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni/ /zos na de yis mi mthong ngo / /bshang dang lhan cig sbyar
ba yi| |ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu lcags gsum
gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po
gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /ba lang sha dang sbyor ba yi/ /ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /bshang ba las byung srog chags las/ /brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi
mthong ngo / /ga bur tsan+dan sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /gi waM a ga ru
sbyar ba'i/ /ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro/ /ga bur gur gum sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu lcags
gsum gyis dkris pa/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung / /phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs nas/ /da ni de
'dra'i dpal ldan pa'i/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi/ /steng du rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa/ /sangs
rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang / /lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs/ /yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la/ /stobs chen gyis
ni 'dod pa spyad/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag /sems 'khrul yid la dbang
ba rnams/ /ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas/ /gsang ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/ /e ma'o gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba/ /e ma'o ngo bo nyid
kyis dag /e ma'o shin tu dri med chos/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /skyed pa byed pa mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos/ /rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /sems
dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye ba/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur/ /rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs/
@#/ /gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad/ /khro bo'i nang na de mchog ste/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams/ /
dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par bsgom/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la/ /che dpag med pa rab tu bsgom/ /thams cad las byed sngags rnams la/ /gdon mi za ba'i ye shes
bsgom/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la/ /gshin rje gshed ni brtag
par bya/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis/ /bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bsam gtan 'khor
lo de yis ni/ /sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag /dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa/ /sgrub pa po la phan par gsung / /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo chos
rnams kun dbang phyug /sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas/ /ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal to/ /ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang / /nags tshal rab tu dben par ni/ /
bsam gtan rdo rje rab bya ba/ /bzlas dang sngags kyi sbyor bas so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas/ /gsung gi las
kyi bka' bzhin du/ /las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la/ /gnas gsum du
ni rigs brtag go /dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni/ /byas na gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /bskul dang rengs dang lha chen po/ /'phags lam bzhi po dag kyang ni/ /rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya//
de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma'am/ /khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /bzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag/
cho ga thams cad byas nas ni/ /las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni/ /khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur/ /de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig
'di rnams so/ /hUM haHAHdz+haiH nam mkha'i khams ni sems med cing / /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang / /cho ga bzhin du byas na 'bab/ /hUM ni
rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag /haHni sku yi rdo rje can/ /AHni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /'di ni gsang tshig bstan pa'o/ /dz+haiHni bskul bar byed par bshad/ /'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin//
'di ni bskul pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba yin par 'dir ba bshad/ /khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am/ /khru brgyad tsam mam lnga tsam du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bskul na/ /'jigs
@#/ /shing skrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur/ /snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang ba thob pa 'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi bdag /sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas/ /gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang / /brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya/ /sbyor
ba gzhan min pas bya ba/ /gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o/ /dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /skra bshig gcer bur byung
nas ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed/ /dur khrod ro bsregs thal ba yis/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas kyang / /'chi
bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la/ /ba lang sha 'am rta yi sha /khyi yi sha'am sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen
gyis ni thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad/ /'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi/ /'jigs pa shin tu mi bzad yin/ /dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas
ni| |bshang gci dag gi chos mchog can/ /tsher ma'i me la khros nas bsregs/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang / /dgra
yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun/ /dug las byung ba'i tsher ma yis/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pas dgang / /sangs rgyas dag kyang
nges par 'jig /ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang / /dug dang da du ra dag ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsad pa la/ /'di dag mchog tu gyur par bshad/ /sol khus gsher ba'i
gos dag ni/ /gyon te sems ni khros nas su/ /rkang pas ling ga mnan nas ni/ /srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za/ /rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis/ /gzugs brnyan rab
tu byas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang / /myur ba dag tu 'khyer bar 'gyur/ /ske tshe bshang gci sbyar ba yis/ /ling ga yongs su gang bar ni/ /blugs la rkang pas
rab mnan na/ /tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta

badzrA NAM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ tISh+Tha tISh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+phoT ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+han bi nA ya kA na/ mahA ga na pa ti dzI bI tAn+ta kA
rA ya hUM phaT/ sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan dag /lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste/ /ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya/ /'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no/ /rdo rje sems
@#/ /dpa' khro bo che/ /rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams/ /bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya/ /de la 'di ni drag po chen
po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go /mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis/ /yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom/ /gdug pa de yis bsad par ni/ /bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni/ /gdug pa'i sems pas bsad na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/ /sangs rgyas gnod
byed dgra rnams la/ /skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa/ /
gtum zhing khro ba mi bzad pas/ /der ni skrag par byas bsams na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi/ /'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod dang / /mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te/ /de yis zos
par bsams na ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed/ /dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /dpral bar
bsams na khyad 'phags pa'i/ /sprul de zos par bsams na ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la/ /yams sam gnod
par byed pa rnams/ /'jigs pa nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog /'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no/ /thob rab tu drag po yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg /rdo
rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /dgra bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sta re la sogs pas/ /gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni/ /sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi/ /srung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang / /lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab/ /'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka'
ba'o| |rdo rje'i phung pos ji tsam du/ /sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la/ /gsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni/ /mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /ston pa sangs
rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /bsam gtan sbyor pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po/ /thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ /
e/ ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan/ /de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o/ /sbrul
@#/ /ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa/ /nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro/ /lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng can ni/ /rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bri/ /de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul
ba'i snying po'o/ /khaM| mi bzad par ni 'gyur ba'i dug /rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam/ /dug ni ha la ha la mtshungs/ /sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin/ /bsgoms na 'gul
bar gdon mi za/ /de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o/ /hrIH/ rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug /khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun/ /de yis khyer bar bsgoms/
nas ni/ /'bab par gyur par rnam par bsam/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /mi bzad dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur/ /reg ma thag tu skye bo kun/ /'jig pa 'di la the tshom med/ /
sdig pa rus sbal la sogs dang / /sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang / /sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya/ /de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i
snying po'o/ /oM| lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs/ /gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bsams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren/ /bcom ldan
'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o/ /hUM|rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di/ /kha dog dkar por
rnam par bsam/ /'od kyi sprin ni shin tu 'bar/ /zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil/ /gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lan gsum legs
par bsgom pa ni/ /skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang / /de ma thag tu dug med 'gyur/ /zhes de skad bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni nye
ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o/ /AH/ 'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang / /gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /bsam pa tsam
gyis med par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad/ /zla ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa/ /'od zer lnga ni rdzogs pa'o/ /sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag/
bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dri/ /bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di/ /ye shes dri med gsang chen yin/ /de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags
kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so/ /dzi na dzi ka /A ro lika /badzra d+h+r-i ka /nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis/ /yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa/ /dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i gzugs
ni bsgom par bya/ /dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba'am/ /yang na khyi las byung ba'ang rung / /rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las/ /byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam/ /'khor lo'am
@#/ /ni rdo rje'ang rung / /bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas/ /lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams/ /des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom/ /de nas brtsams
te rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag /dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol/ /'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal
to| |rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la/ /sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po/ /nad las thar par rnam par bsgom/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
cad dang / /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag /de la khros par bsams na ni/ /'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /las skyes su yang
gang grags pa/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam/ /
'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /ye shes kyo ba 'od po che/ /'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches/ /gsum ni 'di skad
bka' stsal to/ /chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing / /rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la/ /'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung / /bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson
pa'i| |sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong / /de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas
te| byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas/ /sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong / /sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa yi/ /skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong / /sems can
chen po khams gsum pas/ /mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo / /ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /'dod pa'i yon
tan lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong / /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang / /grags pa chen po rdo rje chos/ /gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher/ /rmi lam dag
na rang gzugs mthong / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong gyur pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste/ /rgyan
rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang / /khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na/ /de ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad
kyang | /zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong / /thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang / /chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /kun gyis yongs bskor ba/ /bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur/ /kun dga' ra bskyed mos tshal/ /lha yi bu mo sogs
pas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas/ /bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong / /rigs
'dzin rgyal po chen po yis/ /mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo / /yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i/ /rmi lam dri ma med mthong na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
las| |skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur/ /gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs/ /gal te rdo rje blos mthong na/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par
'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o/ /rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la/ /chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas/ /nam mkha' rdo
rje'i gnas sems 'di/ /chos med chos nyid med pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ci zhig lags/ /chos
rnams ngo bo med pa la/ /chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad/ nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no/ /nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam
du yang mi sems so/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam gyi dam tshig las byung bar rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' rtag tu med cing bltar mi snang ba thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems
dang chos thams cad rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni/ /thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems
@#/ /kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de 'ang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa 'ang ma yin/
gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa 'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa 'ang ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med do/ /gang
la skye ba med pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o//
kye| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i
gnas byed pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so/ /chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba
med do/ /'di ni ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin no/ /kye|bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi
lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong ngo snyam du mi sems so/ /khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang / rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba/
rmi lam las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed
pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / rmi lam bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di
lta ste/ dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams
cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ sems can gang dag gis gser ram/ rin po che'am/ dngul yang rung ste/ gang bslangs pa de dag thams cad bsams pa tsam gyis
'byor par byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la yang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la yang gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang nam mkha'i khams kye rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar
to| |de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus
pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so
zhes bya ba byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub
thams cad ni/ sku dang gsungs dang thugs la mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub
thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la ni gnas so/ /lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje de dag kyang / 'dod pa'i khams
na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngang kyang sems
la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang la gnas gnas byung / dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal
pa| rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems las byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ sems gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ nam
mkha' la gnas so/ /gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ gang na 'ang mi gnas so/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag ngo mtshar du gyur
rmad du gyur pas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
@#/ /gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol pa btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i
dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung
ngo| |de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog /legs par rab tu bshad par bya/ /khru ni bcu drug tshad
du bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ /sku yi rdo rjer btu gnas/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje'i tshogs bri bar bya/ /sngags rnams
kun gyi gsang ba mchog /phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya|/dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri/ /sku dang gsungs thugs rdo rje mchog /grwa rnams kun
tu dgod par bya/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi/ /khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o/ /rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas/ /mchod pa sngags shes pa yis bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams
thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba 'o/ /bshad dang gci ba la sogs pa/ /bye brag tu ni nges par dbul/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /sku yi rdo rje las
dam tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin
bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung / dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor
mchog /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog /legs par rab tu bshad par bya/ /khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya/ /gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin/ /
gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par /rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gdab bo/ /de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni/ /zlum por kun tu bri bar bya/ /mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bri bar
@#/ /bya| |tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du/ /thams cad yongs su dgod par bya/ /yongs
su gsal bar cho ga bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya/ /'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes/ /bshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis/ /
mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil
'khor ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i/ /gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa/ de yi
dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung / /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gnas ye
shes gsang ba yin te/ rab tu gsang ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnams so/ /oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang / tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag /sngags kyi sems las mi bya
ste| |byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'/ /de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas/ /sngags kyi lha rnams phab nas su/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni
rnam par brtag /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang / /yang na spyan ni dbab par bya/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong / /rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob/ /rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/ /
rang gi chos mas dbab par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba rab tu rtag pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /ma mA kI yang dbab par bya/ /'di ni sngags
rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o/ /de ltar byas na byin rlob cing / /yid la dbang ba nyid gshegs te/ /rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni/ /gsang ba dag gis mchog
kyang stsol/ /'di skad kyang gsungs so/ /sngags kyi sems pas bya ba ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba rmad po che/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /rdo rje dri
@#/ /med gsum dag gi /dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed/ /'di skad kyang gsungs
so| |sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang / /rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul/ /bshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang / /sems las byung ba'i tsan+dan dang / /khu ba dag gis
sngags rnams kun/ /tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o/ /thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di/ /bdag
nyid gang tshe spyod pa na/ /rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags/ /slob ma rdo rje 'od po che/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyis bsten pa yi/ /las kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par bsgom/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin/ /sngags
rnams thams cad nyid la yang / /rdo rje hUM ni bsgom par bya/ /sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog /gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /de ltar rtag tu byas na ni/ /rdo rje mi
phyed gsum las skyes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa/ /'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad/ /rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni/ /sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'dod pa'i/ /sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya/ /bshang cig 'bru mar sha la sogs/ /sbyin
sreg tu ni dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul/ /dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/ /bsams te gzhal du dbab par bya/ /'di skad
kyang gsungs so/ /dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /rnam snang
mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis/ /slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung / /AHni lus dang ngag sems la/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje gzung bar bya/ /rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /grags
chen rnam par snang mdzad dag /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu/ /bying yis brlabs ni rab tu gsol/ /de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go/ /AH
khaM bi ra hUM/ 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis/ /sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams bsgom/ /'di
skad kyang gsungs so/ /rdo rje sku gsum sdags kyi ni/ /yungs kar dag gis brdeg par bya/ /de la de yi tshe na ni/ /bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
'dzin gyis/ /yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya/ /bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis/ /bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis bsgom/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam/ /slob
ma rtag tu blo brtan la/ /lus dang ngan sems rdo rje can/ /sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya/ /de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba slob dpon thams cad
kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsum bas byang / /khams gsum dag gis phyag byas ba/ /rdo rje dbang bskur chen po
sbyin| |de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin/ /bdag
kyang 'gra tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/ /rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad/ /lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /snying
gar bdag po gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ /dam tshig
gsang pa bsgrag par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /ma byin par yang khyod kyis long / /bud med dag kyang bsten par bya/ /rdo rje'i lam
ni 'di dag gis/ /sems can thams cad bskul bar bya/ /'di skad kyang gsungs te/ /'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /sngags kyis bskul
ba smras pa yis/ /de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang / /gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya/ /khu ba'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung / /chog bzhin
du bsngags nas ni/ /rdo rje'i blos ni bza' bar bya/ /'on tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te/ /rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang / /sngags kyi 'khor
lo bud med gzugs/ /sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o/ de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang sngags kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o/ /glang po'i
sha dang rta yi sha/ sha chen dag kyang bza' bya zhing / /sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya/ /de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes/ /nyin re rdo rje slob ma la/ /mkhas pas dkyil
@#/ /'khor bstan par bya/ /bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang / /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis/ /sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge oM/ /bsgoms na de ma thag tu
'bar/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang / /dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang / /
sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang / /nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya/ /mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang / /rdo rje sku yi bka'
bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub/ /bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams/ /cha ni mnyam par byas nas su/ /kham phor sbyar mar bzhag na ni/ /sangs
rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod/ /'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i dam tshig gi mchog go /hrIH
ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang po/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /de yi sku gsung
thug gnas/ /der ni sngags kyi dbab par bya/ /de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o/ /AHkhaM d+hIHphyag na rdo rje'i
gzugs chen dang / /phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag /bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhag go /de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas
so| |nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ /tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te/ /'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis/ /
thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o/ /AH/ mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che/ /lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje cho
ga bzhin bskul na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub/ /'di skad ces kyang gsungs so/ /nyams dga' ba yi dwags dang / /chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /zla ba phyed ni tshon
chad kyis/ /sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za/ /ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi/ /de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu/ /'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub/ /phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zab mo'i chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas yang 'thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dam
tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che/ /de bzhin gsung
@#/ /gi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches/ /mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas
so| |dam tshig bskul ba dang / dam tshig gtong ba dang / dam tshig pod pa dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o/ /mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam
par spangs/ /gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni/ /rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can no/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos
de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung / /gal te dbang du bya 'dod na/ /rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che/ /gsang ba chen po 'di bsam
mo| |rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /mda' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni/ /dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag spro/ /gnas lnga dag tu sngags
shes pas/ /rdo rje khro bos rab tu dbab/ /sdangs shing brgyal bar bsgom pa ni/ /byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis/ /bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du/ /gsang ba'i bskul ba
dag gis bsgom/ /sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba/ /rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus
bsam pa| |sngags kyi rdo rje hUM la sogs/ /rdo rje gsum la sogs par bsgom/ /oM ni mig gi dbus bsams nas/ /'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan/ /sngags rnams kun gyi
gzugs dag ni/ /sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong / /bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che/ /sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na/ /rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal thams
cad byang bar 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/ /pas ma na don rnams thams cad 'byor/ /baM ni kha yi nang du bsgom/ /oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam/ /bza' phar
bya ba kun gyi gnas/ /yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste/ /zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog /
rdo rje'i gsung phyung ba'o/ /bI| sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis/ /bskyed de 'di ni rnam par
bsam/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying / /zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can/ /bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje
@#/ /dpa' bo rlabs kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas| rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /tsuM/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam/ /
sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gsum gyi grags che ni/ /lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab/ /bskul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs
pa| |kha dog dkar mor rab tu bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgod do/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ bsam pa thams cad rdo rje longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dzaM/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam//
sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje bsgom pas dbab par bya/ /dzam+b+ha la ni nor sgrub pa/ /gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya/ /zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa/ /thor
tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga yis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis/ /bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbul/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i cho ga yis/ /dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam/ /de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang / /gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis/ /rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi
dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ /rdo rje 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /k+ShiM/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /gru bzhi lham
pa rab tu bzang / /thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas/ /me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs/ /gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsam/ /gzugs
kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab/ /gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya/ /lus gsum rdo rje bye brag gis/ /de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje
'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /dbu rgyan la ni khro bo bsgom/ /snying gar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du
@#/ /gnas pa bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje'i sngags thams cad kyi
dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku
dang gsung thugs yang dag 'grub/ /sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'di bzang po/ /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra/ /dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas/ /mi snang la sogs yang dag
grub| |'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che/ /rig 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs
gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams so/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /mthong ba nyid kyis
dga' bar 'gyur/ /gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di/ /
nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /lus dang ngag sems sgom pa ni/ /rang tshul nyid kyis de byas te/ /de ltar dngos grub 'thob
par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so/ /thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs/ /chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra/ /sngags
kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/ /lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring
pa| |rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing / /rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes/ /sngags kyi rgyud
rnams legs par bslabs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas/ /brtul zhugs chen po dus bzhir ni/ /gsang ba'i
mchod pa rab tu bya/ /sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi/ /bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya/ /'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /zla ba drug
@#/ /gis de dag kun/ /gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing / /bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang / /'dod chags rdo
rje'i gnas spyad pa/ /sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams/ /'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo/ /yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI/ /gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la/ /'di ni rnam pa
kun tu rigs/ /bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can/ /rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi bsam/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa/ /mnyes par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /sgrub
pa po ni blo brtan pas/ /nags tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang / /kha zas bzang po bstar ba dang / /de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum
'das nas/ /rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lha ma yin nam mi mo'ang rung / /rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye/
shes bsten/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /de nyid gsang ba'i tshul chen yin/ /rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che/ /rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum/ /gsang
ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che/ /rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog /ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin
chen rgyal po rab tu zab/ /rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med/ /rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che/ /mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin/ /
'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung / /rdo rje sems
dpa' phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi/ /bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis/ /rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni/ /de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nas ston
@#/ /pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba/ /rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa/ /rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal to/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge che/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag /nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi/ /dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya/ /sha chen
rtag tu bza' bar bya/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i
dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya/ /gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches/ /bshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'/ /'di ni
gsang ba rmad byung ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
las phyung ngo / /rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches/ /dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya/ /khrag dang khu ba sbyar ba dag /brtul zhugs brtan pas rtag tu bza'/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
yi| |dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya/ /gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /de yi sku gsung
thugs rtogs pa'o/ /de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /de yi lus kyi ston pa ni/ /rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas/ /sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te/ /dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o/ /dge ba bcus las kyi
lam| |byad pa ye shes spangs pa rnams/ /dman par mos pa thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos| tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di/ /nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams/ /byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub ston pa ste/ /sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drag po'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
@#/ /rdo rje las phyung ngo / /khams gsum dag na gnas pa yi/ /bud med rdo rje las byung rnams/ /sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni/ /dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung
ba'o| |de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sems can
las byung ji snyed pa/ /dbyer med sku gsum la gnas pa/ /rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang / /bsam gtan rdo rjes gsad par bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rang gi dam tshig rdo rje 'di/ nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur/ /gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che/ /
thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig
'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /khrag dang sha ni za ba dang / /rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod/ /dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis/ /rdo rje chen po

phyung ngo / /'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can/ /de dag 'dod dang dri la 'bad/ /dam tshig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin

kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /thod rus bdug pa'i 'bru mar dang / /zhag gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste/
dag byed 'di ni don chen byed/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /

ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba/ /khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod/ /sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i/ /dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya/ /khams gsum pa thams cad kyi

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug /gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag/

gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha' la gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

rdo rje| |e ma'o rdo rje yi bshad pa/ /gang du lus dang ngag sems med/ /de ru gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog /rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog /rig pa'i skyes bu bsgom pa yi/ /dngos grub kun ni bshad par mdzad/ /mkha'
dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms nas/ /spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom/ /zhal gsum sku gsum las
byung ba/ /rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na/ /byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /gsang ba 'di ni rnam
par bsam/ /gzhan du rnam par bsgoms na ni/ /de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che/ /mnyes par byed ma rnams bsams nas/ /rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa/ /khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di
dag sgom pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che ba'i/ /sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don
@#/ /rtogs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag
