ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /hUM hri khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ /sku dang
gsung thugs gsum snying po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /drag po mi sdug khros pa ni/ /ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra/ /phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yi/ /phyag na
thod pa bsnams par bsgom/ /'od zer lnga rnams yang dag byung / /rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /khrag drang ba ni
mchog yin no/ /rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang / /phur bu drag po mchog dag gis/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang / /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab par bya/ /de nas yang
phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gang bza'
ba| |bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
mchod pa'i mchog 'di/ /nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mchod pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi/ /mchod pas de dag mchod par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad
kyi| |dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi
sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
thob par 'gyur/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdom pa 'di/ /nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
rdo rje las phyung ngo / /sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/ /dam tshig 'dzin pa'i ma rnams la/ /dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyad/ /sdom pa 'di ni rmad po che/ /de nas yang
@#/ /phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lus dang dag sems longs
spyod kyi/ /gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes/ /bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya/ /'dir ni yong ye 'jig par 'gyur/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams
cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni/ /spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /
oM ni dbus su gnas bsams nas/ /bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /skad cig dag gis gzi can 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems bder
gnas par/ /'gyur bar 'di ni dogs pa med/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/ /glegs bam bklags pa'ang mi bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya/ /rdo rje gsum
chog phyag mi bya'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ dug thams cad 'byin pa'am/ gnon pa dang / 'dren pa'i gsang ba 'di/
nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM| 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can/ /'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag /'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa ni/ /ser po lta
bur bsgom par bya/ /rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis/ /sa bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/

lus dang / ngag dang / sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo ni/ /las kyi rdo rje la gnas par/ /haM ni dbus su bzhag nas su/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /sngags
kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis/ /brgyan te rtag tu gzhag par bya/ /'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdus pa'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje any+dza na'i dam tshig 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung / /
ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /de ru rdo rje any+dza na/ /thod par rtag tu dbab par bya/ /tshil chen po dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / pad+mo'i skud pa dang / arga'i skud
@#/ /pas me mar gyi snying po byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na/ rdo rje any+dza na dbab par bya'o/ /de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab na/
dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ gsang ba'i yi ge gsum
dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag
na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me
mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i
gnas kyi don bshad pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub
@#/ /sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de/ gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang
chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung
rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu dus so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du zhig /sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgoms shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ byang
chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ ji ltar mi du bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug
bsngal gsum mi sgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig /yi ge ni thun mong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du nged de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu/ gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thos shing mngon par sangs rgyas so/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/ sems
can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyed ni rdo rje'i thugs/ /dga' ba yid 'od don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson
par mchis bzhed na/ /sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
thugs kyi btsun mor mA ma kyis| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i mchod pa'i
@#/ /mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod do/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan/ sangs rgyas don du byang chub don
dam rjes su phan ston pa/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ /khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba/ /'jig rten dag gi dgos
pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ /rab dga'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du
gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi phan
don che/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa/ /mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na/ yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag
la dgyes par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings
'di dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur
to| |de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las/ yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to/ /de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
@#/ /cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mthong lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang 'dod chags kyi yi
ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/ 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin/
'du byed kyi phung po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/ khams ma yin/ skye mched ma yin/ de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma yin/ zhe sdang ma yin/ gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin
chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal
ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
gi de kho na nyid 'di gzung zhig /khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo
rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang / gsung dang /
@#/ /thugs zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing / /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la
gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum
thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis
brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa
chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+hA ka ra wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi
mkhan po shrI dz+nyA na ka ra bas bshad nas/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhus gtugs g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o/ /'dus ba'i rtsa rgyud la lo chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du snang
na'ang / 'gos kyis 'gyur bcos mdzad pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gos 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o// //rgyud phyi ma/ de nas
byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa
la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag /rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni/ /rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad
dus gsum gyi/ /rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o/ /e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che/ /e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das//
e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun/ /e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams
@#/ /la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa'/ de de bzhin no/ /sems dpa' chen po/ de de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang / phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par
mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin/ /rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog
gyur pa/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ /sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang / /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa/ /mgon po khyed
la gsol bar 'tshal/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig sbas pa'i
rgyud tshig de/ /de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas legs so legs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
kun| |rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te/ /yang dang yang du phyag btsal nas/ /'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur/ /gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyi/ /'dus pa zhes ni gang la
brjod/ /rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la ba gyi/ /de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad/ /de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du/ /gsang chen zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /dam pa rnam pa
du zhig mchis/ /byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi/ /de bzhin rig pa'i skyes bu ci/ /badzra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi/ /de bzhin dzi na dzika ni gang / /de la rat+na d+h+r-ika ni gang / /de bzhin
A ro li ka ni ci/ /pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces gang la bgyi/ /rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig la/ /mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /de Sha zhes 'dir gang la bgyi/ /rA ga zhes ni ci la bgyi/ /badzra
sngags ni gang la bgyi/ /ra ti zhes 'dir gang la bgyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags/ /ya man+ta kr-ita don ni gang / /de bzhin pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ci/ /pad mAn+ta kr-ita ming ci lta/ /
de bzhin big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ci/ /kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags/ /de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang / /'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags/ /rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi/ /chos 'byung
ba ni ji ltar bsgom/ /de bzhin sdom pa ji lta bu/ /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches/ /sems can don mdzad ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /phyag rgya'i
dkod pa ci ltar lags/ /'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags/ /mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad/ /ye shes 'khor la ji ltar shes/ /'dir ni gnas zhes gang la bshad/ /
@#/ /mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu/ /gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu/ /ji ltar de rnams spyan dang bgyi/ /bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu/ /dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal//
de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs gang / /bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'/ /de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags/ /dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu/ /de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu/ /de
la thabs ni rnam pa du/ /de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi/ /bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi/ /las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs ji ltar byed
par 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas bde bar gshegs/ /mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to| |lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/ /gzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po/ /zhus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs
so legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ /legs so legs so/ /zhes gsol nas/ rang rang lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku
dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs
nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum/ /gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad ces bya ba/ /tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad/ /lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang / /bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /bstan
pa dag ni sgrub chen yin/ /bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa/ /brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa/ /slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni/ /dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin/ /drug pa dang ni
gnyis pa dang / /bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa/ /drag spyod rjes su chags pa dang / /nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/ /bdun pa dang ni gsum pa dang / /bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa/ /dngos
@#/ /grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni/ /bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs spyod pa dag /dul dang
gdul dka' zhi ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o/ /bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel pa yi/ /bsnyen pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi/ /thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin/ /mchog tu
gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi/ /gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o/ /bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni/ /slob ma yongs su smin bya ba//
brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba/ /rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /ston pas yongs su grol ba yin/ /thabs dang shes
rab snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste/ /thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do/ /rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags//
rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te/ /gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang / /mi 'phrogs pa yis rab phye ba/ /gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te/ /de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o/ /
gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste/ /gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o/ /rigs ni lnga dang gsum dag dang / /ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya 'o/ /byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa//
de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod/ /de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen te/ /dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya/ /thog ma tha ma med
zhi ba| |dngos dang dngos med mi zad gtso/ /stong nyid snying rje mi phye ba/ /byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid/ /rig
khang lhan cig ldan pas na/ /rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do/ /rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga/ /rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste/ /rnam shes rdo rje
'dzin du 'dod/ /badzra d+h+r-ika ni rnam shes yin/ /yod dang med dang dbus las 'das/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung / /sems can kun gyi lus yin te/ /skye las
rgyal bas 'dzin dzika /don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na/ /sems ni rin po che zhes bya/ /tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas/ /tshor ba rat+na d+h+r-ika tu brjod/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid
dngos po yis/ /kun la kun gyis thams cad du/ /dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni/ /A ro lika ces bshad pa yin/ /rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa/ /gang yin
de ni shes rab ste/ /'du byed sems pas 'dzin pas na/ /pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar bshad/ /rigs kyi rgyud ces bya bar bshad/ /rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de/ /mi 'jigs
@#/ /skye ba med gang yin/ /mgon po de ni yin par bshad/ /rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na/ /rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad/ /bems po bcings
pa'i rang bzhin pas/ /gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad/ /bdag tu slob pa'i ngo bo bas/ /tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad/ /dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /
'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid/ /rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /srid pa kun 'byung thams
cad du/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i/ /sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad/ /dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yi/ /mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu/ /gnyis
med ye shes chos rnams la/ /nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad/ /de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni/ /zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin/ /
ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad/ /dga' ba rjogs pa'i longs spyod mchog /bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs/ /gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang / /rdo rje la dga'
rtag par gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs/ /rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do/ /mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /dngos bo kun gyi dam
tshig ste/ /de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do/ /rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni/ /don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid/ /sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste/ /des na rgyal ba shes mthar
byed| |brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med/ /chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /des na khyab bdag pad mthar byed/ /mi rtog bdag
nyid chos rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed/ /mi 'jigs rnam par mi shes pa/ /brjod du med
dang rtog bral ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas/ /gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed/ /des
na lus mthar byed pa ste/ /des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas/ /nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed/ /des na sems ni mthar byed de/ /des na
nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur/ /'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas/ /'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed/ /des na 'dod chags mthar byed de/ /de bzhin snyoms
'jug mthar byed 'gyur/ /nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang / /de bzhin las ni thams cad zad/ /sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni/ /bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad/ /nyon
@#/ /mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na/ /las rnams thams cad rnam par dag /las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas/ /las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur/ /
gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni/ /rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang / /rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste/ /drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung / /'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug /khro
bo'i dbang por rnam par grags/ /dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug /sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags/ /rig pa'i rgyal po zhes bshad do/ /gzugs
kyi rdo rje la sogs drug /rdo rje bdag po zhes bshad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung / /thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i/ /phung po khams
dang skye mched gzugs/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su/ /dogs
pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /'di la mi bya ci yang med/ /de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin/ /smra bar mi bya cung zad med/ /rtag tu mi bsam ci
yang med/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog /gang gis sems kun la spyod pa/ /kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do/ /dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi//
rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid/ /yid de mAn shes bya bar bshad/ /tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don/ /'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar/ /gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste/ /rdo rje kun
gyis bsrungs pa ni/ /sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do/ /rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid/ /snying po yid kyis rnam bsams te/ /gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis/ /zlos par byed
cing spro zhing bsdu/ /sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag /ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu/ /byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med gzung / /sna
tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro/ /dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla/ /bzlas pa smra bar grags pas na/ /ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la/ /sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de//
de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o/ /ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no/ /de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang / /de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o/ /rdo rje 'chang
ba gang yin pa'i/ /rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang / /bdag byin brlab sogs de bzhin te/ /de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya/ /dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi/ /spyi bor dbang bskur
re re ste/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dag /rang rigs rim gyis rgyas gdab bo/ /'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing / /rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab par/ /sgom gyi
@#/ /gzhan du dngos grub ni/ /bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi dbye ba yis/ /gru gsum du ni rnam par sgom/ /kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par bsgom/ /rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu/ /ye shes bdag
nyid bcu las byung / /'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing / /mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas/ /mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor/ /de
ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni/ /rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba/ /bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung / /rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa/ /rim
pa gnyis la yang dag bsten/ /bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang / /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang / /dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams/ /sngar ni
de kun rgyas par ni/ /rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni/ /bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs/ /
rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur/ /chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes/ /'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs/ /
rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med/ /kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid/ /bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang / /spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/ /sa gsum du ni
bskyed par bya/ /gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing / /rdo rje can gyis don byed do/ /zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su/ /rdo rje drag pos bcom
nas ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu/ /de ni spro bas bsdu byas la/ /de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o/ /'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /
khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /bsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang / /skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni/ /mngon du nus par the tshom med/ /gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /
gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ /rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung / /de dag thams cad rtag tu sku/ /gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho bsgom/ /rin chen kun gyi rab tu dgang / /
gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis/ /sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ /rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid/ /sems kyi rdo rje brtan po
yis| |skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed nas ni/ /lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su/ /
@#/ /'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod/ /dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis/ /'dod pa'i rtsed mor rnam par 'phrul/ /de nas 'khor lo can kun la/ /lha
mo rab tu dbul bar bya/ /khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi/ /lha dang lha min chung ma med/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na/ /mi yi bud med smos ci dgos/ /dkyil 'khor
dang ni dbang bskur dang / /las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag /nyams su len cing byin rlob pa/ /grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin no/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags
dang | |byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa/ /gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams ni//
sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o/ /de ni rtag par rgya dgod pa/ /dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin/ /'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo/ /lcags kyu dbyig pa
rtse gsum dang / /ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod/ /steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes/ /rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi/ /'khor los bsgyur ba drug gi rgya/ /sa la sogs
ba'i sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya ngang gi dkyil 'khor ba/ /le lor pi dang dang ni/ /de bzhin dang sna tshogs cas/ /chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug /rdo rje'i bdag po
rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo/ /de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig /rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag /lha mo dgu dang
nam mkha'i khams/ /me tog ces ni bshad pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya/ /mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bzhugs
gnas pho brang yin par bshad/ /ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa/ /ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge /sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad/ /
sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni/ /sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o/ /rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren
pas| |rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi/ /'od zer gyis ni rdo rje kun/ /bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su/ /bcings pa bcing ba yin par bshad/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab ste/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du/ /rgyud
'di la ni rab tu brtag /bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /mig yangs
@#/ /sngags kyi snod du rung / /me tog bcas shing sa bon byung / /blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /de dag thams cad
snying gar bsdu/ /rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su/ /slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya/ /'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi/ /dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog /las mchog gi ni tshogs
rnams dang / /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dad cing shes rab che/ /gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/ /sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms/ /
dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can/ /bla ma la ni slob ma yis/ /yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni/ /bla mas de ni byin rlabs te/ /sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya/ /rmongs pas gti
mug bdag nyid sbyor/ /gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /zhe sdang sdang ba'i bdag nyid sbyor//
zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan/ /zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chags la 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor/ /'dod chags dga'
dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor/ /rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan/
ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na/ /shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni/ /rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang / /lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni/ /de
bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la/ /slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste/ /bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /de bas rig pa 'di mchog
yin| |chos kun gnyis su med pa la/ /dngos po gnyis su brtags pa yin/ /de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba/ /rtag tu khyed kyis mi bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi| |rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'das gyur na/ /de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub/ /tha mal lus kyi chos la ni/ /dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni//
ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas/ /bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/ /spar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang / /snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba/ /sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor
bas| |bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni/ /bar snang la gnas bsam par bya/ /aHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni/ /de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya/ /oM gyis mtshan
@#/ /pa'i bdud rtsi ni/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim bar bya/ /shes dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing / /ye shes nyi ma
gnyis par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ /mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi de ru phab nas kyang / /bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya/ /
bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis/ /de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'/ /yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya/ /gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'grub/ /mi snang la sogs
dngos grub ni/ /tha mal pa zhes bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis/ /dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin/ /thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag /byang
chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtag par sngags/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste/ /nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin//
sgrub pa yang ni gsum pa yin/ /sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o/ /thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis/ /bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste/ /ye shes
bdud rtsi mchog yin no/ /dang po stong nyid byang chub ste/ /gnyis ba sa bon sras pa yin/ /gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste/ /bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o/ /rdo rje rnam
bzhi 'di dag gis/ /tha mal bsgrub la bsnyen par bya/ /mchog ni ye shes bdud rtsi nyid/ /sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin/ /bsnyen pa yan lag drug gis ni/ /byas pas sgrub
pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /gzhan du bsgrubs par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub mchog ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang / /srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang / /
rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin te/ /sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad/ /dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang / /rang gi 'jug nas thams cad du/ /'dod pa so sor sdud pas na/ /
so sor sdud pa zhes bshad do/ /'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis/ /brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de/ /bsam gtan de ni rnam lngar
'gyur/ /rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang / /de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang / /sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste/ /lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu/ /gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams
cad du/ /rnam pa du mar yongs bshad pa/ /gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste/ /de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o/ /dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/ /bde bsdus pa ni bzhi
pa'o| |shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i/ /rang sems lnga par shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni/ /'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas/ /ye shes lnga yi rang
@#/ /bzhin dbugs/ /'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyi phyung nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag /rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa/ /srog dang stsol
ba zhes byar bshad/ /rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni/ /srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag /rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi/ /gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad//
sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur/ /mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar/ /byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/ /smig rgyu 'dra
ba dang po ste/ /du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin/ /mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste/ /mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa 'o/ /sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni/ /rtag tu snang ba lnga pa 'o//
brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni/ /nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya/ /rjes dran gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/ /de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya/ /rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de/ /
so sor snang ba de la skye/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ /gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni/ /dbus su gzugs ni
rnam par bsgom/ /yid kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas/ /so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na/ /sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlobs//
bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na/ /mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs/ /rtag tu 'dzin
pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug /rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni//
sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/ /snying po de ni thugs ka ru/ /zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta/ /mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/ /sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya ste/ /sngags
kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni/ /byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ /cho ga yang dag sbyor bsgom pas/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /sems de ye shes gzugs
kyis ni/ /sgom pa nye bar sgrub pa 'o/ /ji srid mthong ba de srid du/ /rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu bsgom/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/ /thams cad du ni rtag tu bya/ /gal te zla ba
drug gis ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya/ /de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos/ /mthong ba 'byung
bar ma gyur cing / /gang tshe byang chub ma grub na/ /drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni/ /'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung / /rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor
@#/ /bas ni/ /rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab/ /de nas dbang du bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /ye
shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu/ /lha mo dgu ni spros nas su/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod/ /yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor der ni brtag par
bya| |bdag nyid dbus su gnas bya la/ /'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la/ /de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya/ /bskul ba'i glu dbyangs
bzhi yis ni/ /lha mos snying po bskul ba yis/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems/ /ye shes lta bur lus bsgom mo/ /bzhi yis kha dog rnam par dbye/ /de bzhin
nyams kyi snying po ste/ /dbang bskur pas ni rang gi rgyu/ /bzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin/ /sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la/ /rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so/ /'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po drug /gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod bzhi/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i
bdag po rnams/ /'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad/ /bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad la/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//
ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa/ /sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni/ /reg pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can/ /bdag dang 'dra bar
dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che/ /sbyor ba nyid kyi gzugs su dmigs/ /nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni/ /bdud rtsi
'khyil ba'i gzugs kyi bar/ /sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis/ /sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya/ /sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni/ /gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku/ /'di ni rdo
rje can kun dang / /rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che/ /de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni/ /sangs rgyas
skyob pa rnams kyis kyang / /dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag /nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor/ /gang yin de ni bsnyen par bshad/ /
rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do/ /yi ge hUM dang phaT ldan pa/ /bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la/ /ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes
bshad do/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung / /de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do/ /las dang rjes
@#/ /mthun gang gang gis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs/ /dkyil 'khor de dang de bskyed nas/ /dam tshig mi zad bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya/ /de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni/ /cho ga ji skad gsungs las byung / /las dang gang gang rjes mthun pas/ /rang
gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo/ /bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa la'ang / /dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su/ /de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la/ /de yi nyes pa bsgrag
par bya/ /de nas de rnams de bcom nas/ /byung bar gyur par rnam par bsgom/ /dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas/ /dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni/ /de ni rang gi
'khor lor gzhug /ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya/ /
de nas bka' mnos khro bo ni/ /sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams/ /sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni/ /bsgrub bya bsad phyir btang bar bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor
nas| |de ni bcings shing brdeg pa dang / /de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa/ /sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya/ /rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni/ /de yi gzugs brnyan
la phab nas/ /sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni/ /spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha ru/ /phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab/ /yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun/ /sna tshogs yul las byung
ba rnams/ /gzugs de la ni phab nas su/ /de rnams kyi ni phur bus gdab/ /de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis/ /cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor
la sogs/ /las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya/ /mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa'am/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam/ /bsgoms pas gdugs pa'i sems can ni/ /zos
par gyur par rab tu brtag /zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya/ /rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te/ /dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya/ /khro bo gtum pas rab tu sgrub/ /zhes pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tshom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/
the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs
par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod
@#/ /do| |thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad
mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur pas/ /sems can sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam/ /bsgrub bya su yin sgrub
po gang / /sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis/ /ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang / /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems dpa' chen po
legs so legs/ /bdag nyid chen po legs so legs/ /gsung dbyangs chen po legs so legs/ /mchod pa chen po legs so legs/ /slob dpon byang chub
rdo rje can/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/ /bskyed dang sdung par mdzad pa po/ /des na de yi sdig mi 'byung / /bsod nams
dag kyang de bzhin te/ /gang la sdig dang bsod nams med/ /de ni byang chub yin par gsungs/ /mgon po de yi slu ba yis/ /lus can thams cad 'jigs mdzad
kyang | |ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'/ /sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas/ /gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni/ /skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi/ /
dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che/ /byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub bya 'di/ /ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas/ /sems can rnams kyis sbyor ba des/ /mchog tu phan btags shes par bya//
tshar gcod pa dang rjes bzung las/ /bdag nyid chen po de yis bya/ /sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par/ /byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos thos pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs zhes gsol to/ /mgon po chen po legs so
legs/ /thub pa chen po legs so legs/ /chos rnams chen po legs so legs/ /thugs rje chen po legs so legs/ /e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /thugs rje chen po dri
ma med/ /gdug pa mi bzad las kyis kyang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i
@#/ /sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing skrag par mi bya dngang par yang mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba/ /zhe sdang rdo rje che la
sogs/ /sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus pa dag /yongs su spang bar mi bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
thams cad la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ /dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang / /zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo
nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can/ /de la lus ngag yid kyi rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang / /rnam par
shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug /sa chu me dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo
rje chos bcas gang / /rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel par/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dngos gyur pa/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal li/ /
spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang / /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes thogs chos/ /rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems 'dra rgya
chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig thogs med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa/ /thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor

ba rtag /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing / /bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang / /sgrub pa chen pos blo mi
'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa/ /mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman 'grub cing / /bla
ma'i drin gyis 'di na ma nor lam rtogs pa/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / /'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni
sems pa dang / /mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri'am 'drir 'jug pa/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis/ /'khrul

'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i/ /bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni/ /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po mthong reg
pa dang / /legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par thos pa dang / /dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag /byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /bstod pa'i
@#/ /tshig ni zhi ba 'dis/ /'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la/ /mgon po de dag rjes yi rang / /'dus pa gsang ba las
byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yi/ /rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i
sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba
'dus pa las/ gsang ba thams cad sngon pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A
